SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>房主在该界面输入-bp即可启用自由BP模式</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>Enter -bp in the chat to enable BP (Ban Phase) mode.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>在该模式下,每个玩家选择的第一个角色将成为禁选角色,在所有人都选择完毕后将正式开始角色选择</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>In this mode, the first character selected by each player will be banned. Actual character selection will start after the ban phase is concluded.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>时间内没有完成选择的玩家将会随机选择一个角色禁选</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>Players who do not select a character to ban within the time limit will a character selected for them at random.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>BP模式已开启,请先选择你要禁选的角色</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>BP mode is enabled, please first select the character you want to ban.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>BP选择阶段结束,5秒后进入正常角色选择流程</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>Ban Phase is over, character selection phase will begin in 5 seconds.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>启用Dota2 BP模式（旧），但时间结束时不会随机禁用</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>Enabled Dota2 BP Mode(Old), but it will not randomly ban when the time is end</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>若在时间内未选择禁用，将不会禁用任何一名少女</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>If didnt choose one to ban within the time, it will not ban anyone</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>欢迎来到THD2人机模式，在这里通过与Bot对抗，熟悉THD2的少女和装备吧</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>Welcome to THD2 bots mode, where you can practice and get familiar with the various girls and items.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>其他常用指令如下，更多可在群内询问：</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>Some other useful commands include (but not limited to):</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-pause 暂停，再次输入恢复游戏</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-pause' Pause the game, enter again to resume.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-allowsame 允许选择同一英雄，可输入-unallowsame关闭</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-allowsame' Allows the same girl to be selected multiple times. You can enter '-unallowsame' to turn it off after.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-setmaxplayer X 设置每队的最大人数，X最大为12</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-setmaxplayer X' Sets the maximum number of players per team to X, up to 12.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-setmaxbot X 设置守矢神社的最大人数，X最大为12</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-setmaxbot X' Sets the maximum number of players Moriya team to X, up to 12.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-banbots X 禁用bot机体，x是机体覆盖的dota英雄名字，多个机体用空格隔开</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-banbots X' Prevents bots from selecting the specified girl using the name of the dota hero they use, can specify multiple girls by separating each entry with a space.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-strawberry 启用草莓模式，测试未实装的游戏性改动</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-strawberry' Enable Strawberry Mode to test gameplay changes that have not been implemented yet.(No Translation)</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>欢迎新人加入QQ群474907856与新老玩家共勉，也可通过 https://thd2.cc/ 获取信息发布</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>Newcomers are welcome to join the English discord at https://discord.gg/pKm5Sqqwnj</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>THBWiki搜索桃花岛获取更多角色攻略</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>There is also a (incomplete, work-in-progress) wiki at https://thdots-new.fandom.com/</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>默认难度为easy(容易)，可通过以下指令修改难度：</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>The difficulty defaults to easy, but can be changed with the following commands:</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-easy 该难度下Bot会平地摔，适合没有或缺少MOBA经验的玩家</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-easy' In this difficulty, bots will randomly be stunned, for those with little to no MOBA experience.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-normal 该难度下Bot没有Buff修正，适合没有或缺少Dota2及THD2经验的玩家</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-normal' In this difficulty, bots have no particular buffs or debuffs, for those with experience in MOBAs but not in DoTA2 or THD.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-hard 该难度下Bot有回蓝、经济经验和属性Buff，适合想要全面了解THD2少女和装备的玩家</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-hard' In this difficulty, bots have additional mana regen, gold, experience, and increased attributes, for those who want to fully understand how all the various girls and equipment in THD2.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-lunatic 该难度：Oh shit, I'm dead, I don't want to play.</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-lunatic' In this difficulty: Oh shit, I'm dead, I don't want to play.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>-extra 选择难度后，额外增加extra难度：bot复活后40秒内再次死亡会马上重置买活cd并获得买活钱，并且增加全属性。</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>'-extra' After choosing difficulty, add extra difficulty: If bot die again within 40 seconds after respawn, it will immediately reset the cd of buyback and get money for buyback, and increase all attribute.</font>

SChinese: 守矢神社的信使被杀死了。
博丽神社的信使被杀死了。
守矢神社的信使已重生。
博丽神社的信使已重生。
守矢神社军团的建筑物已被加固。
English: All buildings of Moriya Shrine has been reinforced.

SChinese: 博丽神社军团的建筑物已被加固。
English: All buildings of Hakurei Shrine has been reinforced.

SChinese: 巨大上海被守矢神社击败了！守矢神社的每位少女获得%s1金钱！
English: Huge Shanghai Doll is defeated by Moriya Shrine!every girl gains %s1 gold

SChinese: 巨大上海被博丽神社击败了！博丽神社的每位少女获得%s1金钱！
English: Huge Shanghai Doll is defeated by Hakurei Shrine!every girl gains %s1 gold!

SChinese: 博丽神社的所有兵营均被摧毁。现在守矢神社出动超级士兵！
English: All Hakurei Shrine's barracks have been destroyed.Now super creeps from Moriya Shrine are ready!

SChinese: 守矢神社的所有兵营均被摧毁。现在博丽神社出动超级士兵！
English: All Moriya Shrine's barracks have been destroyed.Now super creeps from Hakurei Shrine are ready!

SChinese: ℓ一座防御塔被博丽神社护卫兵摧毁了！
English: ℓa turret is destroyed by Hakurei Shrine's creeps!！

SChinese: ℓ一座防御塔被守矢神社护卫兵摧毁了！
English: ℓa turret is destroyed by Moriya Shrine's creeps!

SChinese: 受到来自「月影降临术」的无法驱散的沉默和缴械。
English: Affected by an undispellable silence and disarm from 「Lunar Descent」.

SChinese:
被动：伤害吸收

受到普通攻击时有%chance%%%的概率抵消%percent%%%实际受到的物理伤害,最多抵消%block%点伤害。
English:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %chance%%% chance to block %percent%%% physical damage from incoming attacks, up to %block%.
I have a big chest and let me take it!

SChinese: 多个西尔芙灵纹的加成效果不会叠加。
English: Bonuses from multiple Sylph Spirit Runes do not stack.

SChinese: 每次被攻击降低9点智力
English: The idiot's attacks reduce your intelligence by 9, stacking fully.

SChinese: 管灵「激昂小号曲-第一乐章」
English: Trumpet Spirit「Mad Zun March - First Movement」

SChinese: 梅露兰正在进行激昂演奏。
English: Merlin is playing an impassioned performance.

SChinese: 被露米娅吃了一口，所幸还活着。
English: Had a chunk bitten off by Rumia, but luckily survived.

SChinese: 搜集附近1500码范围内的点数。
丢出一枚阴阳玉，在目标位置弹弹碾碾，每次落地都会对范围内敌人造成伤害和晕眩，每次弹跳降低一定比例的伤害。
English: Reimu summons a massive orb to bounce at the target location, dealing damage and stunning enemies with each hit. The damage is reduced with each subsequent hit.

SChinese: 可在境界上反弹的奇异之玉
English: The strange orb with the power to bounce across dimensions.

SChinese: 瞬间连射数个具有追尾性能的五彩灵弹，能在周围范围内寻找目标追击。
English: Reimu releases a volley of colourful shots that home in on nearby targets.

SChinese: 梦想系基础的最终形态之一。以大量带有追尾性能的弹幕来封杀敌人。
English: One of the final forms of the dream-sealing spells. Forcibly seals the opponent with bullets of light that ignore the laws of physics.

SChinese:
为一个目标罩上二重结界。

如果这个目标是友方单位，则结界作为防御结界，帮助其抵挡一切物理伤害；如果这个目标是敌方单位，则结界作为封魔结界，封锁其施法能力。

二重结界会将灵梦技能伤害转换为纯粹伤害。
English:
Reimu seals the target away with a barrier, making allies immune to physical damage or silencing enemies.

「Duplex Barrier」 will convert Reimu skill damage to pure damage.

SChinese: 据说结界似乎就是事物的境界线的样子，而其变成二重的意思据灵梦说就和没有境界的世界一样了。好像是如果能发现潜藏于各处的空间的缝隙的话，就能张开二重结界了。
English: A barrier is a boundary line between things, and having two barriers on top of each other is equivalent to a world with no boundaries. If you can find the gaps in space that are hiding just about everywhere, you'll be able to set up a duplex barrier.
Becomes an area of effect ability.

SChinese:
灵梦最强的符卡之一。

张开一个大型结界让周围友方单位处于魔法免疫的状态，对进入结界的敌方单位多次灵击。（造成短暂晕眩和伤害）

敌方目标会持续受到灵击，即使她们走出法阵。
English: Reimu deploys a powerful barrier, granting allies within spell immunity while damage and ministunning enemies.\nEnemies will continue to be struck even if they leave the circle.

SChinese: 灵梦用不可思议的力量夺取对手身体自由的符卡，可以束缚鬼，也能束缚住人。
English: Reimu uses mysterious powers that take away her enemies' freedom of movement. Can bind demons and humans just as well.
The target will be rooted additionally, which cannot be purged.

SChinese:
博丽灵梦的技能每对一名敌人造成一次伤害就会获得一层「异变解决」，每层「异变解决」会为博丽灵梦提供移动速度与攻击速度，最多二十层。

二十层「异变解决」时可以主动施放，消耗所有层数，提供大量攻击速度并进入极速与相位状态。期间可以照常叠加，但不会提供加成。
English:
Grants 1 stack of 「Resolving Incident」 each time Reimu hits an enemy with a spell, stacks up to 20.

Can be casted when have 20 stacks of 「Resolving Incident」, consumes all stacks, gains attack speed greatly, haste and phased movement. During the duration, it can be stacked as usual, but will not provide bonus.

SChinese: 通过不断地解决异变，乐园的巫女小姐也在不断变强，就算是那个博丽灵梦也一样。
English: By constantly solving the Incidents, the Shrine Maiden of Paradise is also constantly becoming stronger, even Hakurei Reimu is the same.

SChinese: 每次攻击有15%概率提升自身攻击速度，持续5秒。
每次攻击减少目标10点攻击速度,最多叠加%limit%层。
每3秒向周围550码内3个单位造成%damage%魔法伤害并降低1点护甲和1魔抗,持续时间4秒,每次雷电叠加并刷新时间。
依神女苑准备好她的下次攻击，获得一定数值的攻击距离加成，攻击时造成暴击伤害并抢夺目标的不可靠金钱。
English: Joon prepares her next attack, gaining bonus attack range, dealing critical damage and stealing some gold.

SChinese: 依神女苑将混乱的能量聚集成球形并投掷引爆，由于其不稳定的特性，技能命中时会减速敌人，并在眩晕，沉默，缠绕，恐惧，缴械五个负面状态中随机选择一个生效
English: Joon gathers chaotic energy into a ball and throws it at opponents. Due to its instability, it slows all enemies hit as well as applying a random debuff between stun, silence, root, fear, or disarm.

SChinese:
超贫穷玉的不稳定能量会聚集在女苑的身边逐渐充能，女苑受到敌方少女的伤害时超贫穷玉会以女苑为中心自动释放一次。
充能时间：%wanbaochui_charge_time%s
English:
Passively gathers chaotic energy around Joon. When an enemy girl deals damage to her while she is fully charged, she automatically releases a poverty bomb at her location.
CHARGE TIME: %wanbaochui_charge_time%

SChinese: 女苑主动向身边范围内尝试进行一次标记，如果范围内有敌方少女则标记成功，暴露其目标的模型视野以及真实视域。标记成功后女苑获得移动速度提升以及状态抗性，每额外标记一名少女都会使状态延长。
English: Joon takes the initiative and searches for enemy girls around her. Enemy girls around Joon are afflicted with a mark which grants vision and True Sight over them.\nGrants bonus movement speed and status resistance when cast. The duration of the buff is increased for each enemy girl affected by the ability.

SChinese: 立即强化女苑后续一段时间的攻击，使自身可以发动快速的华丽连击，攻击速度达到极限，前两次攻击造成短暂眩晕，第三次攻击会踢飞敌人，在踢飞敌人后，女苑需要喘口气才能发动下次连击。
English: Empowers Joon's attacks, allowing her to perform fast and fabulous combos and attack at maximum attack speed. The first two hits of each combo stuns the opponent for a short time, while the third hit launches the opponent away with a kick. She needs to take a short breather between combos.

SChinese: 在女苑周围被击败的敌方少女会正常的损失不可靠金钱。
English: Enemy girls defeated while near Joon will always lose unreliable gold as normal.

SChinese: 召唤3个人偶向目标突出，击飞中途单位，距离600。
English: Alice commands 3 dolls to lunge forward, knocks back enemies on its path and deals damage.

SChinese: 召唤3个人偶向目标发射激光，距离600。
English: Alice commands 3 dolls to shoot lasers forward, deals damage to enemies on its path.

SChinese:
召唤人偶<未来文乐>，人偶会向施法方向突进800码，如果触碰到一个少女单位，则会自动对其释放未来文乐人偶的前两个技能。移动速度400，控制范围1500，持续时间30s。
1级 - 无技能
2级 - 附带技能：突刺 - 眩晕1S并造成100伤害。
3级 - 附带技能：激光 - 距离600造成250伤害。
4级 - 附带技能：自爆 - 引爆自身，400范围内造成400伤害。
English:
Alice invokes the doll「Futuristic Bunraku」onto the field, it will lunge forward for 800 range. If it collides an enemy girl, it will auntomatically casts its first two spells on her. The doll has movement speed of 522, can be manipulated in range of 1500, lasts for 30s.
Lv.1-no spell
Lv.2-Lunge-stuns the target for 1s and deals 100 damage.
Lv.3-Laser-deals 250 damage to enemies in front of is.
Lv.4-detonate-self explodes, dealing 400 damage to enemies in 400 range.

SChinese: 所有召唤出来的人偶启动自爆装置，向目标靠近并自爆。
English: Alice commands all her dolls on the field to move towards the target location. Dolls explode after they reach the region, deal area damage to enemies around.

SChinese: 该技能施放后数秒内，爱丽丝可以操控人偶在控制范围内自由移动和攻击，并在攻击时引发自爆。
English: After cast, Alice can control dolls move and attack within control range, and self explosion when attack hit.

SChinese: 每5秒增加一个人偶，最大持有人偶3，主动释放回收人偶，回收后的人偶需要2s重置时间，并回复20点魔法值;alice每升2级，可持有人偶+1，人偶血量+50。
English: Alice stores a doll every 5s, has a base count of 3 dolls. Activation recycles dolls on the field, each recycled doll restores 20 MP for Alice. +1 count of dolls and +50 health of dolls  every 2 levels for Alice.

SChinese: 扔出3个人偶炸向目标区域，并隐身向后移动。
English: Alice throws 3 dolls to bomb the target area, and moves back invisibly.

Plays a manic tune to the target unit, forcing them to attack Merlin.

If the target is a non-girl non-jungle unit, it will deal %extra_damage% additional damage and refund %return_mana% mana.

Instantly kills jungle creeps below a certain level.

Target any unit for Merlin to play an impatient movement to.

The target gains bonus attack damage and movement speed, but loses armor and magical resistance.

With her skillful playing skills, she can continuously play shocking movements.

Increases the health regeneration of nearby units by %hp_regen%.

The lower her health, the more manic she becomes, increasing the health regeneration. Grants an additional %hp_regen% health regeneration for every %spell_rate%%% health lost.

SChinese: 开启后，梅露兰以熟练的演奏技巧，不断奏出令人发狂的乐章。每秒对自身和%radius%码内的敌方单位造成%damage_percent%% 自身最大生命值的魔法伤害,额外给予敌人%slow%%%的减速效果.
English: While active, Merlin will continuously play maddening music with her skillful playing skills. Deals %damage_percent%%% of her maximum health as magical damage to herself as well as all enemies within %radius% range every second. Enemies' movement speed is reduced by %slow%%%.

SChinese: 管灵「激昂小号曲-第一乐章」
English: Trumpet Spirit「Mad Zun March - First Movement」
Targets an enemy girl and forces her to listen to Merlin's performance. During this time, any damage received by Merlin will also be inflicted onto the target unit as increased magical damage.

SChinese: 独葬「棱镜协奏曲-小号独奏」

English:
Every 4th attack deals %health_percent_bonus%%% of her max health as magical damage.

Each kill grants %health_bonus% maximum health. (After %health_limit% bonus health, the increase is halved.)
Ran become invulnerable for a short time.

SChinese: 使目标位置的辐射量瞬间增大，产生大量放射性物质并爆炸，对目标及其周围造成快速的辐射伤害并沉默。
English: Collects nuclear energy and fires it at the target, dealing damage and silencing her and affecting every unit within radius with radiation sickness which deals damage over time.

SChinese: 收集并发射核聚变能量。空的能力最简单直接的使用方式，几乎不可正面与之抗衡的高火力射击。
English: Collects nuclear energy and fires. A very simple use of Okuu's ability, virtually impossible to erase from the front due to its high firepower.

SChinese: 极大的加快核裂变速度，使自身的能量得到快速的恢复，并且得到技能增强。但会因为反应超速造成的偏差，造成核能外泄，对自己及%radius%范围的所有单位造成辐射伤害。
English: Sends the nuclear fission within her into overdrive, providing significant mana regeneration and spell amplification. However, the volatility of the reaction causes radiation to leak out constantly, dealing damage to herself and all nearby units.

SChinese: 使核能在体内反应，积攒，循环，准备时间内，身上发黄光，颜色越来越亮。核能释放后造成法术伤害。准备期间空可以自由行动。
English: Starts a nuclear chain reaction within you that takes time to reach critical mass, causing her to glow yellow, slowly growing brighter and brighter, before finally causing a massive explosion around you.

SChinese: 空让核能在体内循环增幅，当超过临界时空便化作将周围一切都燃烧殆尽的灼热太阳。太阳的判定极广。对空来说也是相当热的技能。
English: Increases the circulation of nuclear energy in the body. Once the limit is exceeded, Okuu turns into a scorching sun which burns everything around. The sun's hitbox is very large and it can't be blocked. An intensely hot skill, even for her.

SChinese: 核子急速核聚变产出一个人工太阳，附近敌人会受引力影响拉入中心，被拉入太阳内的敌人会受到伤害，中止施法时会产生一次毁灭世界的核爆，对敌人造成核级数的伤害。时间愈接近结束，引力愈高，核爆亦愈高。
English: Creates an artificial sun at the target point and begins channelling more and more energy into it. The sun deals damage to nearby enemies and pulls them in with its gravitational force. When the channeling ends, the sun goes supernova, dealing massive damage. The gravity and explosion damage increases the longer the spell is channeled.

SChinese: 向前方发射出具有吸引能力的能量体，空将向其中间断注入能量的大规模攻击。
English: Creates an energy mass that has gravity, and shoots it forwards. She will continue to inject energy into this mass.

SChinese: 增强40%%引力强度；开始施放时对核爆范围内全体敌方施加2s沉默。
English: Silences enemy units within pulling range for 2 seconds upon cast. Gravity is increased by 40%.

SChinese: 瞬间移动到附近一朵向日葵的旁边。\n施法距离：700
English: Yuuka blinks next to one of her flowers.

SChinese: 女王瞬闪以任意单位为目标
English: Blink can now target any unit.

SChinese: 在自身旁边种下一朵向日葵，白天能回复队友，晚上则会隐身，向日葵每多一朵，幽香的攻击力将会提升。向日葵的属性会随着幽香的等级逐渐提高
English: Yuuka plants a sunflower. Sunflowers consume mana to heal allied girls during the day, and are invisible at night. Each sunflower increases Yuuka's attack damage. Sunflowers get stronger as Yuuka's level increases.

SChinese: 每朵花增加基础攻击百分比：
每级向日葵攻击速度提升：
文向目标地点快速移动并对经过的敌方单位造成伤害。
English: Rushes towards the target point, dealing damage to enemies along the path.

SChinese: 文文用和风同样的超高速来回穿梭飞行在幻想乡中。
English: Aya shuttles back and forth at the same speed as the wind in the Gensokyo.

SChinese: 「无双风神」无条件刷新「猿田彦的先导」冷却，飞行速度提升100%%，对经过的敌方单位造成%wanbaochui_slow%%%减速，每次刷新冷却时消耗当前魔法值的6%%。
English:
「Sarutahiko's Guidance」 refreshes itself in any condition while「Peerless Wind God」.
Increases 「Sarutahiko's Guidance」 rush speed by 100%, reduces enemies hit move speed by %wanbaochui_slow%%%.
But each 「Sarutahiko's Guidance」 while「Peerless Wind God」costs additional 6%% of Aya's current mana.

SChinese: 记者的敏锐，随时抓拍捕捉目标敌方单位特征，共享其视野时间16秒，她本身的位置也会曝露给文所在的阵营，并且文对目标攻击时会造成额外纯粹伤害。
English: Marks the victim for some coercive reporting. Target shares vision and takes extra damage from Aya's attacks.

SChinese: 笔比剑更锋利。被文文记载在新闻上的话，再强的妖怪也无法再抬头。
English: A pen is sharper than a sword. If recorded in the news by aya, even the strongest youkai cannot raise its head.

SChinese: 目标带着该效果进入隐身时也会被看到。
English: When the target turn to invisibility with this effect, it can still be seen.

SChinese: 文在攻击中，融入其操纵风的能力，有概率向面前扇出一道旋风，对目标单位及其附近敌方单位造成减速和伤害。
English: Said artifact grants a chance to create a whirlwind on a general attack, dealing extra damage and slowing down nearby enemies.

SChinese: 文文的幻象触发的旋风造成35%%伤害。
English: Whirlwinds created by Aya's illusions deal 35%% damage only.

SChinese:
被动

增加移动速度，移动速度增加效果不与扫把类叠加。\n

主动

立即刷新「猿田彦的先导」，并且在之后的持续时间内，文文所有的移动动作都会转变为短距离闪烁，每当「猿田彦的先导」对敌方少女造成伤害，刷新「猿田彦的先导」冷却时间。
English:
Passive:

bonus movement speed (does not stack with brooms).\n

Active:

Aya's movement command turns into a free blink teleportation. Immediately refreshes 「Sarutahiko's Guidance」. When hitting enemy girls with it, that spell refreshes ifself.

SChinese: 文文缠绕着风向前方进行高速突击。
English: Aya wrapp around the wind direction and carries out a high-speed assault ahead.
Good Omen「Nirvana's Cloudy Way in Purple」

SChinese: 对一个单位施以法术一击，造成%damage%魔法伤害，并对附近所有敌方单位，造成法术伤害及晕眩。
English: Unleashes a magical blast which stuns and deals damage to the target and nearby enemies.

SChinese: 消耗当前法力值的%mana_cost%，对目标造成最大法力值一定比例的伤害。
English: Byakuren consumes %mana_cost%%% of her current mana to deal damage to the target based on her own maximum mana.

SChinese: 造成伤害为最大法力值的：

指定一个单位，若目标为友方，会即时回到白莲面前，并驱散异常状态。若目标为敌方，%duration%秒後会回到施法时的位置

施法后%duration%秒内再对目标施放吉兆「极乐之紫之云路」时增加%cast_range%施法距离，并能瞬移至目标身旁。
English:
Targets a unit. If the target is an ally, they are teleported to Byakuren immediately and receive a strong dispel. If the target is an enemy, the target returns to their position when the spell was initially cast after %duration% seconds.

Casting「Nirvana's Cloudy Way in Purple」on the target up to %duration% seconds after casting the spell will increase the cast range by %cast_range% and teleports Byakuren next to them.

SChinese: 以最大法力值取得最大生命值。同时在攻击时对目标及其周围其他敌方单位造成伤害并回复圣白莲等量的生命，当前生命百分比越低则伤害越高。对攻击目标周围的敌人只造成一半伤害。
English: Grants bonus max health based on max mana. Attacks restore health, increasing based on missing health. The attacked unit takes damage based on the healed amount, with nearby enemies taking half.

SChinese: %每百分比生命损失伤害加成：
指定一个敌方单位，在一定时间内大幅削减魔抗。
English: Byakuren greatly reduces the magic resistance of an enemy unit for a short time.

SChinese: 向目标位置滚动，滚球完毕后提攻击速度%duration%秒。
English: Quickly rolls towards the target location, granting increased attack speed for %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 指定一个单位，造成法术伤害，%wait_time%秒后令其再受到一次法术伤害，并沉默一段时间。\n若持续时间内，该单位进行任何施法，则完结时沉默会变成晕眩效果。
English:
Deals magical damage to a targeted enemy. After %wait_time% seconds, the target will be silenced.

If the target casts a spell before this triggers, they will be stunned instead when it does trigger.

SChinese:
被动：

每次施法完时，在自身附近范围震一次地，震地对敌方单位造成法术伤害并降低攻击力及移动速度，持续%duration%秒。\n

主动：

主动触发该效果，且该伤害量和范围2倍。
English:
Passive:

Causes the earth to shake underfoot, dealing damage and decreasing nearby enemy units' movement speed and attack damage whenever Chen casts an ability.\n

Active:

Manually triggers the passive effect with doubled damage and radius.

SChinese: 施展后每一下攻击敌方少女，橙的攻击力都会被提升。\n持续至橙%duration%秒内没有攻击任何敌方少女。
English:
After casting, each attack on an enemy girl increases Chen's overall attack damage.

Expires after not attacking any enemy girls for %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 受到物理伤害时，若来源既非小兵也非少女，则所受伤害降低%reduce%%%。
English: Reduces physical damage taken from buildings and neutral creeps by %reduce%%%.

SChinese: 重置所有基础技能冷却时间
English: Resets the cooldown of all other basic abilities.

SChinese: 造成的减速效果在持续时间内受到多次射击时不会刷新。
English: The slow inflicted is not refreshed for each hit during the effect.

SChinese: 伤害类型变为魔法，终极技能持续时间内，每次该技能成功造成伤害后，降低所有技能1秒CD。
指定一个目标范围，造出一个月形光圈封闭该范围内的声音，该范围内的敌方少女宣读符卡时，晕眩%stun_duration%秒并受到伤害。
English: Creates a moon-shaped aperture in the target area to block all sound within, stunning any girls who cast a spell while inside for %stun_duration% seconds and dealing damage.

SChinese: 对敌方单位攻击时，对附近当前生命值比例最少的敌方单位造成一次物理伤害， 降低目标攻击力4.0秒(可迭加3次)。
English: Whenever Luna Child attacks, she deals physical damage to a nearby enemy unit with the least current health percentage, and reduces the target's attack damage for %duration% seconds (stacking up to %debuff_max% times).

SChinese: 射出终结气旋，将直线范围内的声音收缩到完全无音的程度，令敌人耳觉痛楚造成巨额伤害。每击中多一个单位，气旋伤害都会增加，露娜同时会增加5点敏捷，持续20秒。
English: Luna Child fires the cyclone that will end it all, compressing sound in a line straight ahead, bursting her enemies' eardrums and dealing significant damage. Each unit hit increases the cyclone's damage and grants Luna Child %agi_increase% agility for %duration% seconds.
Converts the damage type to magical.

SChinese: 消除声音令小地图上无法测见其位置。\n若%radius%范围内有敌方少女，则会在小地图上显形
English:
Silences sound around herself, preventing enemies from seeing her on the minimap.

Does not work while there is an enemy girl within %radius% range.

SChinese: 对周围造成一次冰霜爆破，对琪露诺周围的敌人造成伤害，并降低移动速度和攻击速度，冰霜爆破过的地面会变成冰冻的地面。
English: Releases a freezing blast around herself, dealing damage and slowing the movement and attack speed of affected enemies. The blast also creates a patch of ice within its area of effect.

SChinese: 琪露诺摔倒在地。\n如果摔倒在冰面上，会引爆冰面并对冰面上的敌方单位造成伤害，冰面的破碎可以传递到相连的其他冰面上，如果没有传递则再造成眩晕。\n如果没有摔倒在冰面上，则对自己造成眩晕。
English:
Cirno trips and falls flat onto her face. If she falls onto ice, it shatters, causing a chain reaction that further shatters nearby patches of ice, dealing damage, stunning affected enemies, and allowing her to get up instantly.

If she does not fall onto any ice, she will instead stun herself for %stun_self_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 向前方放出一阵冰瀑，对触碰到的敌人造成伤害和减速。冰瀑经过的地域会被冻为冰面。
English: Shoots out a torrent of icicles, dealing damage to affected enemies and slowing their movement. Leaves behind patches of ice along the affected area.

SChinese:
琪露诺快速旋转，引起一次巨大的风暴，每秒对周围敌方单位造成伤害和减速。
被风暴减速达到一定次数的单位会被冻结，持续到「Diamond Blizzard」结束。如果被冻结单位所在冰面破碎，被冰冻的敌人额外受到冻结伤害并解除冰冻状态。
风暴持续时间内琪露诺增加移速，可以移动和攻击，移动过的路径会变成冰冻的地面，持续时间结束后，笨蛋会摔倒在地，使一定范围内的冰面瞬间破碎。
驱散类型：弱驱散
English:
Cirno beings spinning rapidly, whipping up a blizzard around herself. The blizzard continuously deals damage to nearby enemies and slows their movement.

If they are affected enough times, they will be frozen until the spell ends. When patches of ice shatter around frozen units, they will also shatter and receive additional damage.

During the blizzard, Cirno gains spell immunity, is able to move and attack normally, and continously creates patches of ice around her. Once it ends, the idiot trips and falls, shattering the ice beneath her and starting a chain reaction.

SChinese: 每次攻击会让敌方少女降低%intellect_bonus%点智力，并根据（敌方智力-自身智力）造成魔法伤害。降低智力的debuff持续%intellect_duration%秒，可叠加。当敌方智力低于自身智力时，会造成%intellect_stun%秒的眩晕，然后清除所有削减智力的debuff。
English:
Cirno's attacks reduce the target's intelligence by %intellect_bonus% and deal additional damage equal to the difference of the target's intelligence and herself. The debuff lasts %intellect_duration% seconds and stacks.

If an affected enemy's intelligence falls below her own due to this effect, they will be stunned for %intellect_stun% seconds and the debuff is removed.

SChinese: 扔出一团火焰到目标地点，随后迷惑范围内的少女并使其向中心移动。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Clownpiece throws a decoy at the target area, hypnotizing enemy units and gathering them to the center of decoy.\nCast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese: 万宝槌效果：增加120作用范围，加快牵引速度至3倍，减少1秒冷却时间
English: Radius increased by 120, pulls 3 times as fast, and -1s cooldown.

SChinese: 使一个目标被火圈包围，火圈会追踪目标，敌方在靠近火圈时会持续受到伤害。该目标冲出火圈一定距离后火圈消失，如果是敌人还会使其眩晕并受到伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n冲出半径：%break_distance%
English: Clownpiece surrounds a unit with an infernal ring. The ring follows the target and deals damage to enemies inside the ring. If the ring was cast on an enemy girl and she exits the ring by moving too quickly, blinking, or teleporting away, she will take damage and be stunned.
Girls which move more than 1800 units instantly will not get stunned.

SChinese: %max_distance%距离以上的位移不会造成眩晕
主动：大幅加强自身下一次攻击的威力，使下一次攻击对目标及周围单位造成基于目标最大生命值的伤害和眩晕。\n被动：每次攻击会使目标持续受到伤害。
English:
Active:

Clownpiece enchants her torch, making her next attack stun and deal damage to the target and enemies around them based on the maximum health of the target.\n

Passive:

Clownpiece burns enemies with every attack she makes, dealing damage.

SChinese: 使一片区域污秽，每秒使其范围内敌人失去生命值，在此%radius%范围内使用技能的敌方少女会受到数倍于消耗魔法值的魔法伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Clownpiece summons an abyss of impurity in a target area. Enemy units inside will take significant damage every second. Enemy girls which cast spells while inside will take additional damage based on the mana they consumed.\nRadius:%radius%\nCast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese: 妖精是自然的显现，所以是无处不在的。\n使用后让大妖精闪烁至目标单位或树木的旁边，并恢复大妖精%heal%生命值。闪烁到敌方单位身边时附带一次普通攻击。\n目标为队友时，治疗其%heal%生命并减少该技能一半冷却时间。
English: Fairies represent some aspect of nature, so they are everywhere.\nBlink to the target unit or tree and heal Daiyousei by %heal%. Deal a physical attack if it is an enemy, or heal the target by %heal% and half the cooldown of this spell if it is an ally.

SChinese: 附带的普通攻击会触发【妖精的节奏】，之后再为【妖精的节奏】进行充能。
English: This attack triggers the effect of「Rhythm of Fairy」, then charge for it.

SChinese: 虽然是用来约束妖精的，不过用在不是妖精的身上好像更有威力。\n对附近敌方单位造成物理伤害并缠绕该单位%duration%秒。
English: The constraint is much more powerful fighting with those who are not Fairies, though it is formulated to constrain Fairies at first.\nDeal damage to enemies nearby and root them for %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 大妖精管理妖精的同时，也要保护妖精不被袭击。\n在目标少女身上施加一个护盾，在%duration%秒内增加该少女的攻击力及护甲。
English: Daiyousei protects fairies from assault while managing them.\nGuard the target ally girl with a shield, providing bonus damage and armor.The shield lasts for %duration% seconds.

SChinese:
大妖精算是比较高级的妖精，所以没有一定的能力的人是无法看见的。
大妖精向附近所有敌方单位射出弹幕，对被击中单位施加附带额外物理伤害的普通攻击。
射出弹幕后大妖精会隐藏自己于自然之中(高级隐身无法被敌方看到)，持续%duration%秒。
隐身不会被中断，直至持续时间结束。
English:
Daiyousei is high-level, so she cannot be found by ordinary people.
Shoot enemies nearby, dealing a physical attack and bonus physical damage.
Then hide in the nature for %duration% seconds.(invisible)
The invisibility won't break off until lasting for the whole duration.

SChinese: 先触发【妖精的节奏】，再为其充能。
大妖精举她的战镰收割周身的敌人，将他们定身并造成基于攻击力的致命伤害。攻击少女时会获得更高的致命一击倍率。
English: Daiyousei sickles enemies nearby, rooting them and dealing critical damage based in Daiyousei's damage.Bonus damage when attacking girls.

SChinese: 大妖精将妖精的节奏放在攻击敌人上，每次大妖精%aura_radius%范围内的友方少女施法后，大妖精的下一次普通攻击将附加（[大妖精攻击力-目标攻击力]*%damage_percent%%%）物理伤害。\n若目标攻击力高于大妖精攻击力，则不造成附加伤害。\n大妖精会获得视野范围内所有树木周围%radius%码的视野。（大妖精的视野依然会被树木阻挡）
English: Daiyousei focus the rhythm of fairy on attacking enemies, dealing bonus ([Daiyousei's damage - the target's damage]*%damage_percent%%%) in attack after spells from ally girls within %aura_radius%.\nIf Daiyousei's damage is less than the target's, no bonus damage will be dealt.\nDaiyousei earn sight within %radius% of the trees in Daiyousei's sight. (Daiyousei's sight still be blocked by trees.)

SChinese: 输入(-daiyousei01 或者 -daiyousei02)更换衣装
无法叠加。\n攻击建筑和友方单位时不触发。\n即使攻击目标的攻击力比自身高也会消耗掉这个效果，此时不造成额外伤害。
English: Cannot stack.\nDon't work when attacking on buildings or allies.\nThe effect will be consumed even if Daiyousei's damage is less than the target's, dealing no bonus damage in this situation.

SChinese: 射出一支绑定著药剂的箭矢。当击中第一个少女时，箭矢会撤出气雾。气雾在4秒内对范围友方有治疗效果，对敌方则会造成治疗效果等量的法术伤害。被命中的目标是友方单位的情况下，会回復额外血量。被命中的目标是敌方单位的情况下，会造成额外纯粹伤害并眩晕。眩晕时间随永琳与目标的距离的上升而上升，每150码增加%stun_duration%秒眩晕时间。（最多眩晕2秒）
English:
Eirin shoots an arrow with a potion attached. When the arrow hits a girl, the potion shatters and releases its contents as a mist which heals allies and deals damage to enemies for 4 seconds.

If the arrow hit an ally, it will heal them by an extra amount on impact. If they are an enemy, it will deal damage and stun them. The stun duration increases by %stun_duration% seconds for every 150 units that the arrow travels, for a maximum of 2 seconds.

SChinese: 所谓的生命游戏，指的是一种模拟生物生老病死过程的游戏。
击中目标瞬间造成 (箭矢飞行距离÷1000+1.75) 倍永琳智力的伤害/治疗效果。
English: On impact, increases the healing or damage dealt to the primary target based on Eirin's intelligence. For each point of intelligence, the damage is increased by (1.75 + distance travelled / 1000).

SChinese: 指定一个友方单位，隐藏在虚伪之月下保护（隐身），保护期间得到额外智力及攻击力。\n对已有效果的单位再次使用不会隐形。
English:
Hides an enemy under a false moon, granting them invisibility and increasing their intelligence and attack damage for the duration.

If the target already has the effect, it will not grant them invisibility.

SChinese: 制造一瓶蓬莱之药。服用者会即时回复一定量的生命值，并在一定时间内获得不老不死效果。拥有不老不死效果者首次死亡将瞬间恢复至满血。
English: Administers a dose of said legendary elixir to the target ally. Heals the target instantly and then grants them temporary immortality. The immortality is consumed the first time the target dies, restoring them back to full health instantly.

SChinese: 不老不死的那次回复效果不会受到治疗增益/减益的影响。
English: The full health revival of the immortality effect is not affected by healing amplification or reduction.

SChinese: 指定一个友方单位，为其持续回复生命，期间若其生命值已满则使其兴奋，提升攻速和移速。\n会被来自少女的伤害打断效果。
English:
Targets a friendly unit to restore their health over time. If the target's health is already full, they will instead gain bonus attack and movement speed.

Taking damage from an enemy girl will interrupt the effect.

SChinese: 在目标点落下一个痕迹。这个痕迹会因敌人的靠近而消失，在消失前产生一个幽魂对敌人造成伤害并且使其在一段时间内致盲，持续时间内多次被幽魂命中可叠加致盲效果并刷新时间。
English: Set an imprint at the targeted location. The imprint will disappear when an emeny approach it, then leave a wraith aiming at the enemy, dealing magical damage and blind when the wraith touchs her.The missing probability of blind can be superposed, and the duration can be refreshed if the enemy is touched by wraiths in the duration again.

SChinese: 在自身四周召唤光粒。任何靠近光粒的敌人都将被弹开，受到伤害并损失魔法，每次光粒被触发会自减1次摧毁所需次数。
English: Summon lights around Ellen. Enemies who touch the light will be bounced, suffering magical damage and losing mana. The light can be destroyed by several times of physical attack, and the health of lights reduces by 1 every triggered as well.

SChinese: 没有回家的路，也没有属于我的地方。
English: No way to home, and no shelter for me, either.
Times of attack needed for destory:

SChinese: 向前方发射一个光波，光波会沉默并伤害接触到的敌人。光波存在时，技能被替换为「Vacant Pulse」
English: Shoot a light wave towards the targeted direction, silencing and damaging enemies touched.This skill will be replaced by 「Vacant Pulse」when the light wave is on the way.

SChinese: 永远不知道明天会发生什么。
English: What will happen tomorrow is impossible to know forever.
Cannot work with「Knock Out In Three Steps」.
Make the light wave shines to bounce enemies.

SChinese: 容易实现的那不算梦想。
English: It cannot be called a 'dream' if it's too easy to achieve.

SChinese: 将负面能量集中释放，对直线上的敌人造成伤害，负面能量会在%stack_duration%秒后再次爆发，每积累多一层，伤害便会翻倍。
English: Release negative energy amassed towards a straight line, dealing magical damage to enemies touched. The negative energy will attach to enemies effected, and burst in %stack_duration% seconds.Every negative energy stacked will double the burst damage.

SChinese: 烦恼 就是记性太好。
English: It's an annoyance for me to have a excessively strong memory.
Darkness Sign「Dark Side of the Moon」

SChinese: 露米娅使目标陷入一片黑暗之中，目标单位任何动作不显影且获得闪避能力。\n对敌释放时还将会将目标沉默缴械，持续时间为黑暗持续时间的一半。
English: Rumia hides her target in a cloud of shadows, making it invisible and increasing it's evasion. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal itself.\nDisarm and silence the target for half the duration if it is an enemy.

SChinese: 虽然目标的动作不会令她显形，但是真视视野仍然可以发现她。
露米娅大肆收割周围血肉，提高攻击速度，并且普通攻击能造成额外的溅射伤害，造成额外伤害的50%%会治疗自身。
English: Rumia reaps flesh around wantonly, granting bonus attack speed and cleave on attack(causes permanent damage). Rumia heals herself by 50%% of the damage made by cleave.

SChinese: 露米娅获得的回复量是基于额外税前伤害的一半，目标实际受到的伤害与露米娅获得的回复无关。
English: Damage taken by enemies in reality does nothing with healing.

SChinese: 露米娅在%duration%秒内持续引导一个诡异的护盾，吸收%block_constant%伤害后破碎。护盾破碎会对自身周围的敌人造成伤害和%stuntime%秒眩晕，同时恢复自身魔法值。
English: Rumia channelling a weird shield which can absorb %block_constant% damage for %duration% seconds. Enemies around will take damage and be stunned for %stuntime% seconds if the shield breaks, while Rumia will restore mana.

SChinese:
露米娅先对目标少女发动一次宏伟终结，造成魔法伤害，之后冲向目标打出一次无法闪避的暴击。
冲刺期间不会被击晕，无视地形。失去目标后将结束状态。
目标少女会因其罪孽而痛苦不堪，期间降低所有伤害，若状态持续期间目标死亡则恢复露米娅最大生命值的25%%
对少于35%%生命值的少女造成双倍伤害。
English:
Rumia launches a grand shutdown to the target enemy girl, dealing damage to her, then dashes towards her and cause an unevadable critical attack.
Be able to pass impassable terrain and won't be stunned while dashing.
The target girl suffering for her sins, damage casued reduced. Rumia will heal herself by 25%% of max health if the target dies in the duration.
Deals double damage to girls whose health percentage is less than 35%%.

SChinese: 食罪造成的伤害减少debuff是通过造成伤害后给予一定治疗实现的，换言之，影响治疗效果的装备和技能会对这个debuff的实际效果产生影响。
English: Heal amplification and reducing influence the actual effect of damage casued reducing.

SChinese: 食罪对35%%生命以下的目标少女造成一倍额外伤害；普攻%chance%%%触发食罪。
English: Deals double damage to girls whose health percentage is less than 35%%; Rumia has %chance%%% chance to spell Sin Devouring on each attack.

SChinese: 夜间获得%speed%%%攻击力和移速加成
English: Get %speed%%% attack damage and attack speed bonus at night.
Flandre employs devilish powers to create clones of herself which inherit some of her abilities.
A Spell Card where she clones herself, then attacks wherever she wants.

SChinese:
芙兰们每次攻击将使敌人获得莱瓦汀叠层，降低移动速度及攻击速度。

当目标达到最大叠层时，芙兰们对目标的下次攻击将移除所有叠层造成额外物理伤害，如果目标为少女还会施加毁灭状态，使其长时间受到普通攻击伤害加深。
English: Whenever Flandre attacks, she inflicts <font color='#aa2116'>Laevateinn</font>, a stacking attack speed and movement speed slow. If the target reaches the stack limit, the next attack they take from Flan will remove all stacks to deal extra damage. If they are a girl, they will also be inflicted with <font color='#FF0000'>Ruin</font>, which causes them to take even more damage from attacks.

SChinese: 移除叠层的那次攻击仍然将继续附加一个新的叠层
English: The attack which removes the Laevateinn stacks will still inflict a new one.

SChinese: 每次移除叠层刷新毁灭的持续时间
English: Ruin does not stack, but is refreshed when reinflicted.

SChinese: 使芙兰的物理攻击带有吸血效果。

将接下来的力量爆发。芙兰回收所有分身，下1[+回收分身量]次攻击必定暴击。

持续期间获得移速加成，并且每损失1%的生命值都将获得额外加成。
English:
Flandre goes on a rampage. She will return all her clones and illusions to absorb their power.

Causes the next %attack_count% attacks to be a guaranteed critical hit, increased by 1 for each clone or illusion consumed.

She also gains a movement speed bonus for the duration, increasing based on missing health.

SChinese: %每损失1%生命值获得额外移速：
技能持续期间，每次击杀任何目标都将获得%invisible_time%秒隐身。
English: For the duration of the skill, each kill she makes on any unit grants invisibility for %invisible_time% seconds.

SChinese: 所有自己造成的伤害都会提升%increase_damage%%%。
English: Amplifies all damage Flandre deals by %increase_damage%%%.

SChinese: 输入指令-cloth X，X为变换衣装的数字。
English: Enter the command '-cloth X' where X is a number to change skins.

SChinese: 对攻击距离内指定敌人造成眩晕和伤害，施法距离与攻击距离成正比。最低为基础攻击距离，最高为合计攻击距离的5/7。\n若一段伤害结算后敌人生命值低于50%%，在冷却结束之前处于目标%distance%范围内可以对继续使用二段技能，使目标持续失血，持续%duration%秒
English: Deals damage to target enemy and stuns her.\nAfter that, if her health percentage is less than 50%% and distance between you is less than %distance%, you can trigger this before the end of duration to bleed her for %duration% seconds.\nCast Range: 5/7 of Attack range

SChinese: 园中各样树上的果子你们可以随意吃。只是分别善恶树上的果子你们不可吃，因为你吃的日子必死。
English: ...And the Lord God gave the man orders, saying, You may freely take of the fruit of every tree of the garden: But of the fruit of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil you may not take; for on the day when you take of it, death will certainly come to you.

SChinese: 主动：使莱瓦汀附上火焰，增加总攻击力，获得吸血能力，攻击间隔降低至1.5。\n被动：增加攻击距离。
English: Active: Adds fire to Laevateinn to get bonus attack damage and ability of lifesteal, while the base attack time decreases to 1.5.\nPassive: Increase attack range.

SChinese: 杀死树上的雄鸡，终结长鸣的警告，诸神之黄昏由此开始！

芙兰朵露获得积蓄血焰的能力，随着血焰的积累，芙兰朵露将不断变强；
突破200层后芙兰朵露可以嗅到空气中的血腥味。
随着血腥味的加重，芙兰朵露将不断加速；
若失血目标血量低于40%，芙兰朵露将获得她的视野。
English:
Flandre is able to accumulate BLOOD and get stronger by this way.
Flandre can smell the smell of blood in the air after the BLOOD stacks over 200.
Flandre speeds up continuously with the smell of blood getting strong.
If an enemy girl's health falls below 40%%, she will gain vision and True Sight of that girl.

SChinese: 所以弟兄们，我以神的慈悲劝你们，将身体献上，当作活祭，是圣洁的，是神所喜悦的，你们如此侍奉，乃是理所当然的。不要效法这个世界，只要心意更新而变化，叫你们察验何为神的善良、纯全、可喜悦的旨意。
English: ...For this reason I make request to you, brothers, by the mercies of God, that you will give your bodies as a living offering, holy, pleasing to God, which is the worship it is right for you to give him. And let not your behaviour be like that of this world, but be changed and made new in mind, so that by experience you may have knowledge of the good and pleasing and complete purpose of God.

SChinese: 开启后每秒消耗自身血量，获得伤害减免，受到伤害后使用一次回旋斩。\n伤害范围为当前攻击距离，伤害为攻击力 x 系数\n两种效果同时只能拥有一个，触发间隔：%cooldown%s
English:
Costs health continuously to reduce damage taken and perform a helix counter attack when taking damage.
Radius: equal to attack range
Damage: %percent%%% of attack damage
Cannot work with「Starbow Break」or in %cooldown% seconds again.

SChinese: 神所要的祭，就是忧伤的灵。
English: The offerings of God are a broken spirit;...

SChinese: 开启后每秒消耗自身血量，攻击时附带一次回旋斩。\n伤害范围为当前攻击距离，伤害为攻击力 x 系数\n两种效果同时只能拥有一个，触发间隔：%cooldown%s
English:
Costs health continuously and performs a helix counter on attacks.
Radius: equal to attack range
Damage: %percent%%% of attack damage
Cannot work with「Catadioptric」or in %cooldown% seconds again.

SChinese: 神啊，忧伤痛悔的心，你必不轻看。
English: ...a broken and sorrowing heart, O God, you will not put from you.
Secret Barrage「And Then Will There Be None?」

SChinese:
主动

冲刺到目标身旁发动一次攻击，时间将短暂陷入黑暗。\n

被动

在夜间获得额外生命回复和暴击能力。
English:
Active:

Dash to the target and perform an attack.Turns daytime into nighttime for its duration.\n

Passive:

Get bonus health regen and critical chance at night.

SChinese: 恶人献祭，为耶和华所憎恶；正直人祈祷，为他所喜悦。
English: The offering of the evil-doer is disgusting to the Lord, but the prayer of the upright man is his delight.

SChinese: 用智商换取大量的属性，准备时间结束后将举行被禁止的游戏。
English: Get numerous attribute in the cost of losing mind. Plays Forbidden Games after the preparation.

SChinese: 亚当生塞特之后，又在世八百年，并且生儿养女。\n他们被吩咐要 “生养众多，遍满全地”。
English: ...And after the birth of Seth, Adam went on living for eight hundred years, and had sons and daughters:...\nThey are commanded to be fertile and have increase, and make the earth full and be masters of it.

SChinese: 取材「姬海棠果的取材练习」

被动：

增加果的移动速度，不与扫把类装备移速叠加。\n

主动：

利用天狗高速的能力，高速移动至目标位置。
English:
Passive:

Increases movement speed (does not stack with brooms).\n

Active:

Uses the natural abilities of the tengu to blink to the target position.

SChinese: 基础伤害与念写额外伤害：
嘿嘿美少女写真，嘶哈嘶哈
短时间内提升自己的攻击速度%attack_speed_Tooltip%，以进行高速连环快拍。\n提升的攻击速度会随时间渐降。
English: Increases attack speed by %attack_speed_Tooltip% for a short time to take a quick-fire series of photos. Decreases gradually over time.

SChinese: 触发效果所需攻击次数：
结束一天的取材，快速传送返回家中\n施法需时2.0秒。
English: Hatate decides to end her photo gathering session for the day and return home.\nTakes %duration% seconds to cast, but she is invulnerable for the duration.

SChinese: 厄神为目标单位创造出流刑人形,用来转移灾祸。\n友方受到的伤害全部转嫁到一个人偶上。
English: Hina makes an exiled doll to shift disasters from the target ally.\nThe doll takes damage instead of the target.

SChinese: 施法目标为自己的时候将会对自身造成伤害，但是流刑人形也会对自身周围%wanbaochui_radius%码范围内的友方少女生效。自身受到的伤害为%wanbaochui_damage%%%最大生命值 * 队友流刑人形的数量。
English: Causes「Exiled Doll」to become an AoE ability whose radius is %wanbaochui_radius%. But deals damage by (numbers of ally girls affected * %wanbaochui_damage%%% of your max health) to yourself when cast.

SChinese:
将数个敌方单的命运绑在一起,其中一人受到伤害,其他所单位都将感受厄运的一部分。

可以对自己释放
English: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.\nCan target yourself and bind yourself with enemies.

SChinese: 让敌人失去神的护佑，对该单位造成伤害，同时让该单位受到伤害时效果扩大。
English: Deprives an enemy of Gods' bless and deals damage to her. Amplifies subsequent damage taken.

SChinese: 转转神加速旋转,在%duration%秒内周围厄运(伤害)将全部转化能厄神的能量，并且所有敌方单位会被吸引而难以逃离转转，转转储存的厄运越多，引力越强。\n在结束时,所有厄运将会被瞬间释放出去对周围敌人击晕并造成伤害，之后,厄神转转会因为转晕而晕眩倒地%end_stun_time%秒。
English: Hina spins, accumulating energy with damage nearby for %duration% seconds. Enemies will be pulled to Hina in the duration. The pull speed grows with the energy stored growing.\nAt the end of duration, Hina will unleash all energy stored, stunning and dealing damage to enemies nearby. Then Hina will be stunned for %end_stun_time% seconds because of dizziness.

SChinese: 厄符「厄神大人的生理节律」
English: Misfortune Sign「Biorhythm of the Misfortune God」

SChinese: 通过旋转获得能量！%duration%秒后根据旋转的圈数获得生命、魔法、移动速度和攻击速度。
English: Strengthens yourself by spin! In %duration% seconds, grants heal, mana restore, movement speed bonus and attack speed bonus baced on circles turned.

SChinese: 旋转方向为逆时针，需手动旋转。
English: The rotation direction is counterclockwise, need manual rotation.

SChinese: 转转将身边的厄运化对自身的护盾,每%refresh_time%秒转转身上得到一个可抵挡基于生命值上限的护盾。\n若护盾未满会开始刷新护盾计时。
English: Hina transforms misfortune around to a shield whose health is based on Hina's max health every %refresh_time% seconds.\nCannot stack.

SChinese: 使身上环绕风和电。持续消耗魔法增加攻速与移速及电击伤害。
English: Electrify and gain extra Attack Damage, Movement and Attack Speed. Toggled, saps Mana.

SChinese: 衣玖在自己的羽衣附上强力的电场，在4.5秒内强化自身的护甲、魔抗，并击退靠近的敌人。但是期间基础移动速度会降低至220。
English: Charge up your wonder robes with static electricity which boosts your defences and zaps enemies away, but also slows your base Movement Speed to 220. Lasts for %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 攻击有几率放出一道闪电链对目标和其身边3个敌方单位造成法术伤害，并且所有被电击的单位都会往衣玖方向牵引。 \n被击中时死亡后不要立即买活。
English: General attacks have a chance to release a chain lightning at the target and %num% nearby enemies that deals magic damage and pulls them closer.
Heaven Sign「The Drill That Penetrates the Heavens」

SChinese:
聚合大量气流并电离，形成一个全宇宙最强的雷刃钻头。
被钻头触到的敌方单位会受到魔法伤害，并且在一定时间内无法动弹且附加不可驱散的感电状态，攻击处于感电状态中的单位时，可以无视条件触发「光龙的吐息」。
（钻头尖端部分无法造成效果）
扇面角度：45
English: Form up said legendary weapon in a massive spiral of rarefied air and high-voltage currents. Deals damage to enemies inside and boosts the chance of「Dragon God's Sigh」to 100%% on attacking them.

SChinese: 从上空向任意距离目标诱导，延迟1.7秒后落雷。\n每级增加10点伤害
English: Iku sends a thunder strike to the targeted location, deals damage and stuns enemies in the region in 2s' delay.\nDamage: 100+10*Iku's level+bonus lightning damage

SChinese: 电气的龙宫变为纯粹伤害，并且获得目标地点3s的视野。
English: 「Elekiter Dragon Palace」deals pure damage, providing visions of the target area for 3s.
Thunder Sign「Residence of the Thunder God」

SChinese: 摆出直指苍天的无双姿势。
施放后播放全图音效，根据当前所有敌方少女位置，1.7秒后进行250范围的天雷打击，击中后造成1s眩晕。\n天雷伤害=100+10*自身等级+电击伤害加成
English: Iku sends thunder strikers to each enemy girls' location. It has 1.7s delay. Enemies hit will be stunned for 1s and take pure damage.\nDamage: 100+10*Iku's level+bonus lightning damage

SChinese: 向前跳跃，对跳跃到位置的地方进行一次斩击，造成范围伤害。\n天生强化：释放后刷新冷却。

被动：

增加%add_damage%点敏捷，孤独状态下这个被动效果翻倍。\n

主动：

影狼吼出一个冲击波对波及到的单位造成伤害，连续受到技能伤害每次递减%reduce%%% ,最少受到%reduce_min%%% 的伤害。\n天生强化：宽度长度和判定都得以强化，并附加减速。

被动：

使得攻击有%stun_chance%% 的概率击晕目标%stun_time%秒。\n

主动：

影狼化为狼型持续%active_time%秒，大幅提升肉体强度，并且下一次攻击必定触发眩晕，并且造成眩晕时恢复%health_regen%的生命值。\n天生强化：主动使用时瞬间恢复%health_val%+最大生命值 * %health_ratio%%% 的生命。

向一个方向猛冲，如果这个技能抓中一个敌方少女，则在一顿猛烈的攻击后造成巨大伤害并眩晕%stun_time%秒。如果这个技能未命中敌方少女，则延迟%delay_time%秒后在路径上炸裂出一道道抓痕造成范围伤害。
天生强化：双倍前冲距离。
范围：%len% * %damage_radius%
伤害：%damage_const%+敏捷*%damage_ratio%
一旦抓住目标，影狼就会进入无敌状态，直到敌人落地。
English: Once she has grabbed a target, she will not let go unless she dies.

SChinese: 友方少女的幻象不会影响影狼的孤独状态。
English: Illusions of allied girls do not affect Lone Wolf.
Impossible Request「Bullet Branch of Hourai -Rainbow Danmaku-」

SChinese: 消耗一定生命值使用蓬莱玉枝连续放出七色的弹幕，从右手边开始旋转，对范围内的敌方单位造成法术伤害。\n每次命中敌方单位，即可在下次命中时增加1倍额外伤害，效果可以叠加。
English:
Kaguya uses said relic to call down multiple pillars of light around her in a clockwise pattern to deal damage to nearby enemies.

Deals stacking increased damage every time you hit the same unit with another pillar.

SChinese: 这个技能可以用来自杀。
English: Can be used to deny yourself.

SChinese:
虹色的弹幕根据命中次数分别给敌人施加负面状态，每个负面状态持续3秒。
1次：降低30点攻击；
2次：降低30点攻击速度；
3次：降低15%%魔抗；
4次：降低30%%移动速度；
5次：附加70%%几率攻击丢失；
6次：使目标沉默，自身回复30%%最大魔法值；
7次：缠绕目标，并额外造成20%%最大生命值的伤害。
English:
Pillars apply debuffs to affected enemies depending on the number of pillars have hit them, each one lasting 3 seconds.
First: 30 attack damage reduction
Second: 30 attack speed slow
Third: 15%% magic resistance reduction
Fourth: 30%% movement speed slow
Fifth: 70%% miss chance
Sixth: silences enemies and restores 30%% of your max mana
Seventh: roots enemies and deals and additional 20%% of their max HP as magical damage

SChinese:
辉夜召唤自己信赖的宝具为自己战斗：
神宝「Brilliant Dragon Bullet」（耀眼的龙玉）
--此物品下辉夜获得额外的视野：%day_vision% 
神宝「Buddhist Diamond」（佛体的金刚石）
--此物品下辉夜获得额外的防御力。 增加护甲：%armor%
神宝「Salamander Shield」（火蜥蜴之盾）
--此物品下辉夜获得一个小范围的献祭 献祭范围：%shield_radius% 献祭伤害：%damage%
神宝「Life Spring Infinity」（无限的生命之泉）
--此物品下辉夜及周围单位的生命恢复速度提升 范围：%infinity_radius% 生命恢复提升：%health_regen%
English:
Kaguya summons one of her divine treasures to aid her in battle.

Divine Treasure「Brilliant Dragon Bullet」

%day_vision% increased vision.

Divine Treasure「Buddhist Diamond」

%armor% bonus armor.

Divine Treasure「Salamander Shield」

Deals %damage% damage to enemies within %shield_radius% range every second.

Divine Treasure「Life Spring Infinity」

Grants %health_regen% bonus health regeneration to yourself and allies within %infinity_radius% range.

SChinese:
被动：

黑夜中，辉夜用自己操纵永远和须臾的能力，极大的提高自身的魔法恢复速度，游戏时间越长，恢复速度越快。\n

主动：

将世界变为黑夜。\n黑夜持续时间：60秒。
English:
Passive:

Grants extra mana regeneration at night. Increases further for every %increase_time% seconds since the game started. \n

Active:

Turns daytime into nighttime for 60 seconds.

SChinese: 消耗一定生命值用蓬莱的玉枝中储存的魔法造出无尽的树海并幻化成七色的弹幕。\n在目标地点释放一个会旋转的弹幕，旋转范围会慢慢变大，被弹幕击中的单位会造成伤害和眩晕。旋转的范围和蓬莱的玉枝中储存的魔法值大小有关。最大范围1000。
English:
Kaguya releases the power stored within her Jewelled Branch to create an ocean of trees which transform into rainbow danmaku.

Creates a rotating barrage of danmaku at the target location which slowly grows larger over time. Enemies caught inside take damage and are stunned repeatedly.

The maximum radius increases based on the number of Jewelled Branch stacks, from a minimum of 300 range at 0 stacks to 1000 range at the max of 700 stacks (any further stacks do not count).

SChinese: 辉夜对自己施以永远的魔法，以使得自己永生不灭。辉夜的魔法值会不断的转化为生命值，直到魔法耗尽。消耗的魔法会作为魔力储存在蓬莱的玉枝中，但会不断流失（每秒流失等同于最大魔法值4%%的魔力）。
English: Kaguya's ability to manipulate eternity makes her practically immortal, converting mana to health whenever she takes damage. Consumed mana is stored in the Jewelled Branch of Hourai, but these charges diminish by 4%% of her max mana per second.

SChinese: 这个效果不是治疗，不会受治疗效果提升/降低类效果的影响。\n最多存储700点魔力。
English: This effect is not considered healing, and healing amplification/reduction effects do not affect it.
The bonus damage affects all damage instances of this spell.
The passive component damages enemies before damage is taken from whatever triggered it.

Summon Koutei to breathe fire and ice in the area in front of Kasen.\n

Fire:

Burns the ground within %cast_range% range for %duration% seconds, dealing %damage% damage per second and slowing down enemies by %slow_down%%%.

The debuff lingers for %interval_duration% seconds.\n

Ice:

Freeze everything within %cast_range% range in front of Kasen for %stun_duration% seconds.
I present to you the Dual Breath of thd~

SChinese:
站立不动%duration%秒并吸收接下来受到的一切攻击，%absorb_pct%%%转化为对自己的治疗并从中获得增益。

每受到100点伤害增加%strength_bonus%%%力量和%attack_speed_bonus%攻击速度。

在结束时对周围%radius%码内敌方单位造成眩晕和2倍力量伤害.
English:
Stand still for %duration% seconds and absorb all damage taken. Converts %absorb_pct%%% of the damage suffered into self healing and empowers herself.

Gains %strength_bonus%%% strength and %attack_speed_bonus% attack speed for every 100 damage absorbed.

Afterwards, deals 2 times her strength as damage to enemies within %radius% range and stuns them for %stun_duration% seconds.

SChinese:
在%duration%秒内提升%move_speed_bonus%%%移速，对自身%radius%范围敌人施加影响。\n

对直视的敌人减速

降低攻击速度：%slow%
降低移动速度：%slow%%%
降低转身速度：%slow%%%\n

若敌人共超过%face_duration%秒直视，则被石化

石化时间：%stone_duration%
石化单位受到额外伤害：%bonus_damage%%%
每次单位被石化，对华扇进行一次强驱散。
English:
Increases her movement speed by %move_speed_bonus%%% for %duration% seconds.

During this time, enemies which face Kasen will be slowed by %slow% attack speed, %slow%%% move speed and %slow%%% turn rate. If they continue to face her for %face_duration% seconds, they will become petrified and turn to stone for %stone_duration% seconds.

Petrified units receive %bonus_damage%%% more damage.

Whenever a unit is petrified, Kasen receives a strong dispel.

SChinese: 华扇扔出一根绷带，绷带触碰到敌人少女后将束缚并拉回少女，拉回后对少女造成伤害和眩晕。\n华扇将少女拉回后若<font color='#FFFFFF'>1000</font>范围内存在影华扇，影华扇会瞬移到少女身旁。
English: Launches a Monkey's Paw toward a location. The Monkey's Paw will snag the first enemy hero girl it encounters, dragging the girl back to Kasen, dealing damage and stunning the girl. If Shadown Kasen is within 1000 range of the girl then Shadow Kasen will blink to the girl.

SChinese: 茨木华扇与右手能产生共鸣，提升华扇和影华扇的攻速。\n影华扇造成伤害的%percent%%%将治疗华扇。
English: Links Kasen Ibaraki and her right hand, increasing the attack speed of both and causing %percent%%% damage dealt by the Shadow Kasen to heal Kasen Ibaraki.

SChinese: 需要在共鸣距离内才能成功合体。

解锁茨木童子之臂主动施法，与影华扇合体变成完全体，提升%attackRange%攻击距离，获得影华扇被动和攻速增益。
完全体生命值越低移速越快，最大获得%movespeed_bonus_max%%%移速提升。
每秒恢复%health_regen%%%损失生命值
English: Unlock Arm of Ibaraki-dōji. Kasen now could use Arm of Ibaraki-dōji to fuse together with shadow Kasen and change into complete state, gain the passive and attack speed bonus of Shadow Kasen and increase attack range by %attackRange%. The lower her health, the higher move speed bonus complete kasen would have, maximum move speed bonus is %block_damage_max%%%. Complete Kasen will regenerate %health_regen%%% of her missing health per second

SChinese: 茨木华扇能够吞噬野怪，获得额外金币。\n每吞噬一个野怪获得一点<font color='#DC143C'>力量</font>。\n开启<font color='#FFD700'>主动施法</font>将获得野怪技能。
English: Kasen Ibaraki consumes an neutral creep, gain extra gold, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.\n Every neutral creep consumed will give Kasen 1 extra strength.\n If autocast is deactivated, Kasen will not acquire the creep's abilities.
Shadow Kasen would also possess the abilities of neutral creep.

SChinese:
茨木华扇右臂化作华扇的样貌，召唤一个永久存在的影华扇。
影华扇继承部分全属性
若影华扇被消灭则华扇消失，若华扇被消灭则影华扇消失。
影华扇拥有随技能等级升级的额外技能。
技能等级大于<font color='#FFFFFF'>2</font>时影华扇继承野怪技能。
English:
The right arm of Kasen Ibaraki changes into the appearance of Kasen, becomes Shadow Kasen that exists permanently. 
 Shadow Kasen will only have %percent%%% attributes. 
 Kasen will die if Shadow Kasen dies. If Kasen dies then Shadow Kasen will also disappear. 
 Shadow Kasen will get extra abilities based on level of this ability.
Gold Bonus for killing shadow Kasen

SChinese: 完全体使用封印解除将结束合体。
English: If Kasen releases the seal in complete state, the complete state will automatically stop.
「The lnhuman Arm That Abandoned Virtue and Embraced Vice」

SChinese: 攻击时<font color='#FFFFFF'>25%%</font>概率造成%stuntime%秒眩晕和%damage%点<font color='#4169E1'>魔法伤害</font>
English: <font color='#FFFFFF'>25%%</font> chance to stun the target for %stuntime% seconds and deal %damage% bonus magical damage on hit.

SChinese: 攻击时<font color='#FFFFFF'>25%%</font>概率对正面锥形区域内敌人造成%outgoing_damagePercent%%%物理伤害
English: <font color='#FFFFFF'>25%%</font> chance to deal %outgoing_damagePercent%%% of physical damage on hit in a cone around the target.

SChinese: <font color='#FFD700'>万宝槌</font>：将华扇引导至影华扇位置进行合体。
English: Kasen blinks to the place of shadow Kasen to fuse together with Shadow Kasen.

SChinese: 影华扇为华扇分摊部分伤害。
English: Kasen would distribute partial damage to Shadow Kasen.

SChinese: 华扇向目标扔出一条绷带，缠绕对手限制行动造成持续伤害，对友军释放造成等量治疗。
绷带会额外对离目标300码范围内的最近目标生效，少女优先
华扇和她的右臂合二为一，获得鬼王的力量。力量提升%strength_bonus_pct%%，自身范围 %distance% 码内所有单位死亡会生成死士

指定一个目标，对其历史最初改变。
若是普通单位，会被直接吞噬(物理伤害)。
普通模式下，记录当前目标的生命值百分比，%duration%秒后，对其造成伤害或治疗让其生命值回到记录的值。
狂月模式下，记录当前目标的生命值百分比，%duration%秒后，对其造成伤害或治疗让其生命值与记录时的差距，额外提升%extra%%%。

慧音用自身的代价来换取和平。扣除慧音%percent_health%%%的现有生命值，在%invincible_duration%秒让自己无敌。
指定一个目标，
目标单位若为同盟，在%invincible_duration%秒让其无敌。
目标单位若为敌人，会造成敌人沉默与缴械%debuff_duration%秒。
English: Keine strives for peace in the cost of herself. Costs %percent_health%%% of current health to get invincible for %invincible_duration%s and-\n-grants invincibility to the target ally for %invincible_duration%s.\n-or silences and disarms the target enemy for %debuff_duration%s.
Land Sign「The Hidden Sacred Treasures - Head Hammer」

SChinese:
被动：神器

在攻击时有几率变成头槌攻击，头槌攻击时会造成额外的物理伤害并眩晕。\n

主动：头槌

即时移动到目标身边并发动效果，若该次伤害击杀少女，则此技能冷却重置。\n主动释放后%disable_time%秒内不会触发被动效果。
变成狂月模式，让慧音达至疯狂的能力。\n在狂月模式下，增加移动速度，主属性变成力量型，并直接增加力量值，刷新其余技能，头槌的前摇降低。
English: Assumes Keine's Hakutaku form, strengthening her into lunatic.\nRefreshes other abilities. Grants movement speed and strength. Turns Keine's primary attribute to strength.

SChinese: 死亡后的复活所需时间降低%keine_time%秒。该效果无法被破坏。
English: Reduce respawn timer by %keine_time%s. Cannot be broken.

SChinese: 技能效果变成全图光环，队友最多获得%wanbaochui_percent_time%%%减复活效果。
English: Global aura. Other ally girls' respawn timer reduction cannot exceed %wanbaochui_percent_time%%%.

SChinese: 向目标位置发出一颗鬼火，被击中%stun_radius%范围内的单位会受到伤害并眩晕%stun_duration%秒，之后鬼火会燃烧地面，对附近%damage_radius%范围内单位造成伤害，持续%duration%秒。
English: Shoot a will-o'-the-wisp towards the targeted location, dealing magical damage and %stun_duration% seconds' stun to the first enemy hit and enemies near her within %stun_radius%. Then the will-o'-the-wisp will burn the ground, dealing magical damage to enemies within %damage_radius% continuously. The will-o'-the-wisp lasts for %duration% seconds.
Well Bucket「Like a Moth to a Well」

SChinese: 指定一个位置，琪斯美会从该位置降落并造成范围性的物理伤害。\n越靠近中心点伤害越高。
English: Kisume hangs herself up, then strikes the targeted location and deals physical damage based on Kisume's damage to enemies nearby.\nEnemies who near to kisume will suffer more damage, and those who far to kisume will suffer less.
Bucket Sign「The Bucket with Strong Protection」

SChinese:
被动：

琪斯美的桶子能保护琪斯美，会降低琪斯美所承受的伤害。\n

主动：

对附近单位造成微量法术伤害，并获得基于护甲值的全伤害护盾，持续%duration%秒。
English:
Passive:

Kisume's bucket can give her protection, reducing damage suffered by Kisume.\n

Active:

Deal magical damage to enemies nearby, then block damage suffered by Kisume based on Kisume's armor for %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 以降低琪斯美的生命值至最大生命的%max_health%%%并在接下来的%duration%秒内受到治疗减少为代价，对周围造成巨大的爆炸，令%radius%范围内敌人受到巨额法术伤害。
English: Set Kisume's health to %max_health%%% of the max health and and reduces the healing Kisume could get in %duration% seconds to make an huge explosion, deal magical damage to enemies within %radius%.

SChinese: 将一个队友塞进自己的桶里，持续%duration%秒，时间内使用皿数燃尽将会造成双倍伤害，同时队友的血量也会降低。自己死亡或者持续时间到了会把队友弹射出去。\n\n队友可以自己出来。
为了防止误操作，队友1秒后才可以自己出来。
English: To avoid misoperation, the ally tucked cannot choose to get out by herself in the first 1 second.
Get a new skill:「Like a Moth to a Bucket」

SChinese: 琪斯美每%count%次施法的下一次施法，会附带%duration%秒眩晕，眩晕时间可以与其他技能叠加。
English: After %count% spells, kisume's next spell will stun targets effected for %duration% seconds. The stun duration can be superposed with kisume's other skills'.

SChinese: 发出火球对敌人造成伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Koakuma shoots a fire bomb to deal damage on enemy units.\nCast range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese: 常年侍奉帕秋莉令她能使用基础的法术。
English: She is the libririan for Patchouli.

SChinese: 对目标造成伤害并降低攻击速度和移动速度。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Koakuma shoots a fire bomb to deal damage on enemy units and slows down their move speed and attack speed.\nCast range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese: 闲时在图书馆习得的法术。
English: Koakuma learns magic in leisure time.

SChinese: 让小恶魔的技能击中目标时在目标700范围内弹射，每次弹射会降低伤害。\n每隔一定时间小恶魔会获得魔导书的魔力，提升下一次技能的弹道速度并降低冷却时间。
English: Koakuma makes her fire bombs bounce between enemy units in 700 range, each bounce makes its damage attenuated.\nAfter a short period of time, Koakuma increases the projectile speed of next fire bomb spell and reduces cool down.

SChinese: 令小恶魔的所有技能增加伤害，并且附加一定比例的范围伤害，但小恶魔自身也会受到更大伤害。
English: Koakuma gets strengthened from the firework of the Halloween, amplifies all damage she deals and deals area damage with fire bombs, but also takes more damage during the firework show.\nMiracle Millet:

SChinese: 小恶魔虽然是恶魔，但小恶魔还是会哭的。
死亡时释放加强版日符「皇家烈焰」，对%wanbaochui_damage_radius%范围内的所有敌方少女造成%wanbaochui_damage_percent%%%最大生命值的魔法伤害及%wanbaochui_stun_time%秒眩晕。
English: Koakuma a high level of Sun Sign「Royal Flare」on death, dealing %wanbaochui_damage_percent%%% of max HP as magical damage to enemy girls in %wanbaochui_damage_radius% range and stunning them for %wanbaochui_stun_time% second.

SChinese: 每缺少1%魔法值，增加0.15魔法回复速度
English: Every 1% of max mana Koakuma misses increases 0.15 mana regeneration for her.
Rain Sign「A Rainy Night's Ghost Story」

SChinese: 使小伞周围下起小雨，持续%duration%秒内降低附近敌人的护甲
English: A drizzle forms around kogasa, reducing the armor of nearby enemies for %duration% seconds

SChinese: 化铁「备用雨伞特急列黑夜嘉年华」
English: Monster Sign「A Forgotten Umbrella's Night Train」

SChinese:
使得小伞周围能形成股具有极强攻击力的舌头风暴，对周围%radius%范围敌方单位造成物理伤害，使自己处于魔法免疫与眩晕免疫状态并减少受到的伤害。

对小兵造成%creep_damage%%%伤害，对建筑造成%bulding_damge%%%伤害
单次伤害加成：攻击力*%attack_bonus%
每秒增加一次伤害所需攻速：%critical_speed%\n驱散类型：弱驱散
English: Forms an aggressive tongue storm around Kogasa, dealing physical damage to enemy units within %radius% range, taking reduced damage and gaining spell immunity and stun immunity.\nDeals %creep_damage%%% damage to non-girl units and %bulding_damge%%% damage to buildings.\nScales with damage. Deals one instance of damage per second for every %critical_speed% attack speed.

SChinese: 持续时间内小伞会沉默并缴械自己，这个效果无法驱散。并且此技能无法免疫肉山造成的眩晕
English: For the duration, Kogasa is silenced and disarmed, and this effect cannot be dispelled. Stun immunity does not affect the bash from Giant Shanghai.

SChinese: 被动：每击杀1个单位增加%agi_bonus%敏捷，用「唐伞惊闪」吓到的每个少女会提供10倍效果，上限%max_count%点敏捷。\n主动：瞬间站著打开伞子，无敌并抵挡所有伤害及效果，持续%duration%秒。
English:
Passive:

Each unit killed grants %agi_bonus% permanent agility, to a maximum of %max_count% agility. Scaring girls provide 10 times the amount.\n

Active:

Instantly opens her umbrella, granting invulnerability which prevents all damage and status effects for %duration% second.

SChinese: 小伞躲藏起来，当有敌方少女接近到半径范围%radius%码内的时，吓%damage_radius%范围的所有敌人一跳，眩晕敌人并造成%damage% + （攻击力*%attack_bonus%）的法术伤害\n使用时，如果小伞%radius%码内有敌方单位或者受到伤害，则吓人失败。\n永久提升[%movespeed%x吓到少女数量]点移动速度，上限增加%max_count%点移动速度。
English: Kogasa hides. When an enemy girl comes within %radius% radius, all enemies within %damage_radius% radius will be scared, stunning them and dealing damage.\nWhile casting, if there is an enemy within %radius% radius or she takes damage, the spell will fail.\nPermanently increase movement speed by %movespeed% every time she scares an enemy girl, up to %max_count%.

SChinese: 吓到人后%duration%秒内增加自身%move_speed_bonus%%%移速和%attack_speed_bonus%攻速
English: When Kogasa successfully scares an enemy girl, she will increase her movement speed by %move_speed_bonus%%% and attack speed by %attack_speed_bonus% for %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 当小伞躲起来准备吓人或在「超防水干燥妖怪」激活时，每秒回复2%最大生命值及法力值。该效果无法被破坏。
English: While Kogasa is using「Super Water-Repelling Bone-Dry Monster」or hiding, she restores 2% of her maximum health and mana per second. Cannot be broken.

SChinese:
被动：

身边%radius%范围内有越多少女，攻击越高。\n

主动：

放弃被动效果%duration%秒，身边%radius%范围内少女越少，攻击越高。\n提高[12 - 少女数量] * 附加攻击力
English:
Passive:

Grants increased attack damage for every girl nearby.\n

Active:

Inverts the passive effect, instead granting increased attack damage the less girls there are nearby for %duration% seconds.

DAMAGE: (12 - number of girls) * %bonus_damage%

SChinese: 恋的攻击会基于造成的伤害削减目标的魔法，再造成与削减的魔法值等量的伤害。\n如果目标因此失去所有魔法，还会被短暂击晕。
English:
Koishi's attacks burns the target's mana, increasing based on damage dealt, and then dealing damage again equal to the burned mana.

If there is no mana left to burn, the target receives a mini-stun.

SChinese: 新增技能：「空想上的人格保持者」
给予恋额外的暴击和闪避。
English: Koishi gains evasion and critical strike chance.

SChinese: 恋会进入彻底封闭的意识而无法控制的暴走状态，极大提高战斗能力，并提高移动速度并移除上限。在这期间她可以穿过其他单位，并且被动技能无法被破坏。\n封闭状态下每杀死一个普通单位会增加%damage_bonus%攻击力、攻速、和移速。击杀少女增加%kill_hero_count%倍数值，直到技能结束。
English: Koishi closes off her mind and allows her subconscious to take control, which improves her attributes tremendously, increases her movement speed, and unlocks max movement speed. She can also phase through units and her passives cannot be broken.\nIn this state, every kill grants %damage_bonus% attack damage, attack speed and movement speed for the duration. Killing girls grants %kill_hero_count% times the bonus.
Koishi's presence cannot be felt by anyone.

SChinese: 施放技能靠近击飞目标
English: Cast again to teleport to the target.
「Dance of the Empty-Hearted Masks: Noh of Darkness」
「Dance of the Empty-Hearted Masks: Noh of Darkness」

SChinese: 这个技能在被缠绕时也能释放。\n万宝槌不会触发致命一击。

English: Replaces the effects of the skill.

SChinese:
主动：

提升%stat_bonus%%%当前主属性。 被动：根据当前三围中最高的属性改变为相应的主属性，根据主属性增加相应的加成： 每1点力量增加%strength_bonus%魔抗 每1点敏捷增加%agility_bonus%移速 每1点智力增加%intellect_bonus%技能增强。 多个属性相同的情况会按照力量>敏捷>智力的顺序进行变化
对600码范围内敌方少女附上凭依，被凭依的单位受到秦心的攻击和技能伤害转变为纯粹伤害。
English: Possesses enemies girls within %radius% range, converting damage dealt by Kokoro's attacks and spells to pure damage.

SChinese: 瞬间移动到前方%AbilityCastRange%码的位置并挥出「生魂流离之镰」，技能可以连续使用直至层数耗空，每隔一段时间会增加一层次数。
English: Komachi blinks forward %AbilityCastRange% units and casts「Scythe of Roaming Spirits」 automatically. Can be used continuously as long as there are charges available.

SChinese: 如果未学习「生魂流离之镰」，则默认挥出1级的「生魂流离之镰」。
English: If「Scythe of Roaming Spirits」is not yet learned, the spell will be cast as if it were level 1.

SChinese: 攻击时有几率挥动镰刀对附近敌人造成伤害，并回复造成伤害的一定百分比。并施加%soul_apply%层「充满留恋的紧缚灵」，普通攻击也会施加一层恶灵。
English:
Komachi's attacks have a chance of cleaving enemies with a swing of her scythe, healing her for a portion of the damage dealt.

Applies %soul_apply% stacks of「Regretful Bound Spirits」to units affected by the spell, and also applies a stack whenever Komachi attacks a target (regardless of whether this spell activates).

SChinese: 触发「生魂流离之镰」的普通攻击本身造成的伤害也会为小町回复生命值。\n如果未学习「充满留恋的紧缚灵」，则「生魂流离之镰」无法对没有恶灵的次要目标叠加恶灵，且此时普通攻击无法对没有恶灵的单位叠加恶灵。
English: The damage from normal attacks which trigger this spell is also counted for healing.
If「Regretful Bound Spirits」is not learned, this cannot apply any stacks of evil spirits on targets, neither through the scythe swing nor her attacks.

SChinese: 恨符「充满留恋的紧缚灵」
使存在的所有恶灵爆发根据目标最大生命造成伤害。\n被动增加力量和敏捷
English:
Passive:

Passively increases strength and agility.\n

Active:

Komachi commands all vengeful spirits to explode, dealing damage based on the target's maximum health.

SChinese: 把目标作为索命对象，如果目标在持续时间内生命值低于%kill_hp%%%，小町则会2秒后瞬移到目标身边再在2秒后完成击杀。\n持续时间内目标无法治疗生命值
English: Komachi claims the life of an enemy unit, preventing all forms of health restoration. If the health of the target drops below %kill_hp%%%, Komachi disappears and teleports behind her after 2 seconds, executing the target after another 2 seconds.

SChinese: 进入斩杀阶段的前后4秒中，小町和目标少女均为无敌状态，无法选中，且即使在这4秒中小町死亡，斩杀也会完成。\n与「三步必杀」不同，该技能的斩杀可以被「蓬莱之药」救起。
English: Both Komachi and the target are invulnerable and untargetable during the 4 second execution. Even if Komachi somehow dies during the execution, the target will be executed anyway.
Unlike「Knock Out In Three Steps」, this execution can be prevented by「Hourai Elixir」.

SChinese: 瞬间出现在一个敌方目标单位身边，对目标造成伤害。
English: Instantly appears next to an enemy target unit, deals damage to the target.

SChinese: 胡桃以极高的速度冲击并撕裂敌人。
English: Kurumi charges and tears the enemy at extremely high speed.

SChinese: 胡桃跳入棺材中睡眠。棺材附近的敌人无法施法。当棺材被破坏或睡眠时间达到%coffin_duration%秒时，胡桃会从棺材里出来。\n胡桃可以自行中止睡眠。
English: Kurumi jumps into the coffin to sleep. Enemies near the coffin cannot cast spells. When the coffin is destroyed or the sleep time reaches %coffin_duration% seconds, kurumi will come out of the coffin.\nKurumi can interrupt sleep on her own.

SChinese:
胡桃跳入棺材期间无敌，持续%cast_time%秒。
棺材获得额外护甲和魔法抗性，基于胡桃的%armor_pct%%%护甲和%magic_resist_pct%%%魔法抗性。
English:
Kurumi is invulnerable when she is jumping into coffin, lasts for %cast_time% second.
The coffin gains bonus armor and magic resistance, based on Kurumi's %armor_pct%%% armor and %magic_resist_pct%%% magic resistance.

SChinese: 主动苏醒，从棺材里出来。
English: Proactively wake up, come out of the coffin.

SChinese: 胡桃的攻击附带吸血鬼的诅咒，令敌人难以还手。每次攻击对目标及其附近%radius%范围内的敌人造成伤害并降低他们的攻击速度。
English: Kurumi attacks with Vampire Curse, causing enemies hard to counter. Each attack deals damage to target and enemies around target within %radius% radius and reduces their attack speed.

SChinese: 胡桃的攻击破坏敌人的伤口，造成基于他们损失生命值百分比的额外伤害。目标的生命值越低，伤害越高。
English: Kurumi's attacks break enemies' wounds, deal bonus damage based on the percentage of their missing health. The lower the health of target, the greater the damage dealt.

SChinese: 伤害 = 基础伤害 + 基础攻击力额外伤害 x 目标损失生命值百分比。
English: Damage = base damage + bonus base damage x the percentage of target's missing health.

SChinese: 胡桃每次攻击时还会根据自身等级回复一定量的生命。
English: Kurumi's attacks restore health based on her level.
Please let all the blood flow out.

SChinese: 拉尔瓦快速的向前飞行，到达最远处后返回，对沿途的敌人造成基于双方全属性差值的伤害。\n全属性差值伤害倍率：2\n再次按下可直接在当前位置降落
English: Eternity Larva dives forward in an arc towards the target point, returning after reaching either the target point or the maximum distance. Enemies along the way will be dealt damage based on the difference between their total attributes and Eternity Larva's.\nDamage bonus per difference of attribute: %damage_bonus_per_difference%\nEternity Larva can cancel the dive at any point by casting this spell again.

SChinese: 夏日的正午 凤蝶妖精仍然在太阳花田中勤恳的授粉。
English: Even under the midsummer noon sun, the swallowtail butterflies still diligently pollinate the sunflower fields.

SChinese:
被动：

鳞粉会减缓敌人的步伐，每层「鳞粉」降低他们%speed_down%%%移动速度。\n

主动：

拉尔瓦进入飞行状态，增加移动速度，并移动无视地形阻挡。在飞行结束时，会扇动翅膀将鳞粉撒向四周，使周围%radius%范围内敌方单位粘上「鳞粉」，但不会刷新持续时间。
English:
Passvie:

Scales slow enemies' steps, slow thier move speed by %speed_down%%% for each stack of 「Scales」.\n

Active:

Larva enters flight, increases move speed, and free pathing. At the end of the flight, Larva flaps her wings to sprinkle scales around, causing enemy units within a %radius% range to stick 「Scales」, but it will not refresh the duration.

SChinese:
被动：

每当拉尔瓦受到来自粘有「鳞粉」的单位的伤害时，根据受到伤害的一定百分比回复生命值，「鳞粉」层数越多效果越强。\n

主动：

将周围少女困入拉尔瓦的梦境之中，若被困少女没有在持续时间内离开拉尔瓦身边%runrange%距离，则会受到眩晕和伤害。
English:
Passive:

Each time Larva is attacked by enemies with 「Scales」, restores health based on a percentage of the damage taken. The more stacks of 「Scales」, the stronger the effect.\n

Active:

Traps the surrounding girls into Larva's dream. If the trapped girls do not leave Larva's side %runrange% range within the duration, they will suffer stun and damage.

SChinese: 若被困少女没能成功逃脱拉尔瓦的梦境，则在该少女身旁产生一个拉尔瓦的幻象。若该少女粘有「鳞粉」，还将为她们叠加「鳞粉」。
English: If the trapped girl fails to escape from Larva's dream, a Larva's illusion will be created next to the girl. If the girl has 「Scales」 attached, also applies 「Scales」.

SChinese:
被动：

「鳞粉」根据层数持续造成伤害。\n

主动：

拉尔瓦向周围%radius%范围内撒下鳞粉，对范围内的敌人造成伤害，并使他们粘上「鳞粉」，但不会刷新持续时间。
English:
Passive:

「Scales」 deal damage based on the stacks over time.\n

Active:

Larva sprinkles scales on the %radius% radius area around her, dealing damage to enemies within the radius and causing them to stick 「Scales」, but it will not refresh the duration.

SChinese: 拉尔瓦向前方发射蝴蝶弹幕，对击中的少女造成伤害并使他们粘上「鳞粉」，然后清除目标所有的「鳞粉」层数，根据减少的层数造成额外伤害。
English: Larva fires butterfly barrages towards the front, causing damage to the hit girls and causing them to stick 「Scales」. Then, clears all stacks of 「Scales」 on the target and deals bonus damage based on the cleared stacks.

SChinese: 向周围撒下含有毒性的鳞粉，吸入鳞粉的敌人将被减速并持续受到伤害。\n敌人在此期间释放技能将刷新持续时间并使伤害提高。
English: Scatters poisonous scales around, slowing and dealing continuous damage to enemies who breathe them in.\nIf the enemy casts a spell while under this effect, the duration will be refreshed, and the damage will increase.

SChinese: 拉尔瓦会不停地向周围撒出鳞粉，每%think_time%秒使%auraRangeRadius%范围内的敌方单位粘上一层「鳞粉」并刷新持续时间，持续%duration%秒。每层降低目标%attackspeed%攻击速度。
English: Larva constantly sprinkles scales around her. Applies a stack of 「Scales」 to enemy units within a %auraRangeRadius% range every %think_time% seconds and refreshes the duration for %duration% seconds. Reduces target's attack speed by %attackspeed% every stack.

SChinese: 该技能对幻象生效。效果不可叠加。
English: The ability is functional for illusions. The effect cannot stack with itself.

SChinese: 集体的意识群中难免存在阴影。
English: There will always a shadow within the collective unconscious.

SChinese: 拉尔瓦使用魔法保护一名友军，其所受到的下次大于50的伤害将弹回攻击者并使其减少%slow%%%移动速度。
English: Eternity Larva protects an ally girl with magic, reflecting and negating next damage over 50 dealt to her by once, as well as slow the source of the damage by %slow%%% movement speed.

SChinese: 幻想乡之外的地方，带着面具的人靠着虚假与谎言维护着世界的秩序。
English: Outside Gensokyo, masked men maintain the order of the world through falsehoods and lies.

SChinese: 将范围内的敌人困入拉尔瓦的梦境之中，若一名敌人逃出拉尔瓦的梦境，敌人的其他队友将受到惩罚。
English: Traps enemy girls within range in Eternity Larva's dream. Enemy girls inside will have their attack speed reduced. If one of them escapes, all other affected girls take damage and are put to sleep.

SChinese: 一切的羁绊都是纠缠与束缚，身处幻想乡中 也犹如这梦境一般。
English: All the fetters entangle and bind, just like the dream of living in Gensokyo.

SChinese: 敌人逃出梦境后将刷新剩余敌人梦境持续时间，每当有人逃出梦境伤害都将增加一倍基础值。
English: Refreshes the dream for other trapped girls and doubles damage dealt whenever one of them escapes.

SChinese: 自身被攻击时，敌人会沾上鳞粉，降低敌人的技能伤害。
English: Enemies who attack Eternity Larva will be covered in scales, reducing their spell damage.

SChinese: 大自然会为属于她的子民们提供最隐蔽而有效的保护
English: Nature provides its children with the most covert yet effective protection.

SChinese: 在目标区域下起一阵强烈的暴风雪，使范围内敌人每秒受到一次法术伤害。持续施法最多维持%duration%秒。
English: Summons a strong blizzard in the target area, dealing magical damage continuously. Can be channeled for up to %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 放出多道极度冰冷的波形光线，光波速度%speed%，最先碰到的%limit%个敌人将被冻结并受到伤害。
English: Unleashes undulating rays of extreme cold which travel at %speed% speed and freeze and deal damage to up to %limit% enemies.

SChinese:
被动：

增加血量上限。\n每次对敌人造成此技能以外的法术伤害时，造成（%damage_perdamage% + %damage_percount% * 额外层数）的伤害并且降低被伤害单位的移动速度 %duration% 秒，此效果可以叠加。
English:
Passive:

Increases max health.\nDeals additional magical damage every time Letty deals damage with a spell and slows the movement of enemies affected for %duration% seconds. Stacks up to %count_limit%.

SChinese: 按层数计算时，第一层不提供额外数值。
English: The first stack does not grant bonuses other than the base value.

SChinese: 瞬间释放寒气，使周围变成寒冷的冬天，降低范围内所有敌人的移动速度和攻击速度。
English: Unleashes the cold of winter to slow the attacks and movement of surrounding enemies.

SChinese: 作用于全地图（春雪异变，幻想乡迎来寒潮）
English: Now affects the entire map. (The spring snow ushers in a cold wave for Gensokyo.)

SChinese: 开启后，每经过%active_time%秒，将得到额外%armor_bonus%点护甲和%resistance_bonus%魔抗并减少%movement_decrease%%%移动速度，以及在受到非少女物理伤害时降低%imcome_damage%%%伤害。\n最多叠加%count%层。
English: When active, grants +%armor_bonus% armor, +%resistance_bonus%%% magic resistance, -%movement_decrease%%% movement speed and -%imcome_damage%%% damage taken from non-girls units every %active_time% seconds.\nStacks up to %count%.

SChinese: 回春「春之奏鸣/春之咆哮」
English: Returning Spring「Call of Spring / Roar of Spring」

SChinese:
向任意单位灌输春天的能量\n【白】使其每秒恢复生命值
【黑】使其每秒造成法术伤害
English:
Infuses the energy of spring onto a target unit.\n

Lily White

Target ally recovers health every second.\n

Lily Black

Target enemy takes magic damage every second.

SChinese: 春度「春度满载/春度回收」

指定一个普通单位操控其生命能量\n【白】将该单位生命值回满，让附近所有与其相同阵营的单位得到激励大幅提升攻击力
【黑】完全吸取该单位的生命，让附近所有敌方单位受到惊吓大幅降低攻击力
English:
Target a creep to control its life energy.\n

Lily White

Heals the creep to full health and grants bonus damage to nearby units on the same team as the target.\n

Lily Black

Kills the creep and inflicts a damage penalty on nearby enemies.

SChinese:
在地上布下充满春意的法阵\n【白】每秒回复附近友方英雄生命值，若期间任何友方英雄受到%stun_duration%次治疗，则使其立即获得魔法和纯粹伤害免疫
【黑】每秒对附近敌方英雄造成伤害,若期间任何敌方英雄受到%stun_duration%次伤害,则使其立即眩晕
English:
Lays down a magic circle full of the energy of spring on the target area.\n

Lily White

Heals allied girls inside the area every second. Girls which are healed at least 3 times become immune to magic and pure damage for a short time.\n

Lily Black

Deals damage to enemy girls inside the area every second. Girls which take damage more than 3 times are stunned.

SChinese: 眩晕/伤害免疫持续时间：

指定一个区域
【白】每秒回复该区域所有友军生命值，并减少受到的伤害
【黑】每秒对该区域所有敌军造成法术伤害，并增加受到的伤害
持续时间：7
增加/减少伤害：%bonus_reduction%%%
智力加成：%statscale% 
施法范围：全地图
English:
Target any area on the map.\n

Lily White

Heals allies inside the area every second and reduces the damage they take.\n

Lily Black

Deals damage to enemies inside the area every second and increases the damage they take.

SChinese: 转换成黑莉莉型态，黑莉利型态下，所有魔力消耗会变成血量消耗，并转换至黑莉莉的相对技能
English: Changes forms between Lily White and Lily Black.\n Lily White's skills cost mana, while Lily Black's skills cost health.

SChinese: 向前打出弦音，对一直线的敌方单位造成基于智力的法术伤害，并因忧郁影响，敌人会被短暂沉默。
English: Lunasa shoots a string of notes forward, dealing magical damage to enemies in a straight line. Due to the notes' melancholic effects, the enemy will be silenced for a short time.

SChinese: 小提琴「令人忧郁的悠弦」
攻击附加额外 %damage% 法术伤害同时攻击降低目标魔抗持续9秒，可叠加16次。
English: Attacks deal %lunasa02_damage% additional magical damage and reduce the enemy's magic resistance for %duration% seconds. Stacks up to %max_StackCount% times.

SChinese: 以熟练的手法与技术，提升自身的音乐技巧，但会被自己的忧郁程度所影响。露娜萨造成的非普攻伤害有概率造成致命一击（伤害倍率为2.0），自身生命值比例愈低，致命一击概率愈高。\n生命值已满时不造成致命一击，每失去%hp_percent%%%生命值，增加10%% 致命一击几率。
弦灵「悲伤提琴曲一第一乐章」
English: String Spirit「Melancholic Violin Sonata - First Movement」

SChinese: 拉出绝妙且令人沉静的提琴曲，对单一个敌方单位造成一次基于智力的法术伤害，并持乐章完结之时再造成一次相等於首次伤害的法术伤害。乐章演奏时间6秒。
English: Lunasa plays a wonderful yet calming tune on the violin, dealing magical damage to an enemy once on cast and again when the effect ends. The enemy is silenced for the duration.

SChinese: 如果沉默被提前结束（如被驱散），则立即结算第二段伤害。
English: If the effect ends early (such as when being dispelled), the second damage instance is applied immediately.

SChinese: 独葬「棱镜协奏曲-提琴独奏」

被动：

每第4次攻击附加%damage% +等级x3.0]的法术伤害。\n

被动：

每击杀一个单位增加自身%amplify_bonus%%%技能增强。\n（%amplify_limit%%%后收益减半）
English:
Every 4th attack deals (%damage% + level * 3) additional magical damage.

Each kill grants %amplify_bonus%%% spell amplification. (After %amplify_limit%%%, the increase is halved.)

SChinese: 不积跬步无以至千里，不积小流无以成江海。
English: As they say, Rome wasn't built in a day.

SChinese:
激活：

露娜萨陷入忧郁状态，持续流失生命，隔绝外界干扰，降低所受伤害，同时演奏速度加快，增加攻击速度。
English: While active, Lunasa falls into a state of melancholy, continuously losing life while reducing damage received. At the same time, she also begins to play faster, gaining increased attack speed.
Drains %drain_pct%%% of current health per second.

SChinese: 莉莉卡浮现於目标位置，然后为周围友军回复生命值。
English: Lyrica blinks to the target location, healing all allied units near the destination.

SChinese: 指定一个友方少女，使她在%duration%秒内下一次攻击敌方单位以及被敌方少女攻击时，各一次对敌人造成%damage%法术伤害并在%debuff_duration%秒内降低对方移动及攻击速度%attack_speed_reduction%%%。\n智力加成%bonus_int%
English: Target allied girl gains two buffs, one of which deals additional damage and slows on the target girl's next attack, and another which does the same when the target girl is attacked by an enemy girl.

SChinese: 智力加成是根据目标友方少女的智力，而非莉莉卡的智力。
English: Deals bonus damage based on the target's intelligence, not Lyrica's.

SChinese: 隔空奏出优丽的琴音，令敌人沉迷於音色之间。降低附近少女的全能力值，自身生命值比例愈低，光环效果越强。
English: The beautiful notes from Lyrica's keyboard drift through the air, mesmerizing enemies. Reduces all stats of nearby enemy girls, further reduced based on her own missing health.

SChinese: 开启后，莉莉卡以熟练的演奏技巧，弹出让人享受的乐章。每秒流失%damage_percent%%%的生命值，使周围友方少女获得等额全属性提高。
English: While active, Lyrica will play a joyful tune on her keyboard, losing %damage_percent%%% of her max health every second to increase her allies' stats equal to the ability's enemy reduction.

SChinese: %每+1全属性降低所需损失生命百分比：

English: Further reduces the stats of nearby enemies by %all_state_reduce%.

SChinese: 键灵「韵动键盘曲第一乐章」
English: Key Spirit「Rhythmic Keyboard Sonata - First Movement」

SChinese: 使一名友方少女在持续时间内免疫所有伤害。
English: Makes an allied girl temporarily immune to all damage.

SChinese: 独葬「棱镜协奏曲-键盘独奏」
每第4次普通攻击造成%damage%+等级的%radius%范围法术伤害。\n每击杀一个单位降低%cooldown_bonus%%%冷却时间（%cooldown_limit%%%后收益半，上限为%cooldown_max%%%）。
English: Every 4th attack deals (%damage%+level) damage in a %radius% radius area around the target.\nEach kill decreases cooldowns by %cooldown_bonus%%%, up to %cooldown_max%%%. (After %cooldown_limit%%%, the decrease is halved.)

SChinese: 魔理沙化为彗星，急速冲向目标位置，并对路径上的敌人造成法术伤害。
English: Marisa turns into a comet and flies towards the target location, dealing damage to enemies along the way.

SChinese: 魔理沙化身巨大的极尽华丽的彗星进行高速突入攻击。
English: Marisa transforms into an enormous yet beautiful comet to mow down enemies at high speed.

SChinese: 向前方120°扇形范围喷射大量星状烟花，造成法术伤害。400码内有额外100%%的伤害。
English: Marisa blasts enemies in a 120° cone with a fan of stars. Deals double damage within 400 range.

SChinese: 依靠漂浮在周围的星星碎片的符卡。
English: A spell card which covers the field with floating stars.

SChinese: 天仪「天球仪中的太阳系」
放出4个环绕自身的光球，能够自动攻击附近目标，持续%ability_duration%秒。
