English: Marisa deploys 4 orbs of light around her to fire upon enemies nearby for %ability_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 魔理沙引以为傲的弹幕
English: Marisa's danmaku is her pride and joy.

SChinese: 使用随身携带的迷你八卦炉发射强大的魔炮，将目标区域的人打的不能自理，造成严重伤害。中间区域敌人受到2倍伤害。
English: Marisa uses the Mini-Hakkero to fire an enormous magical laser, stunning and dealing great damage to enemies hit. Enemies at the center take double damage.

SChinese: 如同魔理沙代名词般极粗激光,若对手位于正前方的话将无处可逃。直击所能造成的巨大威力无愧于其高消费。
English: Marisa's signature freakin' huge magical laser, which ensures enemies caught in it can't escape. The immense damage it can deal on a direct hit is matched only by its immense power consumption.

SChinese: 根据当前蓝量百分比获得技能增强，每1%%蓝量获得%wanbaochui_amplify%%%技能增强。
English: Passively grants Marisa %wanbaochui_amplify%%% spell amplification for every 1%% of her current mana remaining.

SChinese:
如果魔理沙一定时间内没有使用技能，下一次使用的技能将减少其冷却时间。

基础技能冷却时间减少(%refresh_time%+0.1*少女等级)秒。
终极技能冷却时间减少%refresh_time_ult%秒。
English: If Marisa doesn't cast any spells for %refresh_interval% seconds, the cooldown of her next spell cast is reduced by (%refresh_time% + 0.1 * level) seconds.\nIf the next spell is her ultimate, the cooldown is reduced by %refresh_time_ult% seconds instead.

SChinese: 降低目标的移动速度，护甲和魔抗，附加持续%duration%秒的伤害。多次施放可以叠加除伤害外的效果。\n降低移速：%base_slow_movement%%%
神经之毒每次结算伤害都会有8%%概率使400范围内的其他单位感染神经之毒。并且不可驱散

English:
Medicine poisons an enemy, slowing it and dealing damage per second for %duration% seconds, healing for 50%% of the damage dealt.

If the target is affected by a debuff from Medicine's skills, they will be stunned for %stun_time% seconds.

Whenever Medicine attacks a target that is affected by a debuff from her skills, the cooldown of this spell is reduced by a flat amount.

SChinese: 每次攻击减少冷却时间：
在指定位置召唤铃兰人偶,铃兰人偶存在期间持续施放毒气，使范围内敌方单位减速并持续受到伤害。\n施法距离：700
English: Medicine sends out a lily-of-the-valley doll to create a cloud of poisonous gas at the target location, slowing down enemy units inside and dealing damage.

SChinese: 铃兰人偶可以被摧毁，此时该技能的伤害效果提前结束，但减速效果会继续。\n铃兰人偶拥有100%魔抗。
攻击梅蒂欣将受到主属性 * %poison_damage_factor%的伤害，施放技能后目标对所有伤害反伤。\n被动基础伤害：%poison_damage_base%
English:
Passive:

Enemies that attack Medicine take damage equal to %poison_damage_base% + %poison_damage_factor% * their primary attribute.\n

Active:

The target girl reflects all damage taken.

SChinese: 使敌方英雄狂乱，攻击1200范围内的友军，并略微增加攻击速度和移动速度，期间无法被我方攻击，受到来自建筑的伤害减少，并完全免疫泉水的伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n目标造成的击杀归于施法者。
English:
Medicine drives an enemy girl into a frenzy, making her attack allies within 1200 range, and granting them bonus movement and attack speed. Medicine and her allies cannot attack the affected girl.

Kills caused by the target are credited to Medicine.

SChinese: 目标不会因建筑造成的伤害而死亡，但是持续时间结束后空中的弹道会继续尝试击中目标，依然有可能导致被反补甚至被泉水反补。
English: Buildings cannot kill the target, but projectiles which are already travelling will still hit the target even after the duration expires, which could cause them to be denied, even by the fountain.

SChinese: 「陷入疯狂」将延迟2.5秒生效。「陷入疯狂」施法不会被指向性护盾抵消且不再可被驱散
English: The effect of「Into Delirium」is delayed by 2.5 seconds, however it can no longer be prevented by spell block or Dragon Star and can no longer be dispelled.

Reduces the movement speed and magic resistance of nearby enemies.

When Medicine casts「Poison Breath」on an ally, they gain the「Melancholic Poison」aura.

SChinese:
明罗前冲，并击飞敌人。

击飞时间：%knockback_dur%
冲撞伤害：%dash_mul% × 技能等级
横扫伤害：%sweep_mul% × 技能等级 × 力量
English:
Meira will dash to the target location, dealing damage to enemies in the area along the way, and then will launch a sweep at the target location, knocking back enemies in a circular area and dealing damage.

Meira can spell 「Mercy.The Wisdom of Meira」 in %next_time% after spelling.

Dash Distance: %cast_range%
Dash width: %dash_width%
Sweep Radius: %sweep_radius%
Knockback Time: %knockback_dur%
Dash Damage: %dash_mul% × Ability's level
Sweep Damage: %sweep_mul% × Ability's level × Strength

SChinese: 结束后%next_time%秒内可释放下一段。
二段：后空翻，造成伤害、眩晕。
三段：再次后空翻。然后向前突刺，推走单位并造成伤害。

后空翻，造成伤害、眩晕。

眩晕时间：%stun_dur%
伤害数值：%level_mul% × 技能等级 + %agi_mul% × 敏捷
English:
Minro will backflip and slash enemies in his path, dealing damage and stun.

Meira can spell 「Exorcism.Purification And Crusade」 in %next_time% after spelling.

Stun Duration: %stun_dur%
Move Distance:%back_length%
Slash Width: %back_width%
Damage: %level_mul% × Ability's Level + %agi_mul% × Agility

SChinese:
再次后空翻。然后向前突刺，推走单位并造成伤害。

突刺伤害：%dash_level_mul% × 技能等级 + %dash_agi_mul% × 敏捷
English:
Meira will backflip once again, and thrust forward quickly and immediately after landing, dealing damage to units in range, and they will be pushed for some distance.

Backflip Duration: %back_duration%
Backflip Distance: %back_length%
Thrust Distance: %dash_distance%
Thrust Width: %dash_width%
Thrust Damage: %dash_level_mul% × Ability's level + %dash_agi_mul% × Agility

SChinese:
明罗瞬移到目标背后，造成伤害、晕眩和击退，附带一次天生效果。

伤害数值：%int_bonus%倍智力。
English: Meira move immediately to the location behind units, dealing a precision strike to close units, stuning and knocking back close units, and dealing damage for <font color='#5BC0DE'>Intelligence</font> × %int_bonus%, with a dark power swordiness effect.

SChinese: 眩晕时间不包括击退时间。
English: Stun duration don't include knock back duration.

SChinese:
明罗收刀进入防守反击姿态。期间若受到来自少女的伤害，立即击飞周围单位。

伤害数值为%agi_mul%倍敏捷。若当前敏捷大于%agi_pure_floor%，伤害类型变成纯粹。
English:
Meira will in the posture of defence and fight back.

In this time, if Meira recives the attack or ability damage from other girls, she will slash and knock back close units immidiately, dealing damage with the number of %agi_mul% × Agility

if Agility is more than %agi_pure_floor%, the damage type will be Pure.

She can fight back in advance if she spell moving actively.

SChinese: 主动释放位移技能会提前进入反击。
English: If the damage source has a reverse damage effect, the defense of this skill will not trigger.

SChinese:
明罗将瞬移到目标背后，造成三次伤害，削减目标攻速和移速，不可驱散。

三次伤害基础%damage_const%，分别增加力量 × %str_mul%，敏捷 × %agi_mul%，智力 × %int_mul%。
English:
Meira will move to the location behind target. Then appears directly in front of the target with Meira's doppelganger cutting three slash at great speed, and the damage of slash is Strength × %str_mul%，Agility × %agi_mul%，Intelligence × %int_mul%, and there is a constant damage at per slash with %damage_const%.

After slash, the number of target unit's move speed and attack speed will be reduced. The effect can't be purged.

If Meira has acquired 「Sword.All Sides」, Meira can spell this abiltiy in %next_dur% seconds after spelling.

SChinese: 获得二段后，释放本技能后%next_time%秒内可使用二段。

无敌%duration%秒，释放法阵，造成伤害。

伤害：%basic_damage% + 敏捷 × %agi_mul%。
English: Meira will be invincible and mark a square in place. The unit in the square will take a slash damaged that is <font color='#d8ae54'>pure</font> with <font color='#FFFFFF'>%basic_damage%</font> + <font color='#26E030'>Agility</font> × <font color='#FFFFFF'>%agi_mul%</font>.

SChinese:
明罗进入冥想姿态，期间减伤。\n

冥想期间如果受到少女伤害：

打断冥想，刷新天生，对伤害来源施加%sword_time%次伤害。\n

冥想期间如果进入眩晕、沉默、恐惧：

打断冥想，立即释放「居合.明月」，并获得%immune_dur%秒无敌。
English:
Bring the knife back to the handle and enter meditation mode, during which damage from other girls will be reduced.\n

Meditation is interrupted by girls' damage

If Meira takes damage from girls during meditation, she can refresh 「Dark Power」 and fire a sword against the girl.\n

Meditation is interrupted by special effect

If meditation is interrupted by a special state, she will spell 「Iaido.Bright Moon」 and gain invincibles with %immune_dur% seconds.

SChinese: 明罗尊者，壹佰肆拾，五百罗汉，降伏众魔，洞察众生，最上彼岸，心极平等，虚空无边，地火风缘，金刚不坏，以此一击，万籁俱寂，度化众生。
伤害为「黑暗的力量」的剑气效果。
English: If the damage source has a reverse damage effect, the defense of this skill will not trigger.

SChinese: 获得技能刀符「明罗.尊者」

基础效果

明罗每次释放技能后，下次普攻附带剑气，伤害为当前力量。\n

大招等级达到1后：

主动使用本技能时，明罗向前跳跃%B_jump_dist%码。\n

大招等级达到3后：

「绝剑.壹佰肆拾尊」解锁二段。
English:
The effect of this abiltiy will be added by the upgrade of 「Sword.The One Hundred and Thirty Arhats」.

The level of「Sword.The One Hundred and Thirty Arhats」 is 0:

If Meira spell ability, there will be an additional danmaku damage, and the range of that is %A_damage_len%×%A_damage_wid%.

The level of「Sword.The One Hundred and Thirty Arhats」 is 1:

If Meira spell this ability, she will jump that with %B_jump_dist%. She can ignore damage in the period.

The level of「Sword.The One Hundred and Thirty Arhats」 is 2:

The cast range of 「Sword.The One Hundred and Thirty Arhats」 will be increased。

The level of「Sword.The One Hundred and Thirty Arhats」 is 3:

Meira will acquire the ability named 「Sword.All Sides」.

SChinese: 以凡人之躯挑战妖怪神明，其心只为修行悟道，当剑道大成之时，即是蝼蚁也要蚀骨钻心。
剑气范围为笔直的%A_damage_len%×%A_damage_wid%矩形（中心点为明罗身前%A_damage_len%）。

English: Chi Sign「Earth Dragon Sky Dragon Kick」

SChinese: 向目标地点飞踢过去，把路径上的所有敌方单位踢到终点，并对她们造成伤害。
English: Meiling unleashes a flying kick towards the target location, dragging along any girls along the way and dealing damage to them.

SChinese: 驱使真龙气息保护自身，期间持续驱散异常状态，并且获得30%%减伤。
English: Meiling surrounds herself in a barrier of Qi to defend herself. The barrier provides 30%% damage reduction and continuously applies a strong dispel.

SChinese: 施放时，立即重置彩华「虹色太极拳」的反击间隔时间。
English: Resets the counterattack cooldown of「Rainbow Taijiquan」when cast.

SChinese: 红美铃受到任何伤害均有概率格挡一定数值，并依据身体本能向周围单位作出反击。
English: As a Kung Fu master, Meiling has a chance to counter attack when dealt damage, blocking a portion of the damage dealt and dealing pure damage to nearby enemies.

SChinese: 彩符「彩光风铃」持续时间内的反击间隔大幅降低。
English: The counterattack cooldown is greatly reduced during「Colorful Light Wind Chime」.

SChinese:
人神合一，运转全身气劲打出致命的三击，期间无法做其他动作，并且驱散异常状态。
第一击：袭其要害，使周围敌方单位减缓%slow_attack_speed%攻击速度和%slow_movement_speed%移动速度，持续%slow_duration%秒。伤害：%damage01%
第二击：伤其筋骨，使周围敌方单位失去行动能力%root_duration%秒。伤害：%damage02%
第三击：飞向目标地点，之后撼击大地，震飞并击晕周围的所有单位%stun_duration%秒，这一击的影响范围是前面的两倍。伤害%damage03%
English:
Meiling manipulates Qi nearby, utilizing the energy in her entire body to deliver three fatal strikes, during which Meiling cannot act and receives a continuous strong dispel.

First Strike:

Attacks the enemies' vitals, reducing their attack speed by %slow_attack_speed% and move speed by %slow_movement_speed%%% for %slow_duration% seconds.
Damage: %damage01%.

Second Strike:

Strikes at the enemies' muscles and bones, making them unable to move for %root_duration% seconds.
Damage: %damage02%.

Third Strike:

Dives towards the target location, causing an earthquake which launches all enemies into the air for %stun_duration% seconds. The impact radius for this strike is doubled.
Damage: %damage03%

SChinese:
被动：红美玲每5s会增加一道真气内劲。
主动：在接下来的10秒内，使普通攻击命中时消耗1层内劲，造成额外伤害和短暂眩晕。
额外伤害：30%美铃攻击力
眩晕时间：0.1

English: Hermit Sign「Taoist of the Land of the Rising Sun」

SChinese: 变成光，%disappear_duration%秒后降临到目标处。出现时眩晕范围内的目标，并造成魔法伤害。\n技能满级时：增加%max_level_damage%伤害\n仙人模式：自身每秒恢复%immortal_health_regen%%%最大生命值
English:
Transforms into a pillar of light that strikes down at the target area after %disappear_duration% seconds in a small area, stunning enemies and dealing magical damage.

LEVEL 4: Gains %max_level_damage% bonus damage.

Hermit Form: Passively grants %immortal_health_regen%%% max health regeneration.

SChinese: 在空中可以躲避部分弹道。
开启后，每秒消耗32魔法，自身获得技能增强和移速加成，队友享受一半加成\n技能满级时：自身%max_level_bonus%倍加成\n仙人模式：队友不享受加成，技能不耗蓝
English:
While active, the spell consumes %mana_cost% mana per second to gain bonus spell amplification and movement speed. Nearby allies gain half this amount.

LEVEL 4: %max_level_bonus%x bonuses to herself.

Hermit Form: Reduces the mana cost to %immortal_mana_cost%, but allies no longer gain any bonuses.

SChinese: 仙人是到了最后也只会为自己使用力量而已。没有教授他人的必要。
English: Hermits use their power only for their own sakes. There is no need to teach others.

SChinese: 允许神子进行连击，造成额外魔法伤害。\n技能满级时：获得%max_level_heal_ratio%%%全能吸血\n仙人模式：额外伤害变为纯粹 攻击距离+%immortal_attack_range%
English:
Allows Miko to attack twice in quick succession, dealing additional magical damage.

LEVEL 4: Gains %max_level_heal_ratio%%% lifesteal and spell lifesteal.

Hermit Form: The additional damage is converted to pure damage. Passively grants %immortal_attack_range% attack range.

SChinese: 幻象无法触发天赋眩晕效果。\n全能吸血意为神子根据造成一切伤害的税后伤害进行吸血。
English:
Illusions cannot trigger the stun from the talent.

Lifesteal is equal to total damage dealt after reductions.

SChinese:
指定一个友方少女，%duration%内不断回复友方少女和神子自身的生命值。
蓄力达到100%%后可降临到友方少女身旁，使双方无敌%invul_duration%秒。
技能满级时：神子增加%max_level_cast_range%施法距离
仙人模式：新生的神灵作用目标%immortal_radius%范围
English:
Channels and heals Miko and a target ally girl continuously for %duration% seconds.

Teleports to the target girl after the channeling and makes both of you invulnerable for %invul_duration% seconds.

LEVEL 3: Passively grants %max_level_cast_range% cast range.

Hermit Form: Also heals all units within %immortal_radius% radius of the target.

SChinese: 从长眠中苏醒过来的圣人。刚出生时就已经拥有非同寻常的才能，远远超越了人类的超级人物。
English: A saint awakened from a long sleep. From the moment of her birth, she possessed extraordinary talents, and was one who was fated to surpass humanity.

SChinese: 蓄力满后打断施法将直接降临到友方少女身旁
开启后，每秒发射%num%个弹幕追踪%radius%范围内最近的敌人造成<font color='#FFFFFF'>基础伤害</font>+%mana_damage_percent%%%最大魔法值的魔法伤害。\n如果敌人被神光「无忤为宗」控制，则弹幕追踪该敌人。\n每发弹幕魔法消耗%mana_cost_constant% + %mana_cost_percent%%%
可以发射弹幕攻击战争迷雾中乃至隐身的敌人，但是不会造成伤害，且无法实时追踪她们的位置。
持续控制一个敌方少女，持续期间双方无法行动。\n施法距离：%cast_range%

主动

神子在%duration%秒内的下一次普攻将附带%radius%范围的魔法伤害，范围内的敌人将受到持续%slow_duration%秒%slow_percent%%%的减速\n力量加成：%strength_bonus%\n

被动

获得%percent%%%技能吸血
完全降低目标敌方少女的移动速度，在%duration%内逐渐恢复正常。期间生成4个%damage%点伤害的弹幕攻击目标\n神子可以再次释放技能向目标突进（即使目标死亡），沿途造成%last_damage%点魔法伤害\n若该目标在减速期间死亡，神子将获得一层能量点数，每层能量点数提高%stack_damage%点伤害。
降低30秒冷却时间，且神子向目标突进后将在负面状态结束时再次飞向敌人并沿途造成伤害。

被动：

免疫致死伤害并对自身施加强驱散，同时获得%duration%秒内匀速衰减的护盾，护盾值为等级x%shield%
这个效果对小町的终极技能「余命无几许」无效且仍然会进入冷却。
「能够同时听十人讲话程度的能力」
English: 「The Ability to Listen to Ten People at the Same Time」

SChinese: 神子可以听到附近%radius%范围内敌人的呼吸。
English: Miko can hear her enemies' breathing. Grants a small amount of vision (but not True Sight) around nearby visible enemies.

SChinese: 救救我啊！神子A梦！ 这样大喊的话耳朵灵光的她或许能听到。
English: If you shout 'Help meee, Mikoemooon!', she might hear you with her sharp ears.
Divine Light「Honor the Avoidance of Defiance」

SChinese: 以和为贵，无忤为宗。神子指定一个敌方单位，对自身与敌方单位施加缴械和沉默，持续%duration%秒。\n仙人模式：附加闭锁
English:
Harmony is to be valued, and an avoidance of wanton opposition to be honoured. Disarms and silences the target enemy and Miko for %duration% seconds.

Hermit Form: Also prevents the use of items.

SChinese: 神子指定一个敌方单位，对自身与敌方单位施加缴械和沉默，持续3秒。
扔出锚，钩回遇到的第一个单位并对勾中的敌方单位造成固定纯粹伤害。
English: Murasa throws her anchor, hooking the first unit the anchor hits. If it is an enemy, Murasa stuns and deals damage to it.

SChinese: 钩子无视普通单位，增加%bonus_damage%伤害。
English: The anchor now ignores creeps and gains %bonus_damage% damage.

SChinese: 船长在地面插一根锚，以此来召唤水流，形成漩涡，将人卷入一定时间后喷出。\n对被卷入漩涡深处的单位造成持续伤害。
English: Murasa launches her anchor towards a target location and into the ground, creating a vortex which will pull in units and spit them out afterwards. Continuously deals damage to enemies caught within the vortex.

SChinese: 村纱船长开启了她秘藏的菠菜，在7秒内得到超强的作战力及分裂伤害。
English: Murasa busts out her secret spinach stash, significantly increasing her physical abilities and causing her attacks to deal additional damage to any nearby enemies (including the target).
Recalls the Palanquin Ship to Murasa's side.

SChinese: 防止队友对船的伤害。\n此乃友军之围。
English: Prevents allies from dealing damage to Palanquin Ship.

SChinese: 使幽灵船冲向目标自爆并造成伤害。
English: Causes the Palanquin Ship to charge straight towards the target location, crashing violently to stun and deal damage to enemies at the destination.
Drops off Murasa at the target location.
Causes Murasa to board the Palanquin Ship.

SChinese: 向一个单位投掷苹果。如果为友方单位，使其获得基于目标最大生命值的治疗。如果为敌方单位，对其造成基于目标最大生命值的魔法伤害并眩晕。\n若苹果投向番薯车，则激发番薯车神力对光环范围内造成高额魔法伤害。
English: Minoriko feeds a unit with her apples.\nFor allies, the apple heals based on their max health. For enemies, the apple stuns them and deals damage based on their max health.\nIf the apple is fed to the sweet potato cart, the cart will explode damaging all enemies in the area.

SChinese: 对目标%wanbaochui_radius%范围内的所有单位撒下苹果。
English: Feeds apples to all units within %wanbaochui_radius% range of the target.

SChinese: 放置一个烤红薯的小车，靠近小车的友方单位会持续恢复生命与魔法，最多4秒\n番薯车受到敌方单位的4次攻击将会被摧毁。
English: Minoriko deploys a sweet potato cart on the ground. Allies near the cart restore their health and mana for up to 4 seconds.\nThe sweet potato cart can be destoryed by 4 attacks from enemy.

SChinese: 永久增加穰子140攻击距离，番薯车700范围内增加友方少女70攻速。番薯车变为350移速，摧毁番薯车所需的攻击次数增加到8。
English:
Permanently increases Minoriko's attack range by +140.
Allied girls in range of the cart gets +70 attack speed. The cart's movement speed is increased to 350 and number of attacks to destory the cart is increased to 8.
Autumn Sign「The Autumn Sky and a Maiden's Heart」

SChinese: 提高自己和队友的力量。
English: Minoriko grants bonus strength for allied girls around her.

SChinese: 丰符「极极极巨型蕃薯收获礼」
English: Bumper Crop「Promise of the Wheat God」

SChinese: 给目标施加番薯之力，如果目标是友军，则持续吸收范围内敌军的力量。如果目标是敌军，则持续向周围贡献出力量。\n吸取的力量最多维持6秒，如果目标在此期间内再次受到该技能的效果，吸取力量的维持时间会刷新。
English: Minoriko imbues the power of sweet potatoes on a target girl. If she is an ally, she will drain strength from all enemy girls around her. If she is an enemy, her strength will be drained by all allied girls around her.\nThe strength drain lasts 6 seconds. If a girl is affected by this skill again during that period, the duration of the strength drain will be refreshed.

SChinese: 开启技能后，周围的敌方少女会开始流失魔法值，为宫古芳香补充等值的生命值，同时芳香也会根据人数消耗自身的魔法。\n开启期间芳香每秒额外损失3%最大魔法值
English:
While active, Yoshika consumes mana continuously to absorb enemy girls' mana and convert it into healing.

Consumes an additional 3% of her maximum mana per second.

SChinese: 芳香每秒消耗魔法（每人）：

范围内血量不满的单位会逐渐唤起芳香的兽欲，当敌方少女的生命值低于负面状态层数，芳香的攻速和移动速度就会提升，而且生命值越低，提升效果越大，芳香还将获得该少女的视野和真实视域。
同时芳香身上的味道也会将位置暴露给敌方少女。
欲灵的效果可以叠加。芳香可以突破最大速度限制。
增加自身层数值的百分比移速和层数值攻速。
English:
Enemy girls near Yoshika gradually stimulate her hunger, causing them to receive a stacking debuff. When the enemy girl's health percentage falls below her stack level, Yoshika will gain increased attack speed and movement speed, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further.

Yoshika will gain vision and True Sight of that girl, but that girl will also gain vision of Yoshika.

Effects stack if multiple girls are affected. Unlocks max movement speed for Yoshika.

Grants attack speed and movement speed based on stack value.

SChinese:
芳香的攻击对敌方单位注入毒液，使其移动变得迟缓，状态消失时毒液爆炸，对周围其他单位造成魔法伤害，如果目标在状态期间死亡还将对周围其他单位造成死亡单位最大生命值一定百分比的额外魔法伤害。

被反补的单位不触发任何效果。
English:
Yoshika's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly. Enemies explode when the status expires, causing damage in an area around it. If the target dies while under this effect, they explode violently, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as additional damage.

Refreshing the status duration has no effect.

SChinese: 击杀结算来源为受到最后伤害芳香的少女单位。\n为了正确结算回复打断效果,芳香受到伤害时会先强制结算1点伤害,再将剩余伤害存入流失效果中
English: When Yoshika dies, the kill is credited to the girl who damaged Yoshika last.\nIn order to interrupt effects which end when taking damage, she will take 1 damage from any incoming damage instances. The rest of the damage is converted into the damage over time status effect.

SChinese:
冰冷的芳香渴望温暖的鲜活肉体。
发动时自动寻找%radius%范围内最近的敌方少女并旋转着飞过去。并对路径上的敌方造成一次普攻。
右键激活后自动寻找范围内最近的友方少女。
若附近无目标，则原地造成一次范围普攻。
English:
Yoshika longs to consume living flesh.

Spins towards the closest enemy girl within %radius% range, attacking any enemies on the way.

If autocast is activated, Yoshika will search for the closest allied girl instead.

If there is no eligible target in the radius, Yoshika will spin on the spot and attack nearby units instead.

SChinese: 获得新技能：僵尸「肉灵渴望」
白天生命回复减半，非白天生命回复翻倍。
English: Halves health regeneration during daytime, but doubles during nighttime.

SChinese: 宫古芳香是尸体，所以有些害怕阳光。
English: As a Jiang Shi, Yoshika is afraid of sunshine.

SChinese: 妹红化为凤凰对目标位置进行猛烈的冲撞。并对目标位置周围的敌人以及自身造成伤害。
English: Turn into a phoenix and dive at the target point, exploding and dealing damage to enemies and yourself.

SChinese: 这个技能可以用来自杀。
English: Can be used to deny yourself.

SChinese: 额外造成最大生命值%damage_wanbaochui%%%的魔法伤害，冷却时间变为4秒，击杀少女后刷新本技能。
English: Extra deals %damage_wanbaochui%%% of her max health to damage, and reduces cooldown to 4 seconds. Refreshes when kills an enemy girl.

SChinese: 每次攻击提升攻击速度，并有%ability_chance_base%%%概率打出火炎爆炸，造成额外的魔法伤害。
English: Each attack will increase your attack speed, and has a chance to cause a small explosion with extra damage.

SChinese: 每层攻击速度增加效果之间是独立的。
English: Each attack speed stack is independent of each other.

SChinese: 在熊熊的火焰之中，妹红化为凤凰之卵，之后从灰烬中满血重生。凤凰之卵受到少女的一次普通攻击就会击碎，凤凰卵被击碎的同时，妹红死亡。
English: Turn yourself into a phoenix egg that will hatch and resurrect you with full health. The egg can be destroyed by a single attack from an enemy girl. If it is destroyed, Mokou dies.

SChinese: 妹红以生命为代价让凤凰附体，在%duration%秒内获得让人恐惧的战斗力和无限的生命回复力，提高移动速度和攻击力，提升爆炸伤害。
English: Said power sacrifices some of your current health to significantly increase your health regeneration, movement speed, attack damage, and explosion damage.

SChinese: 惜命「不死之身的舍身击」
刷新不死「火鸟-凤翼天翔-」的冷却时间，但在持续时间内降低一半对敌方伤害，并且增加一倍对自己的伤害。
English: Resets the cooldown of「Fire Bird -Flying Phoenix-」, but the spell deals half damage to enemies and double damage to Mokou in the duration.

SChinese: 施放不死「火鸟-凤翼天翔-」后会消除此效果。

English: This effect will be consumed after casting「Fire Bird -Flying Phoenix-」

SChinese: 击杀少女后刷新本技能。
English: Refreshes when kills an enemy girl.

SChinese:
召唤两只白狼天狗巡逻队的同伴。当天狗同伴在犬走附近的情况下，会得到惊人的恢复力。等级3和4的白狼在不攻击时永久隐身。
白狼天狗：
基础血量：400[+等级x200]
基础护甲：2.00[+等级x1]
基础攻击力：24-24[+等级x14]
攻击范围：100
攻击间隔：1.3
移动速度：350
English:
Summons two white wolves. White wolves gain bonus regeneration while near to Momiji. At level 3 and 4, white wolves gain invisibility as long as they are not attacking.\n

White Wolf Stats:

HEALTH: 600/800/1000/1200
ARMOR: 3/4/5/6
DAMAGE: 38/52/66/80
ATTACK RANGE: 100
BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.3
MOVE SPEED: 350

SChinese: 额外+1白狼召唤数，白狼天狗增加50%%基础移速
用极强的视力，听力与嗅觉，捕捉敌人的信息。获得目标位置周围的视野和真实视野。处在其中的敌方单位将暴露破绽，任何单位攻击它们都将有概率暴击。非犬走椛控制的单位只拥有一半的暴击概率\n真实视野范围为作用范围的一半
English: Momiji uses her sharp senses of vision, hearing, and smell to capture enemy information. Grants vision and True Sight of the target area.\nEnemy units inside the target area will have their weak points exposed, granting any unit attacking them a chance for critical strikes. Units not controlled by Momiji have only half the critical strike chance.\nTrue Sight radius is half the total vision radius.

SChinese:
被动：

每当椛受到来自正面的物理伤害时，她就挥舞那面天狗护盾来格挡一定百分比的伤害。\n

主动：

盾击目标，使其眩晕，以等待同伴支援。
English:
Passive:

Momiji wields her shield to block a portion of all physical damage she takes from the front.\n

Active:

Bashes the target with her shield, stunning them.

SChinese: 为了守护妖怪山的安全，提高%radius%范围内友方单位的移速与攻击速度，且自身移动速度获得额外加成。
English: Increases move speed and attack speed for all nearby allied units within %radius% range. Provides increased movement speed to nearby wolves and herself.

SChinese: 可被破坏。\n万宝槌升级获得的主动效果可以被驱散。
犬走椛带领所有队友向胜利冲锋，所有友方少女达到极限移动速度，并且无视地形移动。
English: Momiji leads her allies into a vicious charge, causing them to move through units and impassable terrains at max speed.

SChinese: 对周围的敌人造成%damage%点魔法伤害，附加沉默%duration%秒。
English: Mystia hoots to deal damage to nearby enemies and silence them for a short time.

SChinese: 提升自己与周围单位的攻击速度与移动速度。\n夜晚自己获得双倍攻击速度与移动速度。
English: Mystia sings to increase the movement and attack speed of herself and nearby allies. Effect is doubled during nighttime.

SChinese: 被动：提升米斯蒂娅%magic_resistence%%%点魔法抗性。\n\n当米斯蒂娅或周围%radius%范围内有友方少女释放技能时，有%chance%%%的概率回复%restoredmana%点魔法。
English:
Passive:

Passively grants increased magic resistance.

Whenever Mystia or an allied girl within %radius% range casts a spell, there is a %chance%%% chance to restore some mana.

SChinese: 提供魔抗的效果无法被破坏。（暂时）
English: The magic resistance component cannot be broken. (Temporary)

SChinese:
对周围%range%范围内的敌方单位和敌方建筑造成%damage%点伤害。
同时降低他们%movespeeddown%%的移动速度与%attackspeeddown%点攻击速度。并附加夜盲效果：

对于英雄：遮挡屏幕
如果是白天，降低他们%dayvision%点视野。
如果是夜晚，降低他们%nightvision%点视野。

对于小兵与防御塔：
完全丧失视野，并且无法攻击。

持续%duration%秒。
English:
Mystia deals damage to enemy units in %range% radius, slows their movement and attack speed, and blinds them.

Enemy girls have %dayvision% reduced vision range during daytime or %nightvision% reduced vision range during nighttime.

Creeps and buildings are completely blinded and unable to attack.

SChinese: 减速与减攻速效果可被驱散，但夜盲效果无法驱散。
English: The movement and attack speed slow is dispellable, but the blindness is not.

SChinese: 夜盲时若遭受攻击，会得到以自己为中心的一小部分视野
English: Girls which are attacked while blinded regain a small amount of vision around themselves.

SChinese: 施放时召唤黑夜，并刷新所有基础技能冷却。
English: Summons night and refreshes the cooldown of all basic abilities when cast.

SChinese:
被动：

当米斯蒂娅攻击等级比自己低的少女或野怪时，会附加额外伤害。\n而受到等级比自己高的少女或野怪攻击时，则会被附加额外一半的伤害。

伤害公式： %base% + %rate% * (二者等级差+米斯蒂娅等级)\n

主动：

进入飞行状态4秒，期间获得空中视野且可以无视地形移动。
English:
Passive:

When Mystia attacks an enemy girl or jungle creep whose level is lower than hers, she deals additional magical damage.\nWhen she is attacked by an enemy girl or jungle creep whose level is higher than hers, she take half that damage from the attacker.

DAMAGE FORMULA: %base% + %rate% * (Level Difference + Mystia's Level)\n

Active:

Mystia spreads her wings, flying over terrain and gaining flying vision for 4 seconds.

SChinese: 远古单位计算等级时视为其等级的两倍。\n另外夜雀在白天的视野要比其他少女低，但在晚上的视野要比其他少女高。\n飞行持续时间可以叠加。
English: Ancients are considered twice their level during damage calculations.\nMystia has reduced vision during daytime but increased vision at night compared to other girls.\n The flying duration can be stacked.

SChinese: 在飞行持续时间内，米斯蒂娅计算等级时增加1级。
English: Increase the level of Mystia during damage calculations while flying.

SChinese: 改造「幻想推进器」，使其功率大幅提升，飞行期间使用者的其他技能冷却时间减少%wbc_cd_reduce_pct%%%。但是飞行结束后，使用者会陷入短暂眩晕。
English: Alter 「Phantasmal Boosters」, and its power will be increased significantly. In this time, the cooldown of user's other abilities will be reduced %wbc_cd_reduce_pct%%% in the period of flying, but the user will be stunned after flying.

SChinese: 向前方发射阳电子炮造成%damage%法术伤害，每击中一个目标降低%damage_reduce%%%伤害，并震晕敌人，减少敌人%movement_slow%%%移动速度，持续%duration%秒。\n对建筑造成%building_reduce%%%伤害\n智力加成%intellect_bonus%
English: Fires the photon cannon causing %damage% damage, reduced by %damage_reduce%%% for each enemy hit, and reduces their movement speed by %movement_slow%%% for %duration% seconds.\nDeals %building_reduce%%% damage to buildings.

SChinese:
被动:

每次使用技能后攻击力增加%outdamage_bonus%%%，下一次攻击会扩散至%radius%范围并消耗掉这个效果。\n

主动:

挥击光剑对附近单位造成%magical_bonus%法术伤害，\n伤害受到（攻击力 * %attack_bonus%）与（智力 * %intellect_bonus%）加成。
English:
Passive:

Increases attack damage dealt by %outdamage_bonus%%% when Nitori uses a skill. The next attack consumes the buff and cleaves for %damage_percent%%% in a %radius% radius.\n

Active:

Swings her lightsaber to deal %magical_bonus% magic damage to nearby units. Scales based on attack damage and intelligence.

SChinese: 发射河童战斗机甲装备的浮游炮对指定目标进行无规则直线范围攻击，如果目标被消灭则攻击附近其他敌人，持续%duration%秒。\n浮游炮的每次攻击对%range%范围溅射%disintegration%倍法术伤害。
English: Launches the aerial cannons in the Kappa Combat Mech's arsenal to attack the target. If the target dies, the lasers will redirect to nearby enemies. Lasts %duration% seconds.\nThe aerial cannon lasers deal %disintegration%x splash damage within a %range% radius.

SChinese: 能源「 超负荷瓜装甲」
装甲将河童的能源互相转换\n河童每1点智力增加%damage_bonus%点攻击力\n河童每1点攻击增加%spell_bonus%点技能伤害加成
English: The Kappa Combat Mech converts its various energies into other useful forms.\nEach point of intelligence increases her attack damage by %damage_bonus%.\nEach point of attack damage increases her spell amplification by %spell_bonus%.

SChinese:
封兽能对任何人施加恶梦伤害，每一次封兽所造成的伤害皆会附加额外法术伤害。附加比例视该伤害所造成的原由而定。主动施展时，效果会提升一倍，持续时间与技能冷却时间相同。
普通攻击：附加该技能伤害的%damage_percent%倍伤害
正体判定：附加该技能伤害的2倍伤害
赖政之弓：附加该技能伤害的3倍伤害
正体不明：附加该技能伤害的4倍伤害
English:
Nue passively amplifies her damage with this spell. Can be activated to double the bonuses granted.\nAttacks gain %damage_percent% times this skill's damage.

「Will-o'-wisps in Unidentified Orbit」gains 2 times this skill's damage.

「The Bow of Genzanmi Yorimasa」gains 3 times this skill's damage.

「Rainbow UFO Invasion of Terror」gains 4 times this skill's damage.
Grudge Bow「The Bow of Genzanmi Yorimasa」

SChinese: 射出满载仇恨的强力一箭，被穿透者会受到巨额法术伤害。
English: Nue shoots an arrow of hatred forward, deals damage to enemies on its path.

SChinese: 恨弓每次命中减少敌方12%%魔抗和12%%移速，持续12s，可叠加。若命中少女，则下一击冷却时间减少3秒，连续击中效果减半。
English: The Grudge Bow reduces 12%% magic resistance and 12%% movement speed on targets for each stack. Debuff lasts for 12s. Cooldown is reduced by 3 if hitting enemy girls, and the continuous hit effect is halved.

SChinese:
击杀单位时，会增加额外经验值。
击杀少女时，会重置技能冷却时间。

等级1：能重置「正体判定」及「平安京之恶梦」。
等级2：附加重置恨弓「源三位赖政之弓」。
等级3：附加重置正体不明「恐怖的虹色UFO袭来」。
等级4：附加重置物品。
English:
Nue gets bonus experience from killing enemy units.\nWhen Nue kills an enemy girl, some of her cooldowns will be reset.\nLEVEL 1: Resets「Will-o'-wisps in Unidentified Orbit」and「Nightmare of Heiankyou」

LEVEL 2: Resets「The Bow of Genzanmi Yorimasa」

LEVEL 3: Resets「Rainbow UFO Invasion of Terror」

LEVEL 4: Resets item cooldowns.

SChinese: 指定一个目标位置，从太空撞下去，造成范围巨大法术伤害并晕眩。引导%AbilityCastPoint%秒后，1.5秒延迟砸下。
English: Nue designates a target area, launches herself up into space, then crashes into the area, dealing significant damage and stunning enemies inside.\nThe launch takes %AbilityCastPoint%s which can be cancelled, then crashes into the ground after a 1.5s delay.

SChinese: 指定一个单位，若该单位为非正体的幻象，会直接消灭，并刷新正体判定。\n若该单位为正体的少女，则让其受到45点法术伤害。
English: Nue uses will-o'-wisps to deals damage to an enemy. If the target is an illusion, it is destroyed instantly and this spell's cooldown is reset.\nIf the target is real, they take 45 magical damage.

SChinese:
水桥嫉妒所有有同伴的敌人。

被动：

使附近范围内每多一名敌方少女，其所受的负面状态持续时间提升。

主动：

发射绿色弹幕，对目标小范围造成法术伤害，该伤害随目标附近的敌方少女增加。 每多一名敌方少女伤害提升%passive_damage%%%、被动效果提升%passive_percent%%%。
English:
Parsee is jealous of enemies in companion.

Passive:

Reduces nearby enemies' status resistance by %passive_percent%%% for every enemy girls nearby.

Active:

Fires green barrages to deal damage to the target enemy and enemies nearby. This damage increases by %passive_damage%%% for every enemy girls nearby.

SChinese: 如果目标是敌方少女，则计算额外伤害时她本身也会计算在内。
在目标位詈从天降下%number%颗嫉妒的炸药，被炸弹所击中的单位攻击和移动速度均会被降低。\n炸弹未命中会返回%return_mana%%%消耗的魔法。
English: Drops %number% bombs at the target position one by one, slowing and dealing damage to enemies hit.\nRestores %return_mana%%% of mana cost for each missing bomb.

SChinese: 嫉妒「看不见的绿眼怪兽」

召唤出看不见本体的绿眼怪兽进行猛烈攻击，每次攻击造成物理及法术伤害，并有%change%%%几率眩晕目标%stun_time%秒，绿眼怪兽存在%duration%秒。
物理伤害：%phy_damage%[+水桥智力*%phy_int%]
法术伤害：%magic_damage%[+水桥智力*%mag_int%]
攻击范围：%attack_range%
攻击间隔：%attack_interval%
怪兽生命值：%dummy_health%
移动速度：%movement%
无法对建筑造成伤害。
English:
Summons unrecognizable green-eyed monsters to launch a fierce attack. Each attack from green-eyed monsters deals physical and magical damage, and has %change%%% chance to stun the target for %stun_time% seconds. The green-eyed monsters exist for %duration% seconds.
Physical Damage: %phy_damage% + intelligence * %phy_int%
Magical Damage: %magic_damage% + intelligence * %mag_int%
Attack Range: %attack_range%
Base Attack Time: %attack_interval%
Health: %dummy_health%
Movement Speed: %movement%
Green-eyed monsters deal no damage to buildings.
Malice Sign「Day 7 of the Shrine Visits in the Dead of Night」

SChinese:
水桥指定一个目标单位，在目标单位的位置生成一个诅咒木偶，每秒吸取目标的生命值传递给水桥，在以下条件下:
--木偶或水桥在时限内死亡。
--目标或水桥远离木偶一定范围。
给予该单位法术伤害。
如果%duration%秒时限结束时，不达到以上任何一个条件则诅咒会被启动，给予目标%damage_bonus%倍法术伤害和%stun_time%秒眩晕。
English:
Sets a cursed doll above the target, absorbing her health continuously and transmitting it to Parsee. Deals damage to the target when one of the conditions below is met in next %duration% seconds:
--Parsee or the doll dies in the duration.
--The distance between Parsee or the target and the doll is farther than a certain distance.
Stuns the target for %stun_time% seconds and deals %damage_bonus% times of damage to the target at the end of duration if no condition above is met.

SChinese: 吸取生命为纯粹伤害。\n无法对技能免疫目标施放，但是所有效果均无视技能免疫。\n诅咒木偶吸取生命的效果无法驱散，可被强驱散的是结束时的眩晕效果。
舌切雀「对谦虚之富者的仇恨」
English: Tongue-Cut Sparrow「Hate for the Humble and Rich」

SChinese: 当水桥的生命值低于%limit_health%%%时，会强制水桥消失及无敌%invin_time%秒，其后会产生一个分身。分身受到%inout_damage%%%的伤害，造成%inout_damage%%%的伤害，持续%duration%秒。\n当分身被击破时，对%radius%范围内的敌方单位造成[%damage%+少女等级*%lv_damage%]点的法术伤害。
English: When Parsee's health falls below %limit_health%%%, she will disappear and get invincible for %invin_time% seconds, then creates an image when appears again.The image suffers damage by %inout_damage%%% and deals damage by %inout_damage%%%. The image exists for %duration% seconds at most.\nThe image explodes when killed, dealing damage to enemies within %radius% by (%damage% + Parsee's level * %lv_damage%).

SChinese: 指定一个友方少女，使其成为被水桥嫉妒的对象，额外受伤%wanbaochui_income_damage%%%。水桥额外获取被嫉妒者击杀获取的金币的一半，被嫉妒击杀单位额外增加%wanbaochui_gold%金币。同时水桥的被动转移到被嫉妒者身上，当触发被动效果后，技能结束。
English: Parsee is going to be jealous of a certain ally girl, increasing damage taken by her by %wanbaochui_income_damage%%%. Parsee gains half of the target's earning gold from killing, and the target gains %wanbaochui_gold% gold on every kill. The effect of「Hate for the Humble and Rich」is shifted to the target, but the jealousy will get invalid after「Hate for the Humble and Rich」triggers.

SChinese: 万宝槌被嫉妒者击杀增加金币：
English: Miracle Mallet Upgrade Gold Bonus on Every Kill:
Miracle Mallet Upgrade Taking Damage Increase:

SChinese: 增加移动速度。\n每级增加3%\n适合于控制
English: Bonus move speed\n3% per level\nFor disable

SChinese: 延迟1.0秒后造成地震，对范围内目标造成眩晕和伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Patchouli shakes the earth of the target region, causes earthquake 1s later, deals damage and stun to enemies in the area.\nCast range: 700

SChinese: 增加基础攻击力。\n每级增加6点\n适合于进攻
English: Bounus attack damage\n6 damage per level\nFor damage

SChinese: 创造环形障碍并对敌方造成伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\nAOE范围：300
English: Patchouli instantly creates a round impassable ridge and deals damage to enemies inside it.\nCast range: 650\nRadius: 300

SChinese: 召唤元素辅助作战，持续60秒，火元素章鱼基础魔抗50%，夜晚视野1050。\n火等级达到5级同时召唤两个。
English: Pathouli forges fire element spirits to fight for her, spirits lives for 60s, has 50% magic resistance and 1050 night vision.\nForging two spirits when Lv「Fire」 is greater than 4.

SChinese: 元素攻击力：30 + 火元素等级*
元素生命值：400 + 火元素等级*
攻击建筑时造成75%额外伤害
English: Deals extra 75% damage when attacking buildings

SChinese:
对敌方目标法力燃烧并按比例造成伤害，对友方则增加攻击力和攻击速度。
基础法力燃烧：目标当前法力值*0.25
额外法力燃烧：%mana_damage%+%metal_multiple%*金元素等级
施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Patchouli burns mana and deals damage to an enemy girl, or increase attack damage and speed of an ally.
Base mana burn: 75
Extra mana burn: mana of the target*(%mana_damage%+%metal_multiple%*Lv「metal」)
Cast range: 700

SChinese: 目标单位上方降下火雨，使目标附近持续受到伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Pathouli rains phlogiston to the target, deals damage to the target and units nearby.\nCast Range: 700

SChinese: 延迟2秒后燃起大火，持续对范围内目标造成魔法伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n如果范围内存在树木或藤蔓，则伤害增加50%
English: Pathouli flames the target region, 2s later the region goes on fire and deals damage to enemy units stand on it.\nCast Range: 800\nWhen there are trees or vines in the region, damage will be amplified for 50%%.

SChinese: 缩短延迟时间：木元素等级*
增加护甲。\n每级增加2点\n适合于进攻
English: Bonus armor\n2 armor per level\nFor damage

SChinese: 召唤巨石，吸引敌方靠近并且造成伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Patchouli summons megalith to move forward, drags enemy units on its path and deals damage.\nCast range: 700

SChinese: 大幅加速金属疲劳过程，目标在持续时间内每次进行移动，都会减少护甲并根据移动距离造成物理伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Patchouli accelerates fatigue of metallic armor. If the target moves, she takes damage and armor reduction based on the distance moved.\nCast range: 900

SChinese: 伤害百分比：金元素等级*5 +
增加魔法回复速度。\n每级增加2点\n适合于辅助
English: Bonus mana regeneration\n2 mana regeneration per level\nFor support

SChinese: 发出一道巨浪，击退路线上的敌人，使其进入沉默/缴械状态，并造成伤害。
English: Patchouli shoots a gush of water, knocks back enemies on its path, disarms and silences them, and deals damage to them.

SChinese: 击退距离：100 + 土元素等级*
最远距离：500 + 水元素等级*
向周围扩散出12道巨浪，造成的伤害增加50%
English: The deluge becomes radial and deals 50%% extra damage.

SChinese: 对300范围内持续造成伤害并减少魔抗。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Patchouli sprays mercury poison to the target region, ruduces magic resistance of enemies on it and deals damage to them.\nCast range: 700

SChinese: 使300范围内单位沉默并减速。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Patchouli slows down and silences enemies in the target region.\nCast range: 700

SChinese: 回复目标生命值和法力值。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Patchouli restores HP and mana of an ally.\nCast range: 600

SChinese: 增加生命回复速度。\n每级增加2点\n适合于辅助
English: Bonus HP regeneration\n2 HP regeneration per level\nFor support

SChinese: 召唤藤蔓缠绕目标,并持续造成伤害。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Patchouli roots an enemy unit with vines and deals damage.\nCast range: 700

SChinese: 向目标方向1200范围内放出飞锯，对碰到的第一个敌人造成伤害，并为自己按伤害的比例回复生命值。\n可以对树木作用回复生命。
English: Patchouli shoot a saw blade forward, deals damage to the first enemy units on its path and regenerates HP for herself based on the damage.\nHitting trees can also regenerate HP for Patchouli.

SChinese: 增加目标移动速度。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English: Patchouli speeds up an ally.\nCast range: 600

SChinese:
帕秋莉能用元素合成魔法，每施放一个合成魔法，可以增加一个贤者之石，并重置所有贤者之石存在时间至3.25秒，内置冷却0.25秒。当贤者之石达到5个之后，会立刻触发日/月符。
白天触发日符「皇家烈焰」，对800范围内敌方英雄造成20%%最大生命值魔法伤害。
晚上触发月符「沉静的月神」，1200范围内友方英雄恢复帕秋莉10%%最大魔法值的生命和魔法，施加隐身，并降低所受伤害25%%，持续10秒。
帕秋莉享受日/月元素加成，白天提高技能增强10%%，晚上受到伤害降低10%%
English:
Patchouli can combine elements to synthesize elemental magic.
When Patchouli casts a synthesized spell, she accumulates Philosopher's Stone for 4s. When Patchouli gets 5 stacks of Philosopher's Stone, she immediately casts Sun Sign or Moon Sign.
In the day time, she casts Sun Sign 「Royal Flare」, deals 20%% maximum health as magical damage to enemy girls in 800 range.
At night, she casts Moon Sign 「Silent Selena」, allied girls in 1200 range restore 10%% of Patchouli's maximum mana to their health and mana, turn to invisible and reduces 25%% damage taken.
Patchouli gets 10%% damage amplification in day time with Element 「sun」 and reduces 10%% damage taken at night with Element 「moon」.
Shiki Brilliance「Charming Siege from All Sides」

SChinese:
在目标位置立下一支四面楚歌之旗，旗帜附近的友军会得到额外的攻击速度，敌军会被降低攻击速度。旗为无敌单位，旧旗会被新旗覆盖。

若施展此技能时指向军旗，蓝会与军旗的位置互换。
插下旗帜不会使该技能进入冷却。
English:
Ran plants a flag at the target location, causing allies nearby to gain bonus attack speed while enemies get reduced attack speed. The flag is invincible, and planting a new flag removes the old flag.

If the spell is cast on an existing flag, Ran will swap positions with it instead.

Planting a flag does not cause the skill to go on cooldown.

SChinese: 蓝施展一道光环，大幅降低附近敌人的移动速度。
English: Ran deploys an aura which greatly reduces the movement speed of nearby enemies.

SChinese: 九尾妖狐可以弹射激光。蓝射出一道激光，在敌人之间弹射，并造成伤害。
English: Ran shoots out a laser that bounces between enemies and deals damage to them.

SChinese: 魔法燃烧目标智力加成：
+%bonus_jump_count%弹射次数，每次弹射减少敌方少女魔法，根据目标智力加成，但会额外消耗%bonus_AbilityManaCost%倍魔法
English: Bounces %bonus_jump_count% additional times, and each hit on an enemy girl reduces their mana, scaling based on their intelligence. However, the spell costs %bonus_AbilityManaCost%x as much mana.

SChinese: 蓝保佑周围的友军，赋予他们额外护甲和生命恢复。
English: Ran blesses and protects nearby allies, granting them increased armor and health regeneration.

SChinese: 铃仙射出一发子弹并快速的向后退，当子弹击中目标时，后退停止。
铃仙将狂气蓄积在手中，使自己的子弹和激光在击中目标时造成范围伤害和眩晕。
铃仙从眼中放出激光对前方进行扫射，对被扫射到的敌人造成伤害。
铃仙放出五发子弹，对被子弹击中的敌人造成伤害。
铃仙的子弹或激光击中对方时，会产生一个幻象对目标进行攻击。幻象一共有5发子弹，每发子弹造成40点伤害。
被动增加铃仙的攻击距离。
铃仙的攻击中有%ability_chance_base%%%概率制造分身。分身也有%ability_chance_illusion%%%概率制造分身。分身受到%illusion_damage_in_pct%%%伤害，持续%illusion_duration%秒。主动使用立即制造两个分身。最多同时存在%max_illusions%个分身。
English:
Passive:

Reisen has the chance of %ability_chance_base%%% to create an illusion with her attack. Illusions have a chance of %ability_chance_illusion%%% to create a new illusion with their attacks. Illusions last for %illusion_duration%s and takes %illusion_damage_in_pct%%% damage. There are %max_illusions% illusions at most.\n

Active:

Creates two illusions.

SChinese: 铃仙展开令敌人认识狂乱的波长。敌人将会看到本身不应该出现的东西。拥有将虚像的射击化作实弹的效果。
蓄力%AbilityChannelTime%秒后射出威力巨大的一击，对直线上的单位造成物理伤害并触发「丧心丧意」。\n蓄力时间决定最终伤害，如果完全蓄力，则使得被击中的单位在5秒内被铃仙和其幻象攻击时必定触发「丧心丧意」。
English: Reisen charges for %AbilityChannelTime%s, then shoots a powerful bullet forward, dealing physical damage on its path and triggers「Demotivation」.\n If the shoot is fully channeled, Reisen and her illusions 100%% triggers「Demotivation」with their attacks on enemies shot by「Rocket in Mist」.

SChinese: 使胧月花栞伤害类型转为魔法，并使目标击退%block_back%码，蓄力满额后额外造成%damage_bonus%%%伤害，冷却时间-%reduce_time%秒
English: 「Rocket in Mist」deals magical damage instead. Reduces cooldown for %reduce_time%s. Knocks back enemies for %block_back% range. Deals additional %damage_bonus%%% damage when fully channeled.

SChinese: 主动：铃仙迅速进入隐身，获得相位移动状态，并在一定时间内本体增加攻速，拥有100%%概率制造分身和触发「丧心丧意」。\n被动：增加「丧心丧意」触发几率。
English:
Passive:

Increase chance for「Demotivation」.\n

Active:

Reisen turns invisible, gaining unit phasing and increasing her attack speed. Reisen and her illusions 100%% creates new illusions and triggers「Demotivation」with their attacks.

SChinese: 铃仙广范围释放令敌人陷入疯狂的波长漩涡,威力极其优秀。
铃仙的攻击有%ability_chance_base%%%的概率发射带有破坏精神的弹丸，造成0.5倍敏捷的伤害并降低敌人的命中和移动速度，持续%move_slow_duration%秒。\n对建筑伤害为30%%。
English: Reisen has the chance of %ability_chance_base%%% to shoot demotivated bullets with her attack, slows down the movement speed of the target, makes her attack miss, and deals 0.5*agility damage to her. Debuff lasts for %move_slow_duration%s.\nDeals 30%% damage to buildings.

SChinese: 铃仙让敌人承受狂气的视线，令敌人暂时陷入混乱状态。

主动:

750范围内对目标进行冲锋并造成一次伤害和减速，在攻击到敌人或者做出任意指令时速度加成取消。（可以对自身以及队友释放)
English: Charges any target unit, dealing damage and slowing their movement speed if the target is an enemy. After reaching the targeted unit or issuing any command, the dash is cancelled.\nCan be cast on herself and allies.

SChinese: 迅捷的一击带着无匹的力量，敲碎一切敌人的脑壳。
English: A quick strike with immense power to smash the skulls of any enemy.

SChinese: 减速效果可以被驱散，加速效果不可驱散，（对自身使用时，移速加成持续时间缩短到1秒。）
English: The slow is dispellable, but the dash is not. (When cast on self, the dash is shortened to one second.)

SChinese: 降低冷却时间到%scepter_cd%秒，提升施法距离 %scepter_increase%。
English: Reduces cooldown to %scepter_cd% seconds and increases cast range by %scepter_increase%.

SChinese:
主动:

持续时间内转移所有伤害，折射%reflect_percent%%%伤害。
English: Deflect all damage taken for the duration, reflecting %reflect_percent%%% of the damage back at nearby enemies.

SChinese: 仿造辉夜姬天之羽衣的作品，尽管只能维持一瞬，仍能绽放其芳华。
English: Though it only imitates Princess Kaguya's Lunar Veil, and only lasts for but a moment, it still blooms with its full splendor.

SChinese: 可以被驱散。\n折射伤害为税后伤害，伤害为来源类型。
English: Dispellable.\nDispersed damage the same damage type as the original damage.

SChinese: 增加一个充能点，并且施放的时候对自身强驱散。
English: Adds an extra charge to Lunar Veil, and Lunar Veil applies a strong dispel to Reisen when cast.

SChinese:
被动:

每过一段时间的下次一次攻击，造成额外纯粹伤害并回复生命值，每次攻击敌人或被敌人攻击，都将减少一秒所需时间。
English: Empowers your attacks with additional pure damage every few seconds and heals you for a portion of the extra pure damage dealt. The cooldown is reduced by 1 second every time you attack an enemy or are attacked by an enemy.

SChinese: 勤练带来力量，自律已有成果。
English: With practice comes strength, and self-discipline bears fruit.

SChinese: 无法被破坏。\n冷却完毕时即刻攻击，额外攻击不会触发分裂。
English: Attack instantly after the cooldown, extra attack can not cleave.

SChinese: 攻击防御塔时，可以造成一次纯粹伤害，
English: Deals only 1 pure damage to towers.

SChinese:
被动:

攻击附带650范围分裂。于每5级获得升级，初始一级，满级4级。
English: Attacks cleave enemy units within 650 range. Starts at level 1, gaining another level every 5th level, to a maximum of level 4.

SChinese: 月都制式兵器，高科技的应用之下，每次挥舞都会带来腥风血雨。
English: Standard-issue Lunarian weapons, through the application of advanced technology, can cause a bloodbath with every swing.

SChinese: 输入(-reisen2w 或者 -reisen2b)更换颜色。\n可以被破坏。
English: You can enter (-reisen2w or -reisen2b) to change the color.

SChinese:
主动:

激活后增加攻速移速，每次攻击少女，增加持续时间。
English: Increases Reisen's attack speed and movement speed. Whenever you attack an enemy girl, the effect is extended.

SChinese: 面对内心中最深沉的罪恶吧！
English: Face the deepest sins of your heart！
Self buff and taunt effects cannot be dispelled.

SChinese: 每次攻击持续时间增加：
蕾米莉亚召唤冈格尼尔之枪，并向前射出，命中一名敌方少女后会引发小型爆炸，造成伤害和眩晕。
English: Conjure an image of said legendary weapon and throw it at the target. It will explode when it hits an enemy girl, stunning and dealing damage to enemies nearby.

SChinese: 蕾米莉亚将灵气收束成枪状，以超高初速投掷而出。花样繁多的枪状灵气系技能之一。
蕾米莉亚向前俯身，蓄力X(最大为0.5)秒，向前方最远1500码位置跳跃，抓取落地点130范围内一名少女，然后迅速返回。
English: Gather your powers for [0 - 0.5 sec] to leap forward [0 - 1500] distance, grab the enemy girl and pounce right back with them in haul.
Doubles the grabbing area and deals 400 magical damage.

SChinese: 吸血鬼血统赋予蕾米利亚变身成蝙蝠的能力，在此期间不可被选中，迅速对周围的敌人展开攻击，并致盲他们，减速并且攻击有概率丢失。
English: Use vampiric blood to transform into a devil bat and quickly lacerate your enemies, and blinding them, causing them to slow and have a chance to miss attacks.

SChinese: 血红色的十字架，血红色的夜晚。对周围的十字型的敌人单位，持续造成巨大的法术伤害。并将%lifesteal_percent%%%的伤害转化为生命值。
English: Burn away nearby enemies with fiery red aura that also drains them of life. Toggled, saps Mana.

SChinese: 红色的灵气看起来如同在燃烧一般，不过那似乎并不是火。
蕾米莉亚向前挥出她的尖爪，击飞前方%radius%范围内的所有敌人。被击飞的敌人在落地后会受到减速。
English: Remilia swings her pointed claws forward, knockback all enemies within %radius% range ahead. knockbacked enemies will be slowed after landing.

SChinese: 直线发射一个车轮,对沿途敌人造成伤害,引爆路径上的怨灵体。
English: Fires a wheel to deal damage to enemies hit. The wheel can detonate <font color='#0000FF'>ASTRAL</font>s along the path.

SChinese: 召唤一圈恨灵形成结界围住范围内的敌人,靠近边界的敌方英雄将会受到持续伤害，并被减速，结界会不断缩小并牵引圈内敌方英雄和怨灵体，直至结界范围缩小为%min_radius%码。
English: Summons a circle of malicious spirits to besiege enemies inside. Deals damage to enemy girls near the border continuously and slows them down.\nThe circle will shrink slowly and drag enemies and <font color='#0000FF'>ASTRAL</font>s inside till the radius of the circle is shrunk to %min_radius%.

SChinese: 变成小猫向目标方向突进，并获得%evasion%%%闪避持续%duration%秒。如果落点%radius%范围内有怨灵体,则引爆怨灵体。
English: Rin transforms herself into a cat and dash to the target point, gaining %evasion%%% Evasion for %duration% seconds. Detonates <font color='#0000FF'>ASTRAL</font>s in %radius% of the landing point.

SChinese:
主动

自身周围生成%num%个尸体妖精，可被攻击，妖精会在%duration%秒后立即死亡并在原地留下怨灵体。\n

被动

燐附近%aura_radius%码内有友方单位死亡时,对死亡单位周围%radius%码造成等同于该单位最大生命值%damage_pct%%%的魔法伤害，引爆怨灵体额外造成目标已损失生命值%ex_damage_pct%%魔法伤害。
English:
Active:

Creates %num% zombie fairies around. These fairies will die in %duration% seconds and leave an ASTRAL.\n

Passive:

When a unit dies in %aura_radius% of Rin, enemies in %radius% of the dead unit will take (%damage_pct%%% of the dead unit's Max Health) magical damage. Increases the explosion damage by %ex_damage_pct%%% of targets' missing Health.

SChinese:
主动

消耗1个怨灵在目标点生成怨灵体,并对目标点%radius%码范围内造成%damage%+力量*1的魔法伤害,怨灵体持续%duration%秒。当燐通过技能引爆怨灵体时，将对怨灵体周围%radius%码造成%damage%+力量*1的法术伤害并眩晕%stun_duration%秒，同时刷新天生冷却。\n

被动

阿燐附近700码内有单位死亡时获得一个怨灵,每个怨灵提供%hp_regen%生命恢复与%speed_bonus%%%移动速度，初始最多携带%limit%个怨灵，附近800码内有英雄单位死亡时，携带上限+%limit_bonus%
English:
Active:

Costs 1 SPIRIT to create an ASTRAL at the target point and deal (%damage%+strength*1) magical damage to enemies in %radius%. The ASTRAL lasts up to %duration% seconds. When an ASTRAL is detonated by Rin, the explosion will deal (%damage%+strength*1) magical damage to enemies in %radius% and stun them for %stun_duration% seconds. This spell will be refreshed as well.

Passive:

Rin gains a SPIRIT when a unit in 800 dies. Each SPIRIT grants %hp_regen% hp regen and %speed_bonus%%% movement speed. Rin can hold %limit% SPIRITs at most. The limit increases by %limit_bonus% on girls' death in 800.

SChinese:
燐推着猫车瞄准一个单位或地点冲刺，装入路上遇见的任何少女、尸体妖精和怨灵体，被装入的单位视为被缠绕。

再次施放技能会将车推出去，令车上单位处于眩晕状态，对路径上敌方单位造成伤害和%stun_duration%秒眩晕并在终点爆炸造成%radius%范围伤害和%stun_duration%秒眩晕。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Rin dashes aiming a unit or point with carting, loading girls and ASTRALs hit onto the cart.

Releases again to push the cart away, stunning enemies on the cart and dealing damage to enemies along the path. When the cart reaches the destination, it will explode and deal damage to enemies in %radius%. They will be stunned for %stun_duration% seconds as well.
Darkness Sign「Dark Side of the Moon」

SChinese: 露米亚运用控制黑暗的能力，使周围变的一片漆黑，敌人将无法找到她的身影。在熟悉的黑暗中露米亚会更为强悍，获得最大生命百分比恢复和%evasion%%%闪避。\n（露米娅任何动作不显隐）
English: Rumia's trademark spell which envelops her in darkness, making her invisible, more evasive, and granting bonus health regeneration.

SChinese: 露米娅是个连光都对其退避三舍的暗黑妖怪
English: Rumia is a dark youkai that even light avoids.

SChinese: 真视视野仍能发现露米娅。
English: True Sight still grants vision of Rumia.

SChinese: 露米娅带有嗜血的本性。攻击敌人时，降低敌人移动速度%duration%秒，并且每%think_interval%秒对其造成一次纯粹伤害。\n此外，露米娅的攻击有%crit_chance%%%几率产生暴击。
English:
Rumia's bloodthirsty nature makes her attacks bleed enemies, slowing them and dealing pure damage every %think_interval% seconds for %duration% seconds.

She also gains critical strike chance.

SChinese: 附带的纯粹伤害对建筑和远古无效。减速和暴击无法被破坏。（暂时）
English: The pure damage has no effect on buildings or Ancients.
The slow and critical chance cannot be broken. (Temporary)

SChinese: 熟悉黑暗的露米娅，在夜里更能发挥出她的潜力。被动提升攻击速度及移动速度。
English: Rumia's familiarity with darkness allows her to be more effective during nighttime. Passively increases her movement and attack speed.

SChinese: 拿一个东西来开饭。每吃掉一个单位增加%str_gain%点力量。英雄增加%hero_str_gain%点力量。如果露米娅死亡，则会损失%lost_strength_percent%%%吃到的额外加成。
English:
Takes a big bite out of the target, which instantly kills creeps and deals pure damage to other units. Heals Rumia for a portion of the health the victim lost.

Each successful kill grants permanent extra strength, %lost_strength_percent%%% of which is lost upon death. Creeps grant %str_gain% strength, while girls grant %hero_str_gain% strength.

SChinese: 攻击时%eat_chance%%%概率触发「是~这样~吗~」，对少女造成一半伤害，不叠加力量。
English: Rumia has a chance of %eat_chance%%% to cast「Is~ Dat~ So~」whenever she attacks. Only deals half damage to girls and does not grant any bonus strength when killing.

SChinese: 稀神探女使用影响现实的诅咒使敌人受到伤害并沉默。
English: Sagume curses her ememy, causing the emeny to be damaged and silenced.

SChinese: 稀神探女闪烁至目标位置，并在%bounce_duration%秒内获得弹射攻击的能力，每次攻击会在目标周围%bounce_range%范围内随机弹射，每次弹射伤害都会降低。
English: Sagume blinks to the target location and grants her attacks to bounce between enemies in %bounce_duration% seconds. Each attacks randomly bounce within a %bounce_range% radius of the target and deal less damage with each bounce.

SChinese: 弹射攻击只继承「众神的弹冠」的效果。
English: Bounces only work with「Shotgun Coronation of the Gods」.

SChinese: 减少1次弹射。\n在闪烁起点和落点对%radius%范围内敌人发动一次攻击。
English: Reduces number of bounces by 1.\nAttacks all the enemies within %radius% radius at both her starting and ending locations.
Orb Sign 「Shotgun Coronation of the Gods」

SChinese: 稀神探女赋予攻击以神明的力量，造成基于智力系数的额外伤害。
English: Sagume empower attacks with power of the gods, dealing additional damage based on her Intelligence.

SChinese: 稀神探女使用她强大的能力影响目标少女。\n若目标少女技能处于冷却中状态则刷新该技能。\n若技能处于完全冷却状态则使技能进入冷却。
English: Changes the fate of target girl.\nResets the cooldown on all her abilities in cooldown.\nTraps all her ready abilities in cooldown.

SChinese: 影响物品和充能技能；不影响物品充能。
English: Works on items and charges of abilities; Do not work on charges of items.
「Goddess Who Invites Unfortunate Slips of the Tongue」

SChinese: 稀神探女可以逐渐逆转局势来提升自身智力。\n当敌方少女在稀神探女%limit%范围内阵亡时，稀神探女提升%intellect_bonus%点智力\n若击杀者为稀神探女则无视距离限制。
English: Gain %intellect_bonus% extra intelligence when a girl dies within a range of %limit%.\nSagume can get the extra intelligence outside the radius if the girl is killed by sagume herself.

SChinese: 向指定方向上以超高的速度，投掷一把小刀对敌人造成法术伤害。
English: Throws a time-accelerated knife towards the target point to inflict magic damage.

SChinese: 利用时间暂停的能力，向前方多个方向投掷一排飞刀，对前方扇型区域的敌人造成法术伤害。
English: Using her ability to stop time, Sakuya tosses a fan of knives forward in the target direction.

SChinese: 先投掷出无实体的飞刀，随后其会在轨道上依次实体化后进攻敌人，形成捕捉范围极大的广域弹幕。
English: First throws a flying immaterial knife which begins to materialize in orbit and then attack the enemy, forming a wide-area barrage with a huge area of effect.

SChinese: 利用时间操控，对身边单位投掷飞到后再突出重围，出现在远处，并在6秒内攻击速度提高%attack_speed%。攻击速度提高可以叠加。
English: Stop time to teleport to target point, leaving a ring of knives behind and gaining extra attack speed for 6 sec which can stack up to 4 times.

SChinese: 每层攻速提升效果相互独立。
English: Each stack of the attack speed bonus is independent of each other.

SChinese: <font color='#FFFFFF'>「Private square」</font>效果期间限制刷新6次
English: <font color='#FFFFFF'>「Private Square」</font>can only refresh this spell up to 6 times per cast.

SChinese: 创造一个时间异常的空间，只要自己在这个空间内，则使用的技能皆没有冷却时间，每次使用技能额外消耗百分之25+次数的法力值,每一招技能独立计算。
English: Creates a space-time anomaly around you. As long as you are inside, your spells have no cooldown. Each time you cast a spell, that spell costs 25% more mana for the duration. Each spell's mana cost is independent of each other.

SChinese: 操作时间的顶峰Spell之一。令周围的时间完全停止，可在瞬间内投掷无数的飞刀。
English: One of the strongest spells for manipulating time. The whole world stops, and countless knives can be thrown in a single instant.

SChinese: 开始的2s时间内大幅降低全图所有单位的攻速移速且不再限制刷新范围。
English: Causes the space-time anomaly to affect the entire map. Greatly slows down all other units on the map for the first 2 seconds, and your spells refresh regardless of where you are.

SChinese: 于小刀上刻上时之标记，下一次使用奇术「永恒的小刀」时，会令命中的敌人时间停止（对敌人造成眩晕效果）并附加15点额外伤害，无法重叠。
English: Engrave the mark of time on your knife. The next time you cast「Eternal Meek」, it will stop time for the target for %stun_duration% second (stunning them) and deal 15 extra damage, which cannot stack.

SChinese: 投出带有停止时间作用的时计，命中对手后将会变成咲夜单方面攻击的压倒状态。
English: Throws a stopwatch with a time stop effect which, after hitting the opponent, allows Sakuya to overwhelm them with a one-sided offense.

SChinese: 在目标刮起一阵旋风，在旋风内的敌人会被减速并受到伤害。
English: Summons a whirlwind at the target point that deals damage and slows enemies.

SChinese: 以早苗附近为中心形成巨大旋风的符卡。

English: Deals additional %scepter_bouns%%% damage to enemy girls.
Sea Opening「The Day the Sea Split」

SChinese: 召唤切开大海的摩西奇迹，对敌人造成范围伤害并晕眩。
English: Perform the great miracle of old to damage and stun enemies.
Deals additional %scepter_bouns%%% damage to enemy girls.

SChinese: 增加全地图友军的法力回复。对自己的回复量为双倍
English: Grants extra mana regen to all allied girls. Doubles regeneration for Sanae herself.

SChinese: 早苗教你画星星，让自身和周围的队友进入无敌状态。
English: Deploys a star-shaped barrier around you that makes allies invincible.

SChinese: 该技能不能解除已经受到的负面状态效果。
English: Does not dispel existing status effects.

SChinese: 御神签炸弹/暴乱神签连掷

早苗向目标地点丢出内容未知的御神签，根据御神签的内容对范围内少女造成伤害并对敌人施加效果。队友受到%ally_damage_pct%%%伤害，早苗受到全额伤害。

大吉：
造成%daikiti_damage%纯粹伤害并降低%daikiti_sr_reduce%%%状态抗性，持续%daikiti_duration%秒。
吉：
造成%kiti_damage%伤害和%kiti_duration%秒沉默。
凶：
造成%kyou_damage%伤害和%kyou_duration%秒眩晕。
大凶：
造成%daikyou_damage%伤害并降低%daikyou_mr_reduce%%%魔法抗性，持续%daikyou_duration%秒。

设为自动施法后，切换为暴乱神签连掷，早苗将丢出所有御神签。每%channel_interval%秒向目标地点%channel_radius%范围内随机位置丢出一个御神签。
English:
Sanae throw an unknown content of Omikuji at the target location, dealing damage to girls within radius and applying effects to enemies based on the content of the Omikuji. Allies take %ally_damage_pct%%% damage, Sanae takes full damage.

Dai Kichi:
Deals %daikiti_damage% pure damage and reduces %daikiti_sr_reduce%%% status Resistance for %daikiti_duration% seconds.
Kichi:
Deals %kiti_damage% damage and silences for %kiti_duration% seconds.
Kyou:
Deals %kyou_damage% damage and stuns for %kyou_duration% second.
Dai Kyou:
Deals %daikyou_damage% damage and reduces %daikyou_mr_reduce%%% magic resistance for %daikyou_duration% seconds.

If the ability is in auto-cast, switch to Random Omikuji Barrage, Sanae will throw all Omikuji. throws an Omikuji at a random location within a %channel_radius% radius of the target location every %channel_interval% seconds.

SChinese: 所有御神签的内容几率相同。
English:
Dai Kichi is '大吉', Kichi is '吉', Kyou is '凶' and Dai Kyou is '大凶'.
All contents of Omikuji are the same chance.

SChinese:
复制目标少女上一个释放的技能。
偷取的技能等级与目标技能等级相等
施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
只有对真身的偷取才会成功并消耗魔法和冷却。
English:
Satori copies the last spellcard casted by the enemy girl.
 Level of the learnt spellcard is equal to target girl's level of spellcard. 
Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%
Only when casting to real girls will cost mana and successfully copy the spell.

SChinese: 探寻目标的记忆，可以掌握大部分符卡的原理。
English: Satori is able to tap into her target's memories and use patterns they have seen in the past.

SChinese: 被动技能和部分主动技能无法偷取。\n无视技能免疫。\n偷来的技能不会随觉的死亡而失去。
减少16s技能冷却时间，并且偷来的技能会附带万宝槌增强。
English: Reduce cooldown of 「Terrible Souvenir」by 16 seconds and give scepter buff to the learnt spellcard if the spellcard has one.

SChinese: 对目标敌人及其周围敌方单位放出攻击心灵的弹幕，降低她们的移动速度和攻击速度，并每秒造成伤害和短暂眩晕。\n如果施放时目标已受到「恐怖催眠術」的效果影响，则减速效果会被替换为眩晕效果。\n施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%。
English: Satori shoots danmaku to attack enemies' mind, deals damage to the target and units nearby, slows them down and stuns for 0.01s every second.\nWhen the target has been affected by「Terrifying Hypnotism」, she will be stunned for 3 seconds.\nCast range: %AbilityCastRange%.

SChinese: 只要敌方内心深处存在着恐怖的记忆，就会让它爆发成心灵的障碍而妨碍其行动。
English: Satori has limited hypnotic abilities, allowing her to bring traumatic memories to the surface of a person's mind or induce amnesia

SChinese: 觉可以控制住小兵或者中立生物。\n不到最低生命的单位会被提升到最低生命。\n如果目标已为宠物则为其回复满生命值。
English: Satori recruits creeps as her pets.\nHealth of pets will be raised to the minimum health when being recruited.\nWhen casting on pets, their health will be restored to the maximum.

SChinese: 觉的能力对于宠物来说独一无二。
English: She appears to be loved by animals.

SChinese:
点出对应天赋前无法操纵远古。
操控的单位超出上限后，最先操纵的单位会被消灭。
对小兵和野怪施放时视为击杀了它，这意味着对己方小兵使用时视为一次反补，而对野怪和敌方小兵使用时能够得到击杀金钱和经验奖励。
用这个效果操纵的单位无法使敌方建筑的偷塔保护失效。
读取周围敌方少女的弱点，在接下来的%debuff_duration%秒内，如果觉在她们700码之内，则每秒加深她们受到的伤害。脱离范围后伤害加深效果还会粘滞一段时间。
English: Satori reveals the weakness of the target. Every second for the target stays within 700 range around Satori, damage on her will be amplified.\nCast Range: %AbilityCastRange%.

SChinese: 使对手回想起精神创伤的催眠术的一种。
English: A type of hypnosis that awakens deep-seated trauma.

SChinese: 没有在觉释放此技能时被影响到的少女不会受到这个技能的效果（即使她们后来走进这个技能的影响范围）。
霍青娥指定一名友方任意单位，在%duration%秒内该队友和霍青娥每次攻击均附带额外法术伤害
English: Causes both the target ally and herself to deal additional magical damage on attacks for %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 增加友方单位的攻击速度。\n如果该目标为近战单位，攻速加成降低为%melee_percent%%，但其对一定范围内单位发动攻击指令时，会立刻闪现至目标身边。
English:
Increases the attack speed of the target ally for %duration% seconds.

If the target is a melee unit, it only gains %melee_percent%%% of the bonus but every attack will cause it to immediately blink to the attack's target if it is near enough.

SChinese: 霍青娥指定一名敌方少女，在一定时间内减少攻击力，当该少女使用技能时会被眩晕且受到伤害。
English: Decreases an enemy girl's attack damage. If she casts a spell while under this effect, she is stunned and takes damage.

SChinese: 霍青娥引导短暂时间后，将目标友方少女召唤到自己身边。
English: Seiga channels for a short time, then teleports the target allied girl to her location.

SChinese: 无法作用于封闭意识的少女。
English: Cannot target girls who have closed their consciousness.

SChinese: 使霍青娥获得光环效果，%radius%范围内的所有少女死亡时会制造幽灵幻象，移动速度超过本体。幻象持续%duration%秒或遭受%attacked_limit%次少女或者建筑攻击消失。
English: Passively provides an %radius% range aura wherein all girls create an illusion of themselves upon death which have increased movement speed and are under Seiga's control. They last up to %duration% seconds, or until they take up to %attacked_limit% attacks from enemy girls or buildings. They take no damage from other sources.

SChinese: 霍青娥在自身脚下和目标位置各召唤一个虫洞，接近其中一个虫洞的友方少女将立即传送到另一个虫洞的位置，同一单位两次传送之间至少间隔%transport_cooldown%秒。虫洞存在%duration%秒后消失。\n在虫洞周围%exclude_distance%范围内创建新虫洞的施法将直接失败且仍然消耗魔法值并进入冷却。
English:
Seiga creates a wormhole in the ground at her feet and the target location. Allied girls which step onto the wormhole will be teleported to the other side. Cannot teleport each unit more than once every %transport_cooldown% seconds. Lasts %duration% seconds before disappearing.

Creating a wormhole within %exclude_distance% range of the entry point causes the spell to fail, but still consume mana and go into cooldown.

SChinese: 穿墙虫洞难道只能穿墙吗?
即使场上存在多对虫洞,它们也会以正常的传送联系运行
向目标点方向丢出扇状排布的针型弹幕，技能持续期间每产生一轮弹幕都会额外消耗部分魔法值。\n对被逆符「Evil in the Mirror」影响的少女释放时，弹幕会改为从被命中少女的%cast_range%码外向少女汇集。\n智力加成：%int_bonus%
English: Fires needle barrages in the arrange of sector to the target point. Costs additional mana while channeling. The barrages will aim at the target girl if she has been affected by「Evil in the Mirror」.\nBonus Damage per Intelligence: %int_bonus%
Reverse Bow「Dream Bow of Heaven & Earth」

SChinese: 向面向方向丢出数支箭矢，箭矢会在距离超过释放者%radius%码时消失，并从另一端重现，以更快的速度飞出，命中单位会造成减速。\n箭矢每穿过一个敌方单位都会使伤害降低%damage_reduce%%%，最低降至%damage_limit%%%。\n智力加成：%int_bonus%
English: Throws numerous piercing arrows forward, slowing and dealing damage to enemies hit. The arrows disappear when they distance Seija %radius% and appear at the oppisite side with a higher speed.\nFor each enemy that arrows hit, its damage is reduced by %damage_reduce%%%, no less than %damage_limit%%%.\nBonus Damage per Intelligence: %int_bonus%

SChinese: 增加弹幕速度；弹幕会向被逆符「Evil in the Mirror」影响的少女汇集。
English: Speeds the arrows. The arrows will aim at the target girl if she has been affected by「Evil in the Mirror」.

SChinese: 目标视角正常时顺时针旋转，目标视角反转时逆时针旋转
English: Rotates clockwise when the target's visual is normal; rotates anti-clockwise when the target's visual is reverse.

SChinese: 被动：降低持有罪名的少女的移动速度，罪名最多叠加%max_accusation_num%条。\n主动：为范围内敌方少女添加1条罪名并短时间标记目标，使其在击杀单位时清除罪名并受到额外伤害，若击杀了少女则受到基于最大生命值的伤害，罪名越多伤害越高。
English:
Passive:

Enemies with the Guilt status are slowed.\n

Active:

Places a Guilt stack on enemy girls in radius and marks them. When the marked target kills a unit, consumes all Guilt stacks from the target to deal additional damage to itself. If the victim is girl, the damage is based on the killer's max health. Each Guilt stack consumed increases the damage dealt.

SChinese: 单纯以强大的力量裁决对方是否有罪，宛如地狱一般的审判。
English: Using physical force to decide whether or not they were guilty truly is a hell-like trial.

SChinese: 击杀非少女每条罪名额外惩罚：
%击杀少女每条罪名额外惩罚：
对目标立刻进行审判，在%delay_action%秒的延迟过后晕眩目标少女并根据罪的数量造成额外伤害，之后移除其所有罪名。
English: Immediately hold trial over the target as judge, jury and executioner. This act consumes all Guilt on the target to deal damage and stun them after a %delay_action% second delay.

SChinese: 普通攻击命中不足%max_accusation_num%条罪的单位时，会增加其罪的层数（持续%accusation_duration%s）。并且根据罪的层数*基础伤害造成额外伤害。
English: Attacks inflict Guilt on the target for %accusation_duration% seconds, up to a maximum of %max_accusation_num% stacks. Also deals extra damage based on current stacks.

SChinese: 每层罪名的持续时间是独立的。\n增加罪名的效果先于普通攻击的伤害结算。
English: The duration of each Guilt stack is independent of each other.\nInflicts a stack of Guilt before dealing damage.

SChinese: 去除叠罪上限，攻击时50%%概率额外增加一层罪名
English: Removes max stacks of guilt, and Eiki has a 50%% chance to inflict an additional Guilt stack with each attack.

SChinese: 目标少女无法使用主动技能和所有物品，其被动技能也会暂时失效，在持续时间内每秒对其造成纯粹伤害。如果目标少女在四季映姬的周边%radius_keep_duration%码范围内，审判的时间不会减少。
English: The target girl cannot use spells and items, has their passive abilities disabled, takes pure damage every second. The duration won't count down as long as they stay near Eiki.

SChinese: 不能对技能免疫单位施放，但是伤害和限制效果无视技能免疫。
English: Cannot be cast on spell immune targets, but the damage and debuffs ignore spell immunity.

SChinese: 「魔神降临」状态下，神绮本体普通攻击附带单体「启明之光」效果
English: At the state of「The Coming of the God of Makai」: Add the effect of「Phantom Domination」(single target) to Shinki's physical attack. Physical attack by Shinki's illusions won't get the effect.
「The Coming of the God of Makai」

SChinese: 唤起本源的力量，获得额外加成和腐蚀光环
English: Arouse the power of origin to get bonus and aura of corrosion.

SChinese: 在任意少女旁边召唤出她的幻象，幻象血量与对方无关。\n幻象受到建筑%building_damage%倍伤害，神绮死亡幻象也会一并消失
English: Shinki brings forth a reflection of a target girl.Attributes of the illusion is only depending on Shinki's level.\nThe illusion takes %building_damage% times of damage from buildings.\nThe illusion will disappear when Shinki dies.

SChinese: 石油「贫乏神式原油泄露污染」
English: Petroleum「Poverty God's Crude Oil Runoff Pollution」

SChinese:
石油夹杂着厄运，紫苑降低自身护甲魔抗，污染其所经土地并恢复自身生命值。

石油会减少敌方同等护甲魔抗，降低移动速度，造成固定魔法伤害，削减敌方当前生命上限。
English:
Shion pollutes the land she passes with crude oil for %abilityDuring% seconds, reducing her armour and magic resistance but healing herself.

Crude oil will reduce the armour and magic resistance of enemy by the same amount, while also dealing magic damage to enemies and temporarily reducing their max health continuously.

SChinese:
每移动%healMoveDistance%距离恢复一次生命值。

敌方脱离石油后，双抗削减状态会即刻消失，生命上限则在%oilLeftDuring%秒后恢复。
English:
Shion heals herself for every %healMoveDistance% units moved.

Enemies will lose their armor and magic resistance debuffs as soon as they leave the polluted area, but the max health debuff will linger for %oilLeftDuring% seconds.

SChinese:
紫苑减少自身攻速，持续向四周播撒弹幕。弹幕会跟随附近敌军，造成减速效果和伤害。

敌方少女短时间内受到多个弹幕命中时，受到的弹幕伤害衰减。

施法时可移动，不可攻击。弹幕播撒会被眩晕和沉默打断。
English:
Shion reduces her attack speed while saturating the area around herself with danmaku.

Danmaku will home in on nearby enemies, slowing their movement speed and dealing damage.

The damage diminishes if an enemy girl is hit by multiple danmaku within a short period of time.

Shion can move while casting but cannot attack. Can be interrupted if stunned or silenced.

SChinese:
多个弹幕减速效果叠加但持续时间相互独立。

弹幕会在产生%maxExistTime%秒后销毁。
English: The move speed slow of each danmaku stacks independently.\nDanmaku will disappear after %maxExistTime% seconds.

SChinese: 紫苑每%passiveInterval%秒会向随机方向释放一个弹幕。
English: Shion passively shoots out danmaku in random directions every %passiveInterval% second.
「The Most Despicable and Disastrous God of Destitution and Misery」

SChinese: 降低自身和范围内敌方少女的物理护甲和基础魔法抗性。
English: Grants an aura which reduces the armor and magic resistance of nearby enemy girls as well as Shion herself.

SChinese:
主动：

紫苑凭依目标少女，将自身技能负面状态同步复制予目标少女。

凭依时紫苑处于无敌状态且无法选中，仅可施放自身技能。

如果凭依敌方少女则持续时间降低为33%，如为幻象则直接消灭。

凭依状态不会因为驱散而解除。\n

被动：

紫苑在石油上会持续隐身，解除凭依及死亡后均会在原地生成大范围石油。
凭依队友时，队友获得飞行效果。
English: While possessing a teammate, they gain flight.

SChinese: 在凭依后1s可释放（防误触）。
English: The possession can only be stopped after at least 1 second has passed (to avoid accidental double-clicks).

SChinese: 不幸「欢迎来到极端贫困的世界」
English: Bad Luck「Welcome to the World of Destitution」

SChinese: 封顶削减70% 。（不会真的有人能打120分钟吧）
在一定区域内召唤枯树根缠绕敌方单位，在持续时间内无法行动并受到法术伤害。
English: Summons dead tree roots in an area to entangle enemy units, dealing damage and rooting them.

SChinese: 缠绕的目标无法移动和攻击。
English: Rooted targets cannot move or attack.

SChinese: 秋符「干爽的气候最适合睡觉了！」
English: Autumn Sign「Dry weather is best for sleeping！」

SChinese: 立即原地睡觉，回复自己大量生命值和魔法值。\n完全睡醒后，在%time_strength%秒内攻击力会提升。
English: Start sleeping, recovering health and mana.\nIf you sleep for the full duration, gain increased attack damage for %time_strength% seconds.

SChinese: 神符「八百万的红叶神威」

被动：

使自己和周围的友军攻击力提升。\n

主动：

使秋静叶的攻击造成额外伤害并让使敌人回复效果降低%regen_amplify%%%。
English:
Passive:

Increases attack damage for yourself and allies around you.\n

Active:

Shizuha's attacks deal additional damage and reduce the target's healing by %regen_amplify%%%.

SChinese: 在看到美丽的红叶的同时，请想起有关我的事情吧。
English: When you see the beautiful autumn leaves, please recollect me.

SChinese: 召唤强大的风和落叶，\n打击一个区域内的敌人。\n每片叶子可以造成%splash_radius%范围的物理伤害，击中时会触发攻击特效。
English: Summons a storm of falling leaves in an area which deal damage to enemies hit. Deals physical damage in a %splash_radius% radius around hit targets.

SChinese: 秋天是神赐的圣美舞台！
English: The divine splendor of autumn shall be in full display!

SChinese: 落叶造成的伤害无视格挡。
English: Summons %machines_per_sec% leaves per second.\nIgnores damage block.

SChinese: 秋静叶晃动树林，使落叶在周围飞舞。晃动树木的范围会逐步扩大。所有范围内的敌人会受到伤害和减速。基础范围内每多1棵树，增加%dmg_bonus_pct_per_tree%%%伤害。
English: Shizuha Aki shake the woods, causing fallen leaves to dance around. The radius of shaking trees will gradually increase. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. For each additional tree within the base radius, increases the damage by %dmg_bonus_pct_per_tree%%%.

SChinese: 晃动树木落叶就会随之飞舞。
English: Shake the tree and the leaves come dancing down.

SChinese:
树木友好度：完全没有。晃动树林%tree_down_countdown%秒后开始摧毁树木。
达到最大作用范围或范围内没有树木后，晃动中止。
English:
Tree friendship level: None. Starts destroying trees after shaking woods for %tree_down_countdown%s.
The shaking will stop if it reaches max radius or there are no trees whithin the radius.

SChinese: 静叶每次提升等级时，让所有敌方少女受到（ 基础 + 等级 X 倍数 ）的纯粹伤害。
English: Whenever Shizuha levels up, she deals pure damage to all enemy girls based on her level.
The leaves of autumn scatter and fall.

SChinese: 可以主动施放。召唤树林阻挡道路，持续%tree_duration%秒。同时秋静叶获得攻击速度和移动速度加成，持续%active_modifier_duration%秒。
English: Can be cast. Summon woods to block path for %tree_duration%s. And Shizuha Aki gains bonus attack speed and movement speed for %active_modifier_duration%s.

SChinese: 静叶每次提升等级时，\n让所有敌方少女受到基础+等级倍数的纯粹伤害。
English: Whenever Shizuha levels up, she deals pure damage to all enemy girls based on her level.
The withering autumn leaves fall and scatter.

SChinese: 法灯「无间隙的法之独钴杵」
提升星的护甲及魔法抗性，持续5.0秒，持续期间第一次攻击时，会对目标造成伤害并且造成剩余持续时间*%stun_bonus%的眩晕，但护甲及魔法抗性提升效果会即时消失。\n\n智力加成%intellect_bonus%
English: Shou gains increased armor and magic resistance for %duration% seconds. During this time, the first attack she makes will inflict additional damage and stun the target for the remaining duration of her buff with an additional %stun_bonus% seconds. Doing so will instantly end the effects of her buff.

SChinese: 打出一道法柱，只要有单位碰触到法柱，法柱会解除并造成范围伤害。\n法柱持续10.0秒\n智力加成%intellect_bonus%
English: Places down a pillar of light. When a unit touches the pillar, it triggers and deals damage in an area around it. Lasts %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 击杀单位会取得额外金钱及一层法力储藏，同时对该单位附近造成法术伤害并晕眩。
English: Killing units grants extra gold and a layer of mana storage. Also stuns and deals magical damage to enemies near the unit.

SChinese: 寅丸星汇聚宝塔之力，根据当前金币增加技能增强，每%amplify_gold%金币增加1%%，击杀敌方少女后寅丸星会丢失20%当前金币。
English: Shou gains 1%% spell amplification for every %amplify_gold% gold she has, but loses %reduce_gold%%% of her gold every time she kills an enemy girl.

SChinese: 在短暂引导后，星用法术移动至目标位置，对该目标位置打出固定方向的5道宝绿色光柱，被光柱击中的单位会受到伤害并晕眩。\n智力加成%intellect_bonus%
English: Shou teleports to the target position and launches five green beams of light with fixed direction at the destination. Units hit by the beams will take damage and be stunned.

SChinese: 击杀星以外的方式无法中断引导。
每%persecond%秒，增加一层法力储藏，上限叠加%max%层。施法时自动消耗一层法力储藏，回复2.5%%的血量和法力上限。(仅在生命值未满时触发)
English: Gains a stack of mana storage every %persecond% seconds, up to %max%. When casting a spell, a stack is automatically consumed to restore 2.5%% of your maximum health and mana. (Only triggered if health is not full.)

SChinese: 西瓜的普通攻击中将有%ability_chance_base%%%的几率用重拳重击地面造成范围伤害，并使周围敌方单位在%move_slow_duration%秒内移动速度减少%move_slow%%%，攻击速度减少%attackspeed_slow%。
English: Suika's attacks have a %ability_chance_base%%% chance to smash the target and nearby enemies with extra damage. Slows their movement speed by %move_slow%%% and attack speed by %attackspeed_slow% for %move_slow_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 西瓜的普通攻击中将有%ability_chance_base%%%几率用重拳重击地面造成范围伤害，并使周围敌方单位在%move_slow_duration%秒内移动速度减少%move_slow%%%，攻击速度减少%attackspeed_slow%。
English: Suika's attacks have a %ability_chance_base%%% chance to smash the target and nearby enemies with extra damage. Slows their movement speed by %move_slow%%% and attack speed by %attackspeed_slow% for %move_slow_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 运用自己分解一切的能力使自己的形态化为雾气，无法被伤害、攻击或选中，并获得技能免疫。但是会缴械、沉默并锁闭自己，并且移动速度减少%move_speed%%%。期间每0.5秒分解出一个小萃香。\n每个小萃香继承本体40%%的生命攻击。
English:
Suika disperses herself into a fine mist, making her immune to damage, untargetable and spell immune. However, she is also disarmed, silenced and muted, and her movement speed is reduced by %move_speed%%%.

Every 0.5 seconds the mist spawns a tiny copy of herself, which inherits 40% of her attack damage.

SChinese: 技能持续期间无视地形
English: Grants free pathing across impassable terrain for the duration of the spell.

SChinese: 释放后在%duration%秒内得到鬼之力量，期间无视物理伤害，提升攻击速度和使「大江山悉皆杀」的触发几率提高。
English: Manipulates her own density to become a giant. This form attacks faster, is immune to physical damage and has an increased chance to activate「Massacre on Mt.Ooe」.

SChinese: 萃香以巨大化状态任意妄为，用于对付来犯之敌
English: Suika can do whatever she wants while in her enlarged state and uses it to suppress her enemies.

SChinese: 技能持续期间无视地形
English: Grants free pathing across impassable terrain for the duration of the spell.

SChinese: 释放后获得无视地形移动的能力，持续15s。
English: Grants Suika the ability to move across any terrain for 15 seconds.

SChinese: 向前方位置射出共%num%张esp卡片，短暂延迟后变成手裏剣，手裏剣撞到敌人后消失并造成魔法伤害。
English: Fires %num% zener cards forwards in spread pattern. After a short delay, they become shurikens which deal damage to enemies hit.

SChinese: 同一组卡片每个敌人只会被击中一次，除非堇子有万宝槌。\n最大飞行距离等同于其施法距离。
可以穿透敌人并造成多次伤害，但是伤害会逐次衰减。施加的负面状态不可驱散。
English: Zener cards pierce enemies, but the damage is reduced for each enemy hit. Debuffs applied become undispellable.

SChinese: 朝敌方单位射出一枪使其被击晕并造成伤害和击退。
English: Shoots the target enemy, stunning it, dealing damage and knocking it back.

SChinese: 在目标地点制造一根电线杆，持续3秒。时间结束，再次主动使用该技能或施放「Teleportation」后，电线杆会缓慢倒塌，对范围内的敌人造成伤害和眩晕。\n在2.5秒内再次使用技能可以手动控制其落下的方向，但须执行明显动作。否则电线杆会默认朝自身当前所在位置落下。
English: Places a telephone pole at the target point. After a delay, it will fall towards Sumireko slowly, dealing damage and stunning enemies on impact. Sumireko can cast the ability again to change the direction it falls and make it fall immediately.

SChinese: 电线杆会提供小范围的视野。\n施放电线杆没有明显动作，视野外的电线杆也不会对敌人可见，但使用二段技能需要执行0.5秒抬手动作。
使电线杆朝目标方向倒下。
English: Causes the telephone pole to start falling immediately towards the target point.
*See Visions of the Other World's Lunacy!*

SChinese: 从天空射出强光伤害并致盲敌人，持续%duration%秒。\n伤害会被分摊给范围内所有敌方单位，非少女单位及幻象都会受到%illusion_damage%倍伤害。\n持续时间内，堇子可以通过持续施法来对范围内的敌人施加各种负面状态。
English: Calls down a searing light from the sky, dealing massive damage to enemies in the area for %duration% seconds.\nThe damage is distributed evenly among all affected enemies, and illusions and non-girl units receive %illusion_damage% times the damage.\nBy channeling the ability, Sumireko can apply various negative status effects to affected enemies.

SChinese:
可以随时中断或继续持续施法。
持续施法被打断的情况下只造成魔法伤害。
技能开始时默认执行一次持续施法。
每秒造成30次伤害。
万宝槌的额外伤害等同于当前魔法值*1/30。
English:
Channeling can be interrupted and re-continued at any time.
Does not inflict any debuffs if not channeling.
Ability starts channeling by default.
Deals 30 damage instances per second.
The additional damage dealt by the Miracle Mallet upgrade is 1/30 of Sumireko's current mana.

SChinese: 持续施法期间持续消耗魔法来造成额外伤害。施加的负面状态将粘滞1秒。
English: Consumes mana rapidly to deal extra damage while channeling. Debuffs will linger for 1 second.

SChinese: 短暂进入另一个梦幻世界，躲避任何来自幻想乡的伤害。当她回来时，她会在附近的另一位置出现。
English: Sumireko briefly shifts into another dream where she is immune to harm from Gensokyo. When she returns, she reappears at a different location nearby.

SChinese: 念动力还是空间移动什么的，对超能力女高中生来说简简单单啦~
English: Telekinesis or teleportation or whatever, it's easy for high school girls with psychic powers~

SChinese: 如果提前结束该技能，闪现的位置就会在面朝方向一定距离外，否则就会在其反方向。
English: If the skill is ended manually, she will reappear slightly forward of the direction she was facing. Otherwise, she will appear in the opposite direction instead.

SChinese: 折射光线令自己处于隐形状态，提升自己的移动速度，使用技能或攻击时会显形。
English: Refracts light to make Sunny invisible and grant move speed bonus. Gets visible when uses skills or attacks.

SChinese: 用光热折射出能分解冰的热度，烧伤附近的敌人，被烧伤的敌人会晕眩并受到法术伤害。\n智力加成：%int_bonus%
English: Refracts light and utilizes its heat to burn enemies nearby. Stuns them and deals magical damage.\nBonus Damage per Intelligence: %int_bonus%

SChinese: 对目标敌人射出一道蓝光，蓝光击中目标后会弹射至附近%radius%范围内随机目标并造成%damage_bonus%%%的伤害。\n蓝光令敌人受伤%duration%秒，处于受伤状态的目标受到的治疗与回复效果降低%regen_reduce%%%。\n智力加成：%int_bonus%
English: Fires a blue light to the target and deals damage. The blue light will bounce to a random enemy within %radius% and deal %damage_bonus%%% damage.\nThe blue light makes enemies affected injured for %duration% seconds, reducing their HP regeneration and healing by %regen_reduce%%%.\nBonus Damage per Intelligence: %int_bonus%

SChinese: 向面向的方向折射出无数多的光圈，每个碰到光圈的敌人都会受到（%damage% + 智力 x %int_bonus%）法术伤害。\n发出[血量上限/%constant% + %base_count%]个光圈。\n爆发期间变成白天。
English: Refracts numerous light rings towards the direction facing, dealing magical damage to enemies hit by (%damage% + Sunny's intelligence x %int_bonus%).\nTotal Numbers of Light Rings: Sunny's max health / %constant% + %base_count%\nTurns nighttime into daytime for its duration.

SChinese: 折射一名少女的光影，用来欺骗人。\n光影是虚无状态,会根据本体的血量变换光影血量。
English: Refracts light to create an illusion of a girl to kid enemies.\nThe illusion is in ghost form, immune to physical damage and unable to attack. The illusion's health is identically equal to the origin's.

SChinese: 每%int%点智力转化为%resistance%点魔抗。\n因为是日光妖精，以晒太阳来疗伤。白天增加自身等级*%regen_bonus%的生命回复。
English: Increases magic resistance by %resistance% for every %int% intelligence.\nSunny basks in the sunshine to heal herself. Grants HP regen by (Sunny's level * %regen_bonus%) on daytime.

SChinese: 获得技能：虹光「棱镜闪光」
从地面上扩散出一个黑湖,被黑湖锁触碰的单位会受到赤口的噬咬。赤口对其造成伤害且施加缠绕与缴械。\n智力加成：%int_scale%
English: Roots and disarms all enemies within area around Suwako and does damage \n Bonus damage per INT:%int_scale%

SChinese:
诹访子钻入地下不能被攻击,制造一个水涡并对区域内造成伤害.
增加 %movement_speed_percent_bonus_suwako%% 移速,并减少敌方 %slow_speed_percent_bonus_suwako%% 移速和%slow_speed_percent_bonus_suwako%攻速
施法期间被缴械，沉默和锁闭。
智力加成：%int_scale%
English: Suwako goes underground.becoming invulnerable during the time, creating a water vortex around her that deals damage to enemy units inside the area effect.Gains additional %movement_speed_percent_bonus_suwako% movement speed and slow enemy by %slow_speed_percent_bonus_suwako%%  last %slow_duration% s . Suwako may not attack,skills or items while underground. \n Bonus damage per INT:%int_scale%

Activates a magic shield, which absorbs damage using spirit. Absorbs 60% of total damage taken.Has a passive effect of returning the damage dealt by the usage of skills as mana(mana gain does not work on ultimate).

SChinese:
被动:

使用技能(间歇泉除外)造成伤害会返还法力值。\n

激活:

魔法护盾吸收%damage_reduction%%%伤害。
English: Activates a magic shield, which absorbs damage using spirit. Absorbs %damage_reduction%%  of total damage taken. \n has a passive effect of returning mana from %tooltip_manareturn%% of the damage dealt . \n each point of mana abosrb %damage_per_mana% damage.
Native God「Gushing Spring of the Ancient」
Lifts all enemy enemy girls in the map up into the air with earthquake dealing damage and stunning them for a period of time. \n Bonus damage per INT:%int_scale%

SChinese: 土著神「古之间歇泉喷发」
English: Native God「Gushing Spring of the Ancient」

SChinese: 操纵泉水喷射将所有敌方少女冲向空中,造成伤害和眩晕\n对视野内目标发动\n智力加成：%int_scale%
