English: Lifts all enemy enemy girls in the map up into the air with earthquake dealing damage and stunning them for a period of time. \n Bonus damage per INT:%int_scale%

SChinese: 向前发射铁轮，对目标点%suwakoex_radius%范围内随机%max_target%个目标造成伤害。
English: Launches an iron ring forward dealing damage to the target. \n Maximum %max_target% targets

SChinese:
被动：

击杀单位获得的金钱提高%gold_bonus%

主动：

吃下一个永远亭月饼，获得随机效果，分别有可能为攻速增加；攻击力增加；移速增加；以及引发一次自爆或者治疗，对自己以及周围%radius%码的单位造成纯粹伤害或回复，回复仅回复自己，自爆不对自己以外的友方单位造成伤害。有可能获得负面效果，负面效果及其持续时间为正面效果的一半，几率分别为正面效果51%%，负面49%%。 累计获得两次负面效果后，下一次必定获得正面效果。 开启大招时主动不会触发负面效果。
English:
Passive:

Gain an additional %gold_bonus% gold for every kill.

Active:

Eat an Eientei mooncake to grant one of the following random effects: Increase or decrease attack speed, increase or decrease attack damage, increase or decrease movement speed, heal yourself, or explode, dealing pure damage to yourself and enemies within %radius% radius. Negative effects (other than the explosion) have half the value of the equivalent positive effects. The probability of getting a positive effect is 51%, and 49% for a negative effect. After getting two negative effects, the next cast of this ability will always grant a positive effect. Effects will always be positive during 「Great Fortune Crest」.

SChinese: 正面效果1.5倍；当生命值低于30%%时，必定触发爆炸，造成3倍伤害，自己有50%%几率存活。
English: Positive buffs are increased by 50%. If Tewi's health is below 30%%, the explosion effect is guaranteed and deals 3x damage. She has a 50%% chance to survive the explosion on 1 health.

SChinese: 在原地留下一个替身空壳，并向后方移动%distance%距离，%duration%秒后替身空壳爆炸对周围%radius%码单位造成伤害及减速。
English: Leaves a body double in her original location then jumps %distance% units backwards. After %duration%s, the body double explodes, causing damage and slowing enemy movement in a %radius% radius.

SChinese:
被动：

有%odds%%%的几率对普通攻击（对远程几率翻倍，对幻象几率为50%%）进行一次反击。\n

主动：

拿起双枪，对%radius%码内所有英雄单位进行射击，同时提升攻击速度。
English:
Passive:

Tewi has a %odds%%% chance to counterattack against any normal attack. Double chance against ranged, 50%% chance against illusions.\n

Active:

Dual-wields pistols to fire at all enemy girls within an 800 radius with increased attack speed.

SChinese: 开启枪斗术后无法触发月兔幻觉兵器多重攻击

被动：

对敌人的第%normal_count%下攻击会造成%damage%纯粹伤害，并窃取英雄单位%gold_steal%金币。 \n

主动：

攻击时降低敌人基础护甲，并增加自己移动速度，持续%duration%秒，持续时间内如果对某个英雄单位的攻击次数达到%max_count%次，下一次攻击将会窃取%gold_rate%倍金币(因幡帝已经摸过你的钱包啦！)\n如果钱不够的情况会造成所缺金额%damage_rate%倍的纯粹伤害)。
English:
Passive:

The %normal_count%th attack on each enemy girl will cause %damage% pure damage and steal %gold_steal% gold.\n

Active:

For %duration% seconds, Tewi increases her movement speed and reduces a percentage of the enemy's base armor on hit.\nIf Tewi attacks the same girl %max_count% times while this is active, the next attack will steal %gold_rate%x gold. (Inaba Tewi has already touched your wallet!) If there is not enough money to steal, she deals %damage_rate%x pure damage.

SChinese: 学习「秘制月饼」获得被动：击杀单位获得的金钱提高\n学习「枪斗术」获得被动：有几率对普通攻击进行一次反击\n学习兔符「开运」获得被动：对每个单位的第4下攻击会造成纯粹伤害，并窃取少女金币
English:
Learning the following abilities grants passive bonuses:

「Secret Mooncake」

Gain additional gold on every kill.

「Gunfighting」

Tewi has a chance of counterattacking whenever an enemy attacks her.

Rabbit Sign 「Great Fortune Crest」

Every 4th attack on a girl will do additional pure damage and steal a fixed amount of gold.

SChinese: 「资本家」：任何一个单位死亡都会给帝带来2-6点金钱收益
English: 「Capitalist」: Death of any unit will give her a 2-6 points gold gain

SChinese: 天子（每隔%ability_multi%/力量）秒，在剑上附上天人之力，从而使得下次攻击时大地震颤。
English: Every %ability_multi%/STR seconds, Tenshi gathers the temperaments into her sword, causing an earthquake with her next attack that deals extra damage and stuns nearby enemies.

SChinese: 天子将绯想之剑刺入地面使地壳产生运动，产生地震并给予地上的敌人以伤害。
English: Tenshi stabs the Sword of Hisou into the ground to induce tectonic movements, causing an earthquake that deals damage to grounded enemies.

SChinese:
被动：

天子具有独特的体质，每次受到普通攻击都将回复生命与魔法。\n

主动：

使被动效果变为两倍，且每次受到任何伤害都将额外增加攻击速度，持续%duration%秒。
English:
Passive:

Whenever Tenshi receives an attack, she restores some mana and health.\n

Active:

Doubles the effect of her passive. Whenever she receives any damage, Tenshi gets stackable bonus attack speed for %duration% seconds.

SChinese: 获得新技能：气符「无念无想的境界」
English: Grants the spell Spirit Sign「State of Freedom from Worldly Thoughts」
Spirit Sign「State of Freedom from Worldly Thoughts」

SChinese: 天子能够操控任意个体的气质，破坏目标的被动技能，使其获得%damage_reduction_percent%%%减伤，但不可进行攻击、使用技能和道具，持续%duration%s。若目标为友方单位，则还会使其获得%hp_regen%%%每秒的最大生命恢复。\n施法距离：800
English: Tenshi manipulates a girl's temperaments, granting %damage_reduction_percent%%% damage reduction but disabling her passives and preventing her from attacking, casting spells or using items for %duration% seconds. If the target is an ally, they restore %hp_regen%%% of their max HP per second.

SChinese: 向目标位置打出两串直线的闪电，对目标地点[%width%*%length%]范围内造成基础 + [目标护甲 * %armor_damage_bonus%]法术伤害并在击中少女的情况下眩晕其%stun_duration%秒。
English: Summons two rows of lightning towards the target location, causing additional damage equal to %armor_damage_bonus% times the target's armor within a %width%x%length% area. When the lightning hits an enemy girl, it will stun for %stun_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 延迟%delay%秒发出雷击，造成基础 + [目标护甲 * %armor_damage_bonus%]法术伤害并在击中敌方少女的情况下增加%damage_bonus%%%伤害。
English: Summons a lightning storm after a delay of %delay% seconds, causing additional damage equal to %armor_damage_bonus% times the target's armor and amplifying damage taken for enemy girls hit by %damage_bonus%%%.

SChinese: 打出电荷造成基础 + [目标护甲 * %armor_damage_bonus%]法术伤害，并在击中对方少女的情况下%duration%秒内提升居自古的物理伤害减免及技能增强。\n施放后，雷击在目标周围%vision_radius%范围内提供空中视野和600真实视域，持续%vision_time%秒
English:
Calls down a bolt of lightning, causing additional damage equal to %armor_damage_bonus% times the target's armor. When the lightning hits an enemy girl, Tojiko gains spell amplification and reduces incoming physical damage for %duration% seconds.

The lightning briefly provides flying vision within %vision_radius% range and True Sight within 600 range of the target for %vision_time% seconds.

SChinese: %delay%秒后，下落一个巨大的闪电，对目标位置的单位造成%damage% + [目标护甲 * %armor_damage_bonus%]巨额法术伤害并在击中敌方少女的情况下恢复%regen_mana%法力值。\n对泉水内的单位无效。
English:
Summons an enormous bolt of lightning after a %delay% second delay, causing additional damage equal to %armor_damage_bonus% times the target's armor. Restores %regen_mana% mana if the lightning hits an enemy girl.

Has no effect on units inside the fountain.

SChinese: 苏我步入将生者与死者相隔的领域，展现出怨灵的真实形态，在这个形态下，屠自古无法攻击或被攻击，并持续电击附近所有敌人，使他们被沉默。
English: Tojiko slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead, revealing her true form as a vengeful spirit. In this form, she cannot attack or be attacked, and continuously shocks nearby enemies, silencing them.

SChinese: 获得新技能：「元兴寺的龙卷」
屠自古在施放一个技能时，会在上一次该技能施放的位置重复该技能的效果。
English: Whenever Tojiko casts a spell, the spell will also be repeated wherever it was cast last.

SChinese: 施放一个技能时，会在上一次该技能施放的位詈重复该技能的效果。
English: Whenever Tojiko casts a spell, the spell will also be repeated wherever it was cast last.

SChinese: 向自身前方%point_blank_range%码扇出粒子化微风，对敌方单位造成%damage%魔法伤害并将其击退，且同时施加沉默与缴械%duration%秒。击退距离及时间与敌人和绵月丰姬的距离成反比。\n若波导扇命中的敌方单位正受到由投影施加的减益效果，还会对其额外施加锁闭并造成%damage_mana_pct%% 自身当前魔法值的魔法伤害。\n智力加成：%int_bouns%
English:
Sends out a breeze of elementary particles up to %radius% range in front of herself, dealing %damage% magical damage, knocking enemies back, and silencing and disarming hit targets for %duration% seconds. The knockback distance and duration increase if the target is closer to Toyohime.

If the target is hit by this ability while receiving the debuff from her projection, it will also be muted and receive %damage_mana_pct%%% of Toyohime's current mana as magical damage.\nBONUS DAMAGE PER INT: %int_bouns%

SChinese: 这把随身携带的扇子似乎是月球的最新武器，名为“瞬间将森林净化为基本粒子之风的扇子”的可怕的东西。
English: This portable fan seems to be one of the Moon's most advanced weaponry. It is supposedly capable of sending out a wind that can instantly purify a forest at the atomic level.

SChinese: 右键设为自动施放后可以破坏树木。
English: Destroys trees if auto-cast is turned on.

SChinese: 选定离当前锁定位置最近的投影，根据投影范围升起屏障，经过%delay%秒延迟后，将其范围内的友方少女传送至距离该投影最远处的投影内，并对出发地周围的敌方单位造成伤害和眩晕，对目的地周围的敌方单位只造成眩晕。\n持续时间内在投影内的友方少女获得无视地形移动效果。\n智力加成：%int_bouns%
English: Targets a projection on or near to the cursor and creates a ring surrounding the projection for %delay% seconds. Afterwards, allied girls within are teleported to the projection furthest from their current one, while enemies are stunned and take damage.\nThe allied girls within the projection gain the effect of ignoring terrain movement within the duration.\nBONUS DAMAGE PER INT: %int_bouns%

SChinese: 不同于地上人，月之民想要自由来往地月算不上是一件难事。
English: Unlike the people of Earth, it is not difficult for Lunarians to come and go from the Moon as they please.

SChinese: 将自身传送至指定地点，并在传送的起点和终点生成一个投影，2秒内若未脱离投影范围可以再次释放，将自身传送至距离当前位置最远的投影
English: Teleports herself to the target location, and create a projection at her starting location and destination.\nIf she does not leave the area within 2 seconds, it can be cast again, teleports her to the furthest current projection.

SChinese: 有些神隐的地上生灵们曾亲眼目睹过月之民们，但在下一秒她们却如同幻觉般消失得无影无踪。
English: There are vague reports of people on Earth supposedly witnessing a Lunarian, yet in the blink of an eye they vanished, as if they never existed at all.

SChinese: 将自身传送至距离当前位置最远的投影。
English: Teleports herself to the projection furthest from her current location.

SChinese: 连接月面与地表之间的通道，使望月之夜立刻降临于地面。持续对全图所有不受投影影响的的单位施加无法驱散的沉默与缴械效果并获得%damege_reduce%% 伤害减免，持续%duration%秒。除绵月丰姬外，受影响单位的视野还将被减少%night_vision%码，自身视野增加%night_vision%码。\n生效%stop_time%秒后可以手动关闭。
English:
Links the Earth and the Moon, bringing forth the lunar night. Units across the entire map which are not inside a projection are affected by an undispellable silence and disarm and receive %damege_reduce%%% damage reduction for %duration% seconds. The vision of all affected units other than Toyohime herself is reduced by %night_vision%, while her own vision is increased by %night_vision%.

It can be ended early after at least %stop_time% seconds have passed.

SChinese: 污秽夺取了物质和生命的永远，同时带给了它们寿命的枷锁。移居到这片净土的子民们舍弃了所谓的生与死，使自己能够近乎永恒地存于世上。
English: Impurity takes away the eternity of matter and life, imposing upon them the shackles of a concept called 'lifespan'. Those who moved to this Pure Land abandoned the very concepts of life and death, allowing them to exist in this world almost eternally.

SChinese: 月影降临术不会作用于当前正受到立场效果的单位，但持续期间内会根据场上单位的实时状态变化进行反复判定。当绵月丰姬魔法值耗尽或死亡时，月影降临术会立刻结束。
English: Lunar Descent does not affect units within a projection, but this is checked continuously throughout the effect. If Toyohime runs out of mana or dies, the effect immediately ends.

SChinese: 丰姬可以将月球上的静海投影到地面上。主动施放时，在自身脚下与选定地点同时生成一个半径%radius%码的投影\n敌方单位每在投影内停留1秒，攻击力减少1％且承受的伤害增加1％，离开立场范围后效果会立刻失效。\n自身在投影内可以无视地形移动。
English:
Toyohime creates a projection of the Sea of Tranquility onto Earth. When cast, a projection with a radius of %radius% is created both at her current location and the target location.

For every 1 second that an enemy stays inside this area, reduce thier attack damage by 1% and increase incoming damage by 1%.

The effects are lost immediately upon leaving the area.\nToyohime can walk ignoring terrain within this area.

SChinese: 月之都存在于月之背面，且设立了结界隐藏其形。那些企图入侵的敌人们往往只会迷失在一片表面坑洼的死寂之月。
English: The Lunar Capital resides on the dark side of the Moon, and a barrier was set up to hide its existence. Those who try to invade the moon are left stuck on a barren moon filled with nothing but empty craters.

SChinese: 敌方进入立场后会即刻被施加一层减益效果。\n作为友军与作为敌军时，技能展示效果会略有不同。
English: Enemies receive one stack of the debuff immediately upon entering the area.\nDepending on what team you are on, the display effect of the projection may appear different.

SChinese: 受投影影响的友方少女还可获得高空视野。
English: Allied girls effected by Projection gain flying vision.

SChinese: 立刻对所有受投影影响的敌方少女施加20层减益效果，然后对他们造成%damage_mana_pct%%% 自身最大魔法值的魔法伤害
English: Instantly applies 20 stacks of the debuff to enemies within a projection and deals %damage_mana_pct%%% of Toyohime's maximum mana as magical damage to them.

SChinese: 召唤萤火虫点亮周围的视野，并具有一定的真视范围。
English: Wriggle gains unobstructed vision when activated for a short duration. Also provides true sight.

SChinese: 每隔一段时间莉格露的攻击会附带一次额外攻击，对目标造成额外伤害和沉默效果。
English: Allows Wriggle to dispatch one special attacks. The attack will get extra damage and the target will be silent.

SChinese: 额外攻击附带攻击特效。
使莉格露永久隐身，攻击的时候显形。
English: Wriggle becomes permanently invisible. If Wriggle attacks or spells a skill, she will become visible temporarily.

SChinese: 周围900范围内没有敌方少女获得40%%移速和3%%生命魔法恢复加成，存在敌方少女则获得30攻击/攻速加成
English: Grants Wriggle 40%% movement speed and 3%% regeneration of max HP and MP per second when their is no enemy girl in 900 range. Otherwise, grants Wriggle 30 attack damage and attack speed.

SChinese:
让目标敌方单位得到热病。
持续%duration%秒，持续时间内该单位每秒受到法术伤害并处于受伤状态。
若该单位死亡时热病依然存在，会传染至%radius%范围内%num%位敌方单位上（优先传染没有获得热病的。）
可叠加，并且叠加的每一个热病都会传染
处于受伤状态的目标受到的治疗与回复效果降低%regen_reduce%%%。
English:
Fevers an enemy for %duration% seconds.
The enemy takes magical damage per second and is in the state of Injured.
Injured targets' HP regeneration and healing reduce by %regen_reduce%%%.
If an fevered unit dies, the fever will infect %num% enemies within %radius%.(infects enemies not fevered first)
Stackable, and every single state of fever is infectious.

SChinese: 攻击会令瘴气导入目标体内%duration%秒，对目标每秒造成%damage%[+等级x%level_bonus%]的法术伤害。
English: Poisons the target for %duration% seconds on attacks, dealing magical damage by (%damage% + Yamame's level x %level_bonus%) per second.

SChinese: 在「捕捉之网」内对敌人攻击会附带蛛网，每层蛛网会造成减速，达到%wanbaochui_count%层会缠绕敌人%wanbaochui_duration%秒
English: Adds stackable Cobwebs on attacks in「Capture Web」, slowing the target's movement. Enemies who stack Cobwebs for %wanbaochui_count% will be rooted for %wanbaochui_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 神奈子向目标地点砸下一根御柱，对落地点%damage_radius%范围内的敌方单位造成伤害和眩晕。
English: Kanako drops an onbashira on the target location to deal damage and stun enemies within %damage_radius% range of the impact.

SChinese: 说起操控庞大且沉重的御柱，幻想乡没有人比神奈子更加得心应手。
English: When it comes to controlling onbashira, nobody in Gensokyo can match Kanako.

SChinese: 在神奈子周围制造一个跟随神奈子移动的神秘环面，环面内部的敌方少女会持续受到伤害，友方少女会免疫绝大部分弹射物。任何少女从环面的一方经过时会从通侧环面直径指向的另一头出现。
English: Kanako deploys the Yamato Torus around her. Enemy girls inside the torus continuously take damage, while allied girls are immune to most ranged attacks. Any girl that touches one edge of the torus will be teleported to the opposite side of it.

SChinese: 最基础的结界并是最基础的境界，连神社的巫女都能熟练掌握并且运用，更何况神社所供奉的神。
English: The fundamental principles of barriers, shrine grounds, and boundaries are all closely related. Since even shrine maidens can master them, it's only natural that the gods enshrined there can do so too.

SChinese: 降下一颗被神力所凭依的稻米，其可对友方进行治疗和增益，亦可对敌方造成伤害和减益。
English: Kanako feeds a divine crop to a unit, buffing and healing allied units, or debuffing and dealing damage to enemies.

SChinese: 诹访大社用筒粥神事来占卜吉凶，而神奈子却直接跳过了占卜的过程。
English: While those of the Suwa Grand Shrine performed rituals with reed tubes and rice to divine good or bad luck, Kanako can skip that process entirely.

SChinese: 降低6s冷却时间，可作用于友方建筑。
「神圣庄严的古战场」解除结界
神奈子解除结界,失去结界的加护
English: Lifts the boundary Kanako cast on herself, losing its protection.

SChinese: 神奈子经过%AbilityCastPoint%秒的准备时间后设置一个有时间限制的结界。结界完成后只能在结界内移动，攻击速度大幅降低但攻击距离大幅增加,同时在攻击到敌方少女时砸下一根御柱造成减速与法术溅射伤害。其他三个技能会被全新的技能替换。
English:
Kanako takes %AbilityCastPoint% second to set up a temporary boundary. After the boundary is complete, you can only move inside it.

In this state, your attack speed is greatly reduced but your attack range is greatly increased. When you attack an enemy girl in this state, it will drop an onbashira on them which slows and deals damage in an area around them.

Your 3 basic skills are replaced by entirely different ones.

SChinese: 诹访大战时神奈子凭借一己之力便攻破整个诹访军团，虽然现在没有当时那么强大的信仰，但她仍然能在自己一定区域内重现当时的神力。
English: During the Great Suwa War, Kanako defeated the entire Suwa Army by herself. Although she does not command as much faith as she did back then, she can still reproduce the same divine power she once had within a boundary of her own.

SChinese: 尝试离开结界时会回到结界中心
English: Teleports you to the center of the boundary whenever you would leave it.

SChinese: 神奈子在其周围大范围的空间内持续的降落大量的御柱对御柱周围的敌方单位造成伤害和眩晕。
English: Kanako drops a storm of onbashira around her continuously, dealing damage and stunning enemies around the impact zones.

SChinese: 真正的激怒神奈子是一件很可怕的事，她会令周围所有的一切被御柱砸成废墟。
English: It is a terrible thing to truly anger Kanako. If you do, everything around her will be reduced to rubble in seconds by her onbashira.

SChinese: 神奈子使一片区域内敌方单位的速度大幅度下降，普通攻击有概率落空，被动技能也完全失效。该效果无法被驱散。
English: Kanako debuffs enemies in the target area, disabling their passives, slowing them down and blinding them. Cannot be dispelled.

SChinese: 在神奈子所习得的结界里，有一种能使胆敢挑战神的无知之徒们感受到强大威压的神光结界。
English: Among the various boundary techniques Kanako knows is a barrier of divine light which exerts intense pressure on any fool who would dare challenge a god.

SChinese: 离开范围后效果会粘滞一小段时间
English: The effect lingers for a short time after leaving the area.

SChinese: 神奈子选择一名友方少女清除她几乎所有的负面效果，之后对周围的友方单位进行持续的治疗。
English: Kanako dispels nearly all debuffs from a target girl, then continuously heals all nearby allied units.

SChinese: 神奈子用自己的神德来报答信仰她的少女们，这些回报在战斗的时候甚至可以挽救战局。
English: Kanako repays her believer's faith with divine virtue, and these rewards can even turn the tide of battle.

SChinese: 治疗量+30，该额外治疗量可对友方建筑生效，并为所有治疗目标提供30%伤害抗性。
English: +%health_regen_wanbaochui% healing and grants %damage_reduction%%% damage reduction to all healed targets. Now affects allied buildings.

SChinese: 神奈子与周围的友方少女通过仪式获得力量，每次攻击获得%attack_speed_bonus%攻击速度与%armor_bonus%护甲，这个效果最多叠加%max_stack%次，且每位受祝福的少女会为神奈子提供%self_bonus%% 的魔法抗性。脱离范围或持续%buff_delay%秒不攻击的友方少女会缓慢失去这个效果。
English:
Kanako grants herself and nearby allied girls power through her rituals, so that each attack made by them grants %attack_speed_bonus% attack speed and %armor_bonus% armor, stacking up to %max_stack% times. Each girl blessed by this effect grants Kanako %self_bonus%%% magic resistance.

When allied girls leave the area of effect or do not attack for %buff_delay% seconds, the effect will slowly decay.

SChinese: 神奈子并不介意用自己的神力来帮助他人，只要她们为其提供信仰。
English: Kanako doesn't mind using her divine powers to help others, so long as they reciprocate with their faith.

SChinese: 对地图上任意单位进行冲锋，抵达目标时对范围内敌人造成伤害以及眩晕，对友方回复血量和一定时间的无敌。
English: Charge towards any unit on the map. On impact, she deals damage and stuns nearby enemies while healing and granting invulnerability to nearby allies.

SChinese: 我要用我的光奔驰到底！
English: I will get to the end by my light!

SChinese: 将目标笼罩在保护性外壳中，治疗目标并提供护甲和魔抗加成。\n施法范围：全地图
English:
Covers the targeted ally with a protective shell, granting bonus health and mana regeneration, armor and magic resistance.

Can be cast anywhere on the map.

SChinese: 即使不能见到，重要的人也会在身边。
English: Even if you can't see each other, important people will be right by your side.

SChinese: 对目标施放神灵的祝福，笼罩在护盾之中并提供移速和攻击加成，护盾持续时间为永久，护盾消失时加成一并消失。
English:
Grants the blessing of Kanayamahiko-no-Mikoto to the targeted ally, protecting her with a shield which provides bonus movement speed and damage.

The shield is permanent and is only removed after it breaks, and the bonuses diminish as the shield breaks.

SChinese: 我从来不会真正离你而去，光明照耀着每一个角落，存在于每个人心里。如果你睁开眼睛看看四周，你就可以找到我的光芒。
English: I will never truly leave you. The light shines on every corner and exists in everyone's heart. If you just open your eyes and look around, you'll find my light.

SChinese: 获得额外的魔抗、护甲和生命回复，周边每有一位友方少女，额外加成便多一倍\n每隔%AbilityCooldown%秒，下一次攻击获得额外攻击力并使主目标的移速短时间内降至最低。
English:
Grants bonus magic resistance, armor and health regeneration. Every allied girl (including herself) within %ex_radius% increases the bonus.

Your attacks are empowered every few seconds, granting the next attack extra damage and slowing the target's movement for a short time.

SChinese: 办法只有一个，那就是....让大古变成光
English: There is only one way, and that is... let Taigo become light.

SChinese: 获得新技能：耀月「光铸神灵」
使任意一名友方少女获得月球科技模仿的神灵之力
English: Grants an allied girl the power of a god as imitated by Lunar technology.

Channels the Myriad Gods, granting bonus strength for every allied girl nearby.

All allied girls nearby (including herself) gain the effects of「Channel Ame no Uzume」and「Channel Kanayamahiko-no-Mikoto」.

SChinese: 无数的光芒与希望灌注在体内，八百万之神尽在掌中，此刻，你已成万军之主！
English: Countless lights and hopes pour into you, and the Myriad Gods are in the palm of your hand. In this moment, it is as if you were the leader of an army ten-thousand strong!

SChinese: 妖梦以肉眼无法捕捉到的速度向前快速移动，并在途中做出两次斩击,每次对%damage_radius%码内的敌方造成物理伤害。\n每次伤害为基础伤害+0.8*自动攻击伤害。
English:
Rushes with blinding speed towards the target, slashing twice through all enemies within %damage_radius% range.

ATTACK DAMAGE MULTIPLIER: 80%

SChinese: 妖梦向前方高速移动，一瞬之后轨道上将布满樱色的剑闪。十分华丽的剑技，也有说这是从修剪庭院领会而来，洋溢着生活感的技巧。
English: Youmu rushes forward with blinding speed, leaving behind a trail of cherry blossoms. A beautiful sword technique, it is said she learned this from pruning the garden. A technique filled with the splendor of life.
Hesitation-Cutting Sword「Slash of Departure from Hesitation」

SChinese: 妖梦的攻击能直斩灵魂。每次攻击时，增加额外物理伤害，同时能削弱目标护甲，持续%duration%秒。该效果不可驱散。
English: Each attack cuts straight through the soul, dealing extra damage and reducing the target's armor for %duration% seconds. Stacks up to 16 times.

SChinese: 妖梦往楼观剑内注入大量妖力，创造出的斩击。对灵魂有着压倒性的攻击力，想要回避都极为困难。
English: Youmu infuses her sword with phantom energy, creating a powerful slash. The slash cuts deep into the soul itself, making it nearly impossible to avoid.

SChinese: 魂魄「幽明求闻持聪明之法」
English: Soul Sign「Wheel of Pain of the Living and Dead」

SChinese: 妖梦将身边的半灵化为实体随本体进行移动、攻击。半灵继承断迷剑「迷津慈航斩」，但是只造成%bouns_damage%倍效果
English: Turns your phantom half into a full copy of yourself that follows you and attacks your targets. Inherits the「Slash of Departure from Hesitation」effect, but at %bouns_damage%x effectiveness.

SChinese: 妖梦令即使受到伤害也不会消失的幽灵半身,追踪人类半身的行动。
English: Youmu's phantom half does not disappear even when attacked, and tracks the movements of her human half.
Human Oni「Slash of the Eternal Future」

SChinese: 妖梦聚集起内心的力量进行一次威力巨大的攻击。
English: Dashes in and assaults the target with multiple powerful strikes. Stuns the target.

SChinese: 妖梦将对手冲刺斩击至浮空后，再于空中进行连续追击。威力极高且拥有无敌时间，可谓是攻防一体的完美Spell。
English: Youmu dashes forward and throws the opponent into the air with a quick slash, followed up with multiple slashes that keep them airborne. With its high power and invincibility, it can be considered a perfect Spellcard that combines a strong offense with a solid defense.

SChinese: 未来永劫斩对%wanbaochui_radius%范围内敌方同时造成伤害,并且控制时间增加至%wanbaochui_stun%秒。
English: 「Slash of the Eternal Future」affects all enemies within 350 range of the target and the stun duration is increased to %wanbaochui_stun% seconds.

SChinese: 向指定方向突进并对终点附近敌人用楼观、白楼进行%count%次斩击，共造成%damage%伤害。
English: Rushes to the target position and slashes enemies nearby with Roukanken and Hakurouken a total of %count% times, dealing damage.

SChinese:
被动：

使用楼观剑对敌人造成额外伤害。每隔一次攻击附带额外伤害并造成%silence_time%秒沉默。\n

主动：

%duration%内招架一次少女伤害并瞬间移动到该少女背后。
English:
Passive:

Youmu uses Roukanken to cut down her enemies. Every other attack deals additional magical damage and silences the target for %silence_time% seconds.\n

Active:

Enters a parrying stance, blocking the next damage instance taken from an enemy girl. If she successfully parries, she will teleport behind the girl who triggered it.

SChinese: 魂魄「幽明求闻持聪明之法」
English: Konpaku「Dharma of Gumonji Wisdom of the Living and Dead」

SChinese: 将半灵留在原地并增加移动速度，再次使用半灵和本体交换位置并对位置%radius%周围发动斩击，造成伤害并附带攻击特效的普攻的伤害。
English:
Leaves your phantom half at your current position, then increases your movement speed. Activating the ability again within the duration will cause you to return to your phantom half and slash all enemies around the destination.

The slash counts as a normal attack, deals damage based on your attack damage, and can trigger any on-hit effects.
Voidness Sword「Slash Clearing the Six Senses」

SChinese: 瞬移到目标身旁并对目标敌人定在原地%duration%秒，降低魔法抗性%break_duration%秒并造成伤害。\n释放技能后的%flick_time%秒内带一次对普通攻击的弹反，触发后增加攻速%bonus_duration%秒。
English:
Teleports to the target and roots them, dealing damage and reducing their magic resistance and breaking them.

For %flick_time% seconds afterwards, she can parry a single normal attack from an enemy girl. If the parry is successful, she will gain increased attack speed for %bonus_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 将灵体附身于敌人或队友身上，使其接下来%duration%秒造成的所有伤害变为魔法伤害。\n若依附自身，则使自己的所有伤害变为物理伤害。\n附身后使用「幽明求闻持聪明之法」会降落到自身以外目标身边。
English:
Orders your phantom half to possess the target girl. Converts all damage dealt by them to magical damage for %duration% seconds.

If you target yourself, converts all damage you deal into physical damage instead.

While this ability is active, if you return to your phantom half using 「Dharma of Gumonji Wisdom of the Living and Dead」, you will move to the target of this ability instead.

SChinese: 降低自身%decrease_damage%攻击力，造成的所有伤害都变为魔法伤害。
English: Converts all damage dealt to magical damage, but grants -%decrease_damage% attack damage.

SChinese: 妖梦对攻击者发出即时攻击并且不会被闪避。
English: Youmu perform instant attack on the attacker and never miss.

SChinese: 妖梦先用白楼剑招架攻击后再以反击。\n反击前免疫物理伤害。
English: Youmu parries and counter-attacks with Hakurouken. \nYoumu is immune to physical damage while parrying.

SChinese: 进入游戏地图后输入 “-youmu2” 可以更换技能卡。更换之前不要学习技能点
English: Enter '-youmu2' before learning any skill to change to the other skill set.
Oni Sign「Anomalies, Strength, Disorder, and Spirits」

SChinese: 勇仪是代表「力」的鬼神，力量不是一般的高之外，更能将力量全面运用至最高境界。
English: Employs the ruinous powers of the Oni tribe to increase her own Strength.
Feat of Strength「Storm on Mt. Ooe」

SChinese: 勇仪在攻击时有概率将人顶飞，推出%distance%距离，并造成魔法伤害及晕眩。
English: Grants a chance to blow the enemy away on a general attack, dealing extra damage, stunning and knocking them away by %distance%.
Big Four Arcanum「Knock Out In Three Steps」

SChinese: 打人一下，一震，对方在持续时间内移动超过%ability_radius%码，直接死。如果移动不超过%ability_radius%码则造成总血量%damage_percent%%%的纯粹伤害。
English: A signature move that executes the target if they move more than %ability_radius% away from the spot or deals %damage_percent%%% of their max health as pure damage if they don't.

SChinese: 无视【博丽神社护身符】，斩杀效果无视【蓬莱之药】。\n无视魔法免疫，无法驱散。\n斩杀的实际效果是通过造成 多段 无视无敌及隐藏 的 高额纯粹伤害 来实现的，所以会被拉尔瓦的「Crazy Butterfly」反弹大量伤害；在面对拥有非常多「大统一定理」十字架的梦美教授时甚至可能斩杀失败。（过时）
English: Ignores Hakurei Shrine Amulet and「Hourai Elixir」.
Ignores spell immunity and cannot be dispelled.
Some push effects may be decreased or disabled on affected targets.

The execution effect is achieved by ignoring invulnerability and dealing an immense amount of pure damage. As such,「Crazy Butterfly」can reflect it for a huge amount of damage, and it may even fail to kill characters such as Yumemi in some circumstances.(Outdated)

SChinese: 三步必杀对目标周围350范围内的敌方少女同时施加。
English: All girls in a 350 AoE around the target are also affected by「Knock Out In Three Steps」.

SChinese: 从高空中放出一个间隙单位，落地时可以震晕敌方单位并造成伤害及晕眩。\n智力加成：%int_bonus%
English: Yukari releases a unit from her gap to bomb target location, deals damage and stuns enemies in the region.\nBONUS DAMAGE PER INT：%int_bonus%

SChinese: 若紫在施放该技能时没有任何间隙单位，则不会造成任何效果，并会返还全额冷却和魔法消耗。这个行为仍会被视为使用一次技能，会为【御币】、【妖精的节奏】等效果充能。\n这个效果释放的小兵无法使敌方建筑的偷塔保护失效。\n被释放的单位必定会受到这个技能的伤害，无论它是敌方小兵还是我方小兵。

将一个单位拉到隙间，使目标在技能持续时间内完全脱离与现实世界的联系。

如果该单位是普通单位，则会存放在间隙中。

如果该单位不是普通单位,返还一半的冷却时间。
English:
Yukari sends a unit into her gap shortly, making it invulnerable and disabled.

If the traget is a lane creep, it will be stored in Yukari's gap as a bomb.

If the target is not a lane creep, return half cooldown.

SChinese: 将少女或野怪拉入间隙不会增加间隙内的单位数量。
English: Sends girls or neutral creeps into gap will not be stored.

SChinese: 魍魉「栖息于禅寺的妖蝶」

将自己传送至地图上任意地点。需要持续施法%AbilityCastPoint%秒。\n此外，每隔30-(技能等级*2+紫等级*0.5)秒，紫会在间隙中存放多一只生物。

双击将传送至己方泉水。
English:
Yukari teleports on a target location after %AbilityCastPoint% seconds channeling.\nAlso, every 30-(ability lv*2+Yukari's lv*0.5) seconds, Yukari sends a unit into her gap.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

SChinese: 如果中止传送或者被打断，会返还全额冷却和魔法消耗。
English: If stop teleporting or interrupted, return full cooldown and mana cost.

SChinese: 传送完成后产生空间震，对%wanbaochui_radius%范围内的敌方单位造成%int_bonus%倍智力的魔法伤害
English: Yukari triggers spacequake at the target location after teleport, deals (%int_bonus%*intelligence) magical damage to enemies in %wanbaochui_radius% radius.

SChinese: 以友方普通单位或建筑附近的地点为目标展开大型的传送结界，结界范围内的己方队友和其他队友玩家的单位会一起被传送至目标单位旁，结界范围内的敌方普通单位则会被拉入间隙。引导时间越长，传送结界的范围就越大。最大引导时间2秒，结界的最大范围为750。无论引导多久，只要引导一结束（即使是被打断的），传送就会进行。\n引导期间，目标地点会散射出大量的弹幕，对周围的敌方单位造成伤害。\n等级2的该技能可以对友方少女附近的地点使用；等级3的该技能可以以任意位置为目标进行传送。
English:
Yukari deploys a teleport barrier. Area of the barrier expands as Yukari keeps channeling, with the max channeling time of 2 seconds and area for 750 radius.
When Yukari stops channeling, Yukari and allied grils in the barrier will be teleported to the target location together and sends units in the barrier into gap.\nDuring Yukari's channeling, the barrier keeps emitting danmaku at the target location to deals continuous damage to enemies nearby.\nAt level 2 can be casted on locations near friendly girls; At level 3 can be casted on any location as the target.

SChinese: 传送完成后产生空间震，对%wanbaochui_radius%范围内的敌方单位造成%int_bonus%倍智力的魔法伤害
English: Yukari triggers spacequake at the target location after teleport, deals (%int_bonus%*intelligence) magical damage to enemies in %wanbaochui_radius% radius.
Aerial Bait「Hyperactive High Speed Flying Object」

SChinese: 将在间隙内的数个单位连续释放至目标区域，造成数次当前等级的「轨道牵引」效果，每次「轨道牵引」的落点是随机的。\n紫每提升5级，释放单位数量增加2个。
English: Yukari releases units in her gaps to bomb target location randomly. Causes several instances of '「Overflowing Flotsam」' effects at the current level.\nBombing 2 more units every 5 levels for Yukari.

SChinese: 如果没有学习'「轨道牵引」'，则造成1级'「轨道牵引」'的效果。
English: If haven't learnt '「Overflowing Flotsam」', deal the effect of level 1 of'「Overflowing Flotsam」'.

SChinese: 梦美掷出手中的十字架，对直线距离范围内的单位造成伤害，每已损失%damage_mult_per_mana%魔法值，伤害额外提高%damage_mana_mult%%%，十字架会在技能释放的最大距离停止并立起。
English: Yumemi shoots a cross forward, dealing damage to enemies in its path. For every %damage_mult_per_mana% mana missing, the damage is increased by %damage_mana_mult%%%. The cross will be erected at the maximum distance of the spell.

SChinese: 梦美驾驶一架空间船飞向目标地点，飞行过程中会不断消耗梦美的魔法值。
English: Yumemi gets on a spaceship and flies to the target location. Mana will be consumed continuously during the flight.

SChinese: 梦美升级了她的空间船。
梦美分裂出一个自我，自我会在1秒后爆炸，对周围造成伤害并减速，并立起一个十字架。
English: Yumemi clones herself and erects a cross at her current position. After a 1 second delay, the clone explodes, slowing and dealing damage to enemies nearby.

SChinese: 该技能不再产生十字架，但当<font color='#FFFFFF'>「可能性空间船」</font>结束飞行时，如果飞行距离超过<font color='#FFFFFF'>800</font>，立即施放该技能且没有爆发延迟，且每额外飞行<font color='#FFFFFF'>500</font>距离将提高<font color='#FFFFFF'>20%</font>的伤害和<font color='#FFFFFF'>10%</font>的作用范围。
梦美疯狂的使用自己最后武器，在%duration%秒内，梦美将会停止一切动作用于释放核弹，无视任何控制效果，释放结束后会对周围的敌人造成巨大伤害并眩晕%stun_duration%秒。
English: Yumemi frantically pulls out her ultimate weapon. For %duration% seconds, Yumemi stops all other actions to prepare the cationic bomb. Once released, nearby enemies will take huge damage and are stunned for %stun_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 核弹的释放不能被打断，除非梦美被击杀，梦美如果在释放过程中被击杀核弹会被立刻引爆.
English: The channel cannot be stopped in any situation except that Yumemi is killed. But the bomb will explode immediately when she dies.

SChinese: 教授能将一切的能量互相转化，场上每存在一个十字架，就能给教授增加%attack_bonus%点攻击，且在教授即将受到伤害时自动消解最早的十字架使教授0.05秒内抵消所有伤害\n十字架存在12秒后消失。
English: Yumemi is expert in energy conversion. Each cross on the field increases her attack damage by %attack_bonus%, and can be consumed to evade damage for 0.05 seconds.\nDisappears after 12 seconds.

SChinese: 梦美能将%cross_cost%个十字架转化为能量。回复%mana_restore_pct%%%最大魔法值并躲避弹道。
English: Yumemi can turn %cross_cost% crosses to energy. Restore %mana_restore_pct%%% of max mana and dodge projectiles.

SChinese: 在自身附近种下一圈封闭的向日葵海，能使敌人被围困。
English: Yuuka surrounds herself with flowers that attack enemies.

SChinese: 指定一个敌方单位，一直种花直至击中目标，眩晕对方。
English: Yuuka shoots out flowers towards an enemy. If it hits the target, it stuns and deals damage to them.
Irrigation「Garden of the Sun in Four Seasons」

SChinese: 创造一片太阳之田，幽香与花皆会得到强化，提升攻击速度及回血速度。
English: Yuuka creates a garden of the sun, granting herself and her flowers bonus health regeneration and attack speed.

SChinese: 幻想「花鸟风月、啸风弄月」
指定一朵向日葵，将该向日葵幻化成自己的分身，分身会在本体施放技能时施放相同技能。
English: Yuuka converts a sunflower into an illusion of herself. Whenever Yuuka casts a spell, the illusion will cast the same spell simultaneously.

SChinese: 战无不胜的刚欲同盟盟主，随无限食欲成长的晚成型。

尤魔每秒损失%curr_hp_loss_pct%%%当前生命值。当前生命值低于%hp_threshold%%%时，消耗速度减半。
每有%every_max_hp%点最大生命值获得%as_every_max_hp%攻击速度，每损失%every_loss_hp%点生命值获得%as_every_loss_hp%攻击速度。
English:
Yuuma loses %curr_hp_loss_pct%%% current health per second. When current health is below %hp_threshold%%%, the losing speed is halved.
Gains %as_every_max_hp% attack speed for every %every_max_hp% max health, and %as_every_loss_hp% attack speed for every %every_loss_hp% missing health.
Undefeated Matriarch of the Gouyoku Alliance, Late-Blooming Type who Grows via Infinite Appetite.
Cherry Blossom Sign「Perfect Ink-Black Cherry Blossom」

SChinese: 向前方施放一道樱花波，对一条直线上的敌方单位造成伤害。
English: Sends a wave of cherry blossoms towards the target point, damaging enemies alone the path.

SChinese: 幽雅地绽放吧，墨染的樱花～

English: Death Sign「Life of Drunk, Dream of Death」

SChinese: 让目标忘却一切烦恼，进入梦幻般的世界，恍惚中的单位受到伤害后会醒来。恍惚期间，被攻击时会将梦境转移到攻击者上。幽幽子可以对目标造成一定伤害而不唤醒目标。
English: Puts the target enemy or friendly girl into trance. Tranced girls are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Dream passes to the attacking girl. Yuyuko can deal certain damage to the target and not wake up it.
Life of Drunk, Dream of Death.

SChinese: 将所有人从梦境中唤醒。

恍惚使受影响的目标变为无敌%wudi_duration%秒。
转移梦境时会将剩下的时间一同转移。
施放后将替换为梦境终止：结束所有受作用单位身上的梦境。
English:
Trance turns affected targets invulnerable for %wudi_duration% second.
When passing the Dream, the remaining time will be passed together.
On cast, replaced with Dream End: Ends all ongoing Dreams on any affected units.

SChinese: 生者必灭，幽幽子附近所有依然生存的敌方单位，每秒受到固定比例的纯粹伤害。幽幽子每次击杀单位都将被动获得恢复效果，持续%regen_duration%秒。
English: Law of Mortality. Aura of death makes nearby enemies lose a percentage of their Max Health every second. Passively provides regen for %regen_duration% seconds for each unit Yuyuko kills.

SChinese: 幽幽子身边的幽灵能够持续地夺去周围敌人的体力。
English: The ghosts around Yuyuko can continuously take away the spirit of the surrounding enemies.

SChinese: 每次击杀提供生命恢复：
英雄击杀提供恢复倍数：
每次击杀提供魔法恢复：
恍惚中的敌人只会受到%trance_reduce_pct%%%伤害。
English: Only deals %trance_reduce_pct%%% damage to tranced enemies.

SChinese: 增加主动技能。幽幽子进入幽灵形态。在这个形态下，无法攻击或被攻击，受到的魔法伤害增加，但每秒生命流失提高%lyz_damage_plus%%%，并根据%lyz_heal_pct%%%生命流失造成的伤害治疗幽幽子。
English: Adds an active ability. Yuyuko enters ghost form. Unable to attack or be attacked, takes additional magic damage in this form, but health decay is increased by %lyz_damage_plus%%% and healing Yuyuko with %lyz_heal_pct%%% of damage dealt from health decay.

SChinese: 引导2.0秒，之后在2.0秒内，每0.2秒随机选择范围内单位造成伤害。若选中的是普通单位则直接死亡，若选中的是敌方少女则造成[最大生命值-当前生命值]的纯粹伤害。被此技能所击杀的单位将对周围%damage_radius%码造成范围性伤害.
English: Opens up the great fan of mortality in 2 sec, sending waves of death around you. Affected creeps die instantly and emit minor waves of damage. Affected characters take pure damage based on the amount of their missing Health.

SChinese: 昔者庄周梦为胡蝶，栩栩然胡蝶也。自喻适志与！不知周也。俄然觉，则蘧蘧然周也。不知周之梦为胡蝶与？胡蝶之梦为周与？周与胡蝶则必有分矣。此之谓物化。
English: Once I, Zhuangzi, dreamed that I became a flying butterfly, happy with myself and doing as I pleased. I forgot that I was Zhuangzi. Suddenly I woke up and I was Zhuangzi again. I did not know whether Zhuangzi had been dreaming that he was a butterfly, or whether a butterfly had been dreaming that it was Zhuangzi. There must be a difference between the two, which is what I call “the transformation of things.”

SChinese: 损失生命换算伤害百分比：
每次伤害结算会对目标造成0.1s眩晕，爆炸后造成0.3s的群体眩晕。
English: Each wave stuns the target for 0.1s, deals 0.3s area stunning on killing units.

SChinese: 实体与灵体之间皆於幽幽子予无形。在幽幽子死亡後，幽幽子会变成灵魂形态，无法被任何人所伤害，同时无法攻击，不能被攻击，且强制留在原地，但可继续施法。持续时间结束后才会真正死亡。
English: After your perishment, a ghost of yours is summoned to stay nearby. It is immune to any damage and can use any of your spells, but cannot attack and be attacked.

SChinese: 向前方位置突进并短暂增加%bonus_damage%攻击，持续%increaseattack_duration%秒\n突进距离: %push_length% \n 突进速度: %push_speed%
English: Rushes forwards in the direction she is currently facing and increases her attack damage by %bonus_damage% for %increaseattack_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 让三个大型的魔法灵摆围绕一个友方目标提高其护甲和魔法抗性，%radius%范围内被灵摆撞到的敌方单位也会受到一定伤害。\n智力加成：%ability_multi%
English: Surrounds the target allied unit or herself with three large magical pendulums, increasing their armor and magical resistance. Enemies within %radius% range of the target unit will also take damage every second.

SChinese: 纳兹琳在使用她的寻龙尺进行攻击时，有一定几率使出一次额外的攻击，额外的那次攻击可触发装备效果
English: Whenever Nazrin attacks with her dowsing rods, she has a small chance of instantly attacking again, which can proc any on-hit effects including itself.

SChinese: 指定一个目标敌方少女，打上金钱的记号。若己方少女对该少女攻击，额外附加%basedamage%法术伤害并晕眩该单位%stun_duration%秒,每人最多发生一次。\n若该少女在持续时间内死亡时,所有攻击生效的队友（包括自己）得到额外%bonus_gold%金钱。敏捷加成：%ability_multi%
English:
Marks an enemy girl with a bounty. Whenever an allied girl attacks the target, they will recieve additional magical damage and be stunned for %stun_duration% seconds. Only triggers once per attacker.

If the target dies during this effect, all allies (including herself) recieve %bonus_gold% additional gold.

SChinese:
被动：

让全队少女每%give_gold_interval%秒获得%give_gold_amount%金币
English:
Passive:

Passively grants all allied girls %give_gold_amount% gold every %give_gold_interval% seconds.

SChinese: 纳兹琳寻找埋在地里的神符，持续挖掘%AbilityChannelTime%秒，有%DOTA_RUNE_BOUNTY_chance%% 概率挖到赏金神符，其余概率挖到随机一种强化神符（包括隐身神符，智慧神符，双倍伤害神符，幻象神符，护盾神符）
English: Nazrin digs for %AbilityChannelTime% seconds to search for buried treasure. There is a %DOTA_RUNE_BOUNTY_chance%%% chance of digging up a bounty rune, otherwise a random other rune will be spawned instead. The other runes have an equal chance of being either an Invisibility, Wisdom, Double Damage, Illusion, or Shield rune.

SChinese: 让一个敌人被星星风暴所困，无法进行任何移动。\n该少女可以施放任何技能解除此状态，但会燃烧该少女的一部分最大魔法值，并造成等值的魔法伤害。
English:
Traps an enemy girl in a storm of stars, rooting them.

Trapped girls can cast a spell to end the effect immediately, but it will burn a portion of their maximum mana and deal an equal amount of magical damage.

SChinese: 无法对技能免疫目标施放，但是所有效果均无视技能免疫。
English: Cannot be cast on spell immune targets, but the effects ignore spell immunity.

SChinese: 提升最大魔法值燃烧效果，并且被困少女在释放技能时会根据目标损失的魔法值，对目标和其周围的敌人造成魔法伤害。
English:
Increases the amount of mana burned.

When the target casts a spell, for each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.

SChinese: 在空中放置一颗带有探测功能的星星，星星带有%aoe%范围的空中视野以及%true_sight_range%真视范围。星星无法被攻击。\n星星受到%attack_count%次伤害以后会消失。
English:
Places down a piece of stardust with her ability of detection, providing %aoe% range flying vision and %true_sight_range% range True Sight over the area. Cannot be attacked.

Stardust pieces disappear if they are damaged %attack_count% times.

SChinese: 减少附近友方少女的技能和物品冷却时间。
English: Reduces spell and item cooldowns for all nearby allied girls.

SChinese: 持续施法%duration%秒，召唤蓝宝石星群从天而降。\n每%intervals%秒随机选择身边%effect_radius%范围内非少女单位落下星星造成魔法伤害，并恢复斯塔的生命值。
English:
Channelling for up to %duration% seconds, Star Sapphire summons shower of stars from the sky.

Every %intervals% seconds a star falls onto a random non-girl unit within %effect_radius% range, dealing damage and healing Star Sapphire.

Activates a magic shield, which absorbs damage using spirit. Absorbs %damage_reduction%%  of total damage taken. \n has a passive effect of returning mana from %tooltip_manareturn%% of the damage dealt . \n each point of mana abosrb %damage_per_mana% damage.

SChinese: 逐渐提高速度，来回多次冲击的大技。碰撞到地形障碍或者达到最大单程距离将改变方向。击中敌人将造成伤害。\n累计击中同一目标3次后将击晕目标1秒。
English: A great skill of gradually increasing speed and repeatedly impacting back and forth. Collision with terrain obstacles or reaching the maximum one-way distance will change direction. Hitting enemies and dealing damage.\nAfter hitting the same target 3 times in total, the target will be stunned for 1 second.

SChinese: 敬请欣赏，由幻想乡第一的速度交织编成的优雅弹幕。
English: Now witness the elegant danmaku spread by Gensokyo's fastest.

SChinese: 伤害不对建筑生效。\n冲刺中的文，势不可挡。
English: Damage do not work on buildings.\nDuring dashing, Aya is unstoppable.

SChinese: 编织出一张蜘蛛网,黑谷山女在蛛网里获得无视地形移动的能力，同时提高生命恢复和移动速度。蛛网永久存在,不过可以手动摧毁。当其数量超过上限,最早的蛛网将会消失。
English: Spins a large web that grants Yamame a passive movement speed increase, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement.「Capture Web」charges restore every %AbilityChargeRestoreTime% seconds.「Capture Web」can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. The movement bonus is proportional to the unit's HP.

SChinese: 黑谷山女给与敌人前进的警告
English: Yamame warns enemies against going forward.
Shackles Sign「Shackles a Criminal Can't Take Off」

SChinese: 大喝一声重击地面，对范围内的敌人造成伤害并眩晕。
English: Stomps the ground with a loud shout, dealing damage and stunning enemies in range.

SChinese: 召唤出虫群，对周围的敌人进行撕咬，回归的时候按照伤害量回复自身生命。
English: Unleashes insects to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Wriggle is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.
Medicine Sign「Great Galaxy in a Jar」

SChinese: 射出一支带有魔力的箭矢，使得目标的周围产生一个无法逃脱的光圈。
English: Enchanted arrow creates a circular barrier around the target point, that prevents enemies from leaving its confines.

SChinese: 永琳的弹幕中的激光如同续写了成千上万年的系谱一般，剥夺了敌人行动的自由
English: Restricts movement with lasers shaped like a genealogical tree - one that's stretched onward for tens of thousands of years.

SChinese: 将緋想之剑插入地下，在大地上撕开一条沟壑，造成伤害和眩晕。\n沟壑是地形障碍，会阻碍单位移动。
English: Strikes the ground with the Sword of Hisou, creating an impassable ridge which deals damage and stuns enemies.

SChinese: 天子将气质打入地下使地上产生大的隆起并向左右攻击。
English: Penetrate temperaments into the terrain and create big lumps that attack left and right.

SChinese:
火+火=火神之光(召唤火元素)
火+水=燃素之雨(持续伤害目标单位及周围)
火+木=森林大火(范围持续伤害)
火+金=圣爱尔摩火柱(烧蓝并伤血)
火+土=环状熔岩带(AOE眩晕+环状沟壑)
水+水=湖葬(范围内持续减速沉默)
水+木=水精灵(回复目标生命和法力)
水+金=水银之毒(范围内降低魔抗并造成伤害)
水+土=诺亚的大洪水(击退线性上单位)
木+木=风灵的角笛(加速目标)
木+金=元素收割者(线性上第一个单位造成伤害并为自己回血)
木+土=纠缠藤蔓(缠绕))
金+金=金属疲劳(按移动距离造成伤害和破甲)
金+土=翡翠巨石(滚动巨石伤害加吸引周围单位)
土+土=三石塔的震动(延迟范围眩晕+伤害)
English:
fire+fire=Agni Shine(fire element spirit)
fire+water=Phlogistic Rain(area damage)
fire+wood=Forest Blaze(area damage)
fire+metal=Saint Elmo's Pillar(mana burn & damage)
fire+earth=Lava Cromlech(round impassable ridge)
water+water=Bury In Lake(area silence & slow)
water+wood=Water Elf(regeneration)
water+metal=Mercury Poison(area damage & magical resistance reduction)
water+earth=Noachian Deluge(area damage & knockback)
wood+wood=Sylphy Horn(speed up)
wood+metal=Elemental Harvester(damage % regeneration)
wood+earth=Vine Root(root & damage))
metal+metal=Metal Fatigue(damage & armor reduction based on move distance)
metal+earth=Emerald Megalith(megalith dragging and damage)
earth+earth=Trilithon Shake(delayed area stun and damage)

SChinese:
主动：笨蛋跳法

向随机方向进行随机距离的闪烁\n多个扫把类物品提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Active: Stupid Blink

Randomly blinks you between %blink_range_min% and %blink_range_max% distance.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple brooms do not stack.

SChinese: 使英雄升级一个已有技能，或新增一个技能。
English: Upgrades an existing ability or adds a new ability to your girl.

SChinese:
被动：致命一击

每次攻击时有%crit_chance_const%%%概率造成%crit_mult%%%伤害。\n

被动：怨灵附身

每受到%buff_take_damage_trigger%点伤害，提高%buff_crit_chance%%%暴击率，最多提高到%buff_max_stack%%%，持续%buff_duration%秒。
English:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance_const%%% chance to deal %crit_mult%%% damage.\n

Passive: Ghost Possession

Critical chance increases by %buff_crit_chance%%% for every %buff_take_damage_trigger% damage taken for %buff_duration% seconds. Stackable.

SChinese:
每次触发时将刷新持续时间，并非独立计算每层效果时间。
当达到最大堆叠层数时再次触发，不会增加层数，但是会刷新持续时间。
效果图标上的数字显示的是最终暴击几率。
English:
The duration is refreshed every time it is triggered, the stacks are not calculated independently.
If the maximum number of stacks have been reached, the number of stacks does not increase, but the duration will still be refreshed when triggered.
The number on the status effect icon shows the total critical chance.

SChinese: 多个船钩提供的移动速度加成叠加。
English: The speed bonus from multiple Anchors fully stacks.

SChinese:
被动：锐叶

普通攻击对目标施加飞刀穿刺效果，持续%duration%秒，最大%maxstack%层，每层对目标额外造成%damage%魔法伤害。\n

被动：穿刺

普通攻击有%chance%%%概率无视闪避。
English:
Passive: Sharp Leaves

Attacks applies Throwing Knife Pierce effect to the target for %duration% seconds, stacks up to %maxstack%. Deals extra %damage% magical damage to target for each stacks.\n

Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion.

SChinese:
被动：八卦之火

增加%bonus_damage_percentage%%%技能增强。每秒回复%percent_mana_regen_bonus%%%最大法力值。
English:
Passive: Eight-Trigram Furnace

Increase %bonus_damage_percentage%%% spell damage amplification.Restores %percent_mana_regen_bonus%%% maximum mana per second.

SChinese:
法力回复不会显示在魔法条的恢复值上。
每隔1秒进行一次法力回复，其值为最大法力值的1%。
多个八卦之火效果仅法力回复效果叠加。
English:
Mana regeneration is not displayed on the mana bar.
Regenerates %percent_mana_regen_bonus%%% exactly once per second.
Multiple Eight-Trigram Furnace effects work independently.

SChinese:
主动：驱邪

立刻根据能量点数回复相应的生命和魔法，每点能量恢复%restore_per_charge%点生命和魔法。\n

被动：充能

每当周围%charge_radius%视野范围内有敌人施放技能都会自动充能（最多%max_charges%点能量）。
English:
Active: Purification

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.\n

Passive: Recharge

Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability. Max %max_charges% charges.

SChinese:
当装备不同等级的御币时，只有最高级御币的收集效果有效。
收集成功时，若存在多个对应等级的御币，排序靠后的那个将获得收集数，即使它在背包内。
English:
If there are multiple Gohei items in the inventory, only the highest level Gohei will gain charges.
If the recharge is successful, but the Gohei is full and there are multiple of the same Gohei item, the charge will be given to the next Gohei instead.

SChinese:
主动：驱邪

立刻根据能量点数回复相应的生命和魔法，每点能量恢复%restore_per_charge%点生命和魔法。\n

被动：充能

每当周围%charge_radius%视野范围内有敌人施放技能都会自动充能（最多%max_charges%点能量）。
English:
Active: Purification

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.\n

Passive: Recharge

Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability. Max %max_charges% charges.

SChinese:
当装备不同等级的御币时，只有最高级御币的收集效果有效。
收集成功时，若存在多个对应等级的御币，排序靠后的那个将获得收集数，即使它在背包内。
English:
If there are multiple Gohei items in the inventory, only the highest level Gohei will gain charges.
If the recharge is successful, but the Gohei is full and there are multiple of the same Gohei item, the charge will be given to the next Gohei instead.

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.

SChinese: 血晶石派生道具之间的吸血不可叠加，吸血效果以最后获得的道具为主。\n血晶石系列道具攻击幻象与建筑无法吸血，攻击特效伤害也不能吸血。
English:
Doesn't stack with other sources of lifesteal.

Cannot lifesteal off of illusions and buildings, nor from on-hit effects.

SChinese:
主动：碎骨笛

为周围友军提供%movement_speed_percent_bonus%%%移动速度加成和%incoming_damage%%%伤害减免，持续%buff_duration%秒。

作用范围：%effect_radius%
效果无法驱散\n

被动：迅捷光环

提升自身与周围友军%bouns_speed%点移动速度。

光环作用范围：%effect_radius%
English:
Active: Mystia's Flute

Grants %movement_speed_percent_bonus%%% movement speed and %incoming_damage%%% damage reduction to nearby allies for %buff_duration% seconds.

Radius: %effect_radius%
This effect cannot be dispelled.\n

Passive: Swiftness Aura

Grants %bouns_speed% movement speed to allies.

Aura Radius: %effect_radius%

SChinese:
主动技能只对使用时符合要求的目标施加效果，不是一个光环。
多个本物品主动技能造成的效果无法叠加，只会刷新持续时间。
English:
The active component only applies effects to eligible targets on use, it is not an aura.
The buff provided by the active component of this item does not stack, it will only refresh the duration.

SChinese:
被动：伤害吸收

受到普通攻击时有%chance%%%的概率抵消%percent%%%实际受到的物理伤害,最多抵消%block%点伤害。
English:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %chance%%% chance to block %percent%%% physical damage from incoming attacks, up to %block%.

SChinese: 桃花岛的伤害格挡，可以减少来自所有单位类型的普通攻击伤害，包括守卫。\n
English: This version of damage block reduces attack damage from all units, including wards.\n

SChinese: 当持有哨戒天狗护盾时，木盾将不再生效。\n
English: Wooden Shield has no effect while holding a Patrol Tengu Shield.\n

SChinese: 持有多个木盾时概率互相独立,但在单次攻击内最多生效一次。
English: Multiple Wooden Shields can proc independently of each other, but the effect can only take place once per attack received.

SChinese: \n多个扫把类物品提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English: \nMovement speed bonuses from multiple brooms do not stack.

SChinese: 魔理沙的家用扫把。扫地时耐用又实用，握住它还能让你跑得更快！旅行者的另一必备品
English: Marisa's household broom. Durable and useful for sweeping floors and holding it also makes you run faster! Another must-have for travelers

SChinese:
主动：风神庇佑

开启后增加%burst_movement_speed_percent_bonus%%%移速，并获得相位与减速免疫状态，持续%burst_duration%秒。\n多个风神羽翼提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Active: Wind God's Blessing

Increase movement speed by %burst_movement_speed_percent_bonus%%%, and lets you move through units and immune to slows for %burst_duration% seconds.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple Wind God Wings do not stack.

SChinese:
被动：取材

每次普通攻击对目标造成目标最大生命值%damage_health_percent%%%的纯粹伤害。对巨大上海只造成%roshan_percent%%%效果。
English:
Passive: Snapshot

Grants each attack to deal pure damage equal to %damage_health_percent%%% of the target's max health. Only deals %roshan_percent%%% damage to Giant Shanghai.

SChinese:
对建筑的攻击无法触发。
幻象的攻击无法触发。
English:
Does not work on buildings.
Cannot trigger from an illusion's attacks.

SChinese:
使用：我是一个坏人

使自身移动速度提升%speedup_movespeed_percent%%%，持续%speedup_duration%秒。
English:
Use: I'm a Bad Girl

Increases your movement speed by %speedup_movespeed_percent%%% for %speedup_duration% seconds.

SChinese:
该物品在队友间完全共享。
与其他所有的卡共享冷却时间。

商店补充存货时间：120秒
商店存货上限：2
English:
The item is fully shareable with allies.
Shares a cooldown with all other cards.

Restock Time: 120 seconds
Max Stock: 2

前10分钟无法对远古单位使用，无法对巨大上海使用。

Cannot devour ancients in the first 10 minutes of the game, and can never devour Giant Shanghai.

If the target dies during this time, the cost of the card is refunded and the user will gain an additional %min_gold% gold for every minute that has passed.
