SChinese:
被动：削铁如泥·改

攻击将降低目标%corruption_armor%点护甲，持续%duration%秒。\n

被动：二天一流·其一

每次击杀其他英雄之后，永久增加持有者%atk_per_stack%攻击力，最多增加%maxstack%次。
English:
Passive: Cut Iron Like Mud+

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %duration% seconds. Does not affect buildings.\n

Passive: The first technique of Niten Ichiryu

Girl's attack damage is increased permanently by %atk_per_stack% each time she kills other girls, which the maximum time is %maxstack%.

SChinese:
效果可以驱散。
同种装备减甲效果不叠加，不同装备减甲效果完全叠加。
击杀英雄增加攻击力的效果永久存在，也不会因为装备消失而消失。
English:
Dispellable.
Armor reduction effects from the same item do not stack, but armor reduction effects from different items fully stack.
The effect of attack damage increase gotten from killing girls is permanent and it won't disappear if the item disappear.

SChinese:
被动：连拍

每次攻击时增加%pre_bonus_damage%点攻击及%pre_bonus_attack_speed%攻速并回复%mana_regen%魔法，增加攻击及攻速效果最多叠加%max_count%层，最多持续%duration%秒。
English:
Passive: Continuous Shooting

Each attack grants %pre_bonus_damage% bonus attack damage and %pre_bonus_attack_speed% attack speed for %duration% seconds and restores %mana_regen% mana. Stacks up to %max_count%.

SChinese:
使用：回魔

向目标提供%mana_regen%点/秒魔法恢复，持续%buff_duration%秒。

受到敌方少女或巨大上海攻击时效果会被驱散。

对友军施放距离：%abilitycastrange%
English:
Use: Replenish

Grants %mana_regen% mana regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy girl or Giant Shanghai, the effect is lost.

Range: %abilitycastrange%

SChinese: 魔法使们常用其来加强冥想能力.
English: Magicians often use it to enhance their meditation.

SChinese: 与DotA不同，该物品在队友间完全共享。
English: Unlike DotA, this item is fully shareable with allies.

SChinese: 魔法使标志一般的人气配饰。
English: A popular accessory which symbolizes a real magician.

SChinese:
被动：红雾光环

为周围友军提供%bonus_damage_percentage%%%技能增强加成，减少周围敌方单位%blood_fog_reduce_magical_armor%%%魔法抗性。

光环作用范围：%blood_fog_radius%
English:
Passive: Scarlet Mist

Grants %bonus_damage_percentage%%% spell amplification to allied units, and reduces the magic resistance of nearby enemy units by %blood_fog_reduce_magical_armor%%%

Aura Radius: %blood_fog_radius%

SChinese: 让某只吸血鬼更有威严感
English: Makes a certain vampire feel more majestic.

SChinese:
被动：幻想乡缘起

降低%percent_time%%%复活所需时间，并在复活时%duration%秒内提升全属性%death_bonus_all_stats%点。\n多个幻想乡日记提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Passive: Gensokyo Chronicle

Reduce respawn timer by %percent_time%%%, and increase all attributes by %death_bonus_all_stats% for %duration% seconds after respawning.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple Gensokyo Diary do not stack.

SChinese: 同类型道具减复活时间效果不会叠加；不与慧音的技能「最初的金字塔」叠加，「最初的金字塔」会覆盖道具的效果。
English:
Doesn't stack with other items or skills which also reduce respawn timer.
Doesn't stack with Keine's「First Pyramid」and it will instead override the effect of this item.

SChinese:
主动：急救

回复%aid_heal_amount%点生命值，%aid_decline_health_delay%秒后产生副作用，每秒失去%aid_decline_health_per_sec%点生命值，持续%aid_decline_health_duration%秒。

失去生命值不会导致死亡。
English:
Active: First Aid

Instantly heals %aid_heal_amount% HP, however after %aid_decline_health_delay% seconds you will begin to lose %aid_decline_health_per_sec% health per second for %aid_decline_health_duration% seconds. Cannot cause death.

SChinese:
使用时对自身施加一个“是药三分毒”的效果，持续15秒。
“是药三分毒”效果持续10秒时对自身施加一个“副作用”效果。
“副作用”效果持续5秒，每秒移除45点生命值（不会使生命值低于1点）。

“是药三分毒”和“副作用”效果可以驱散。

主动：供奉

将敌方普通单位换算成金钱，获得额外%bonus_gold%金钱，并获得180点经验。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n出售时每点充能获得购买价格的50%%金钱\n获得的金钱是不可靠金钱。
English:
Active: Donate

Kills a non-girl target for %bonus_gold% gold and 180 bonus experience.

Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%\nSell the item to refund 50%% of its cost for every charge.\nThe gold granted is unreliable gold.

SChinese:
目前使用成功后的显示效果会产生歧义，施法者头上跳出+100，被击杀者赏金数额也加了100。
实际效果只会让施法者获得额外100金钱。
English:
Currently, the visual effect is ambiguous, as +100 will pop up above the caster's head, while the bounty of the unit killed will also be increased by 100.
The actual effect only grants 100 extra gold total.

SChinese:
被动：纳税

击杀敌方单位后固定获得%bonus_gold_const%金钱。同时有%bonus_gold_chance%%%几率获得额外%bonus_gold%金钱，该效果有%AbilityCooldown%秒内置冷却时间。\n获得的金钱是不可靠金钱。
English:
Passive: Tax

Kills for %bonus_gold_const% gold and have a %bonus_gold_chance%%% chance to grant %bonus_gold% bonus gold. The latter has a 1 second cooldown.\nThe gold granted is unreliable gold.

SChinese: 击杀任何目标都会触发，比如建筑，信使，守卫。

主动：龙行天下

在%buff_duration%秒内持续驱散自身受到的任何负面效果。
English:
Active: Dragon's Descent

Continuously dispels all negative effects from yourself for %buff_duration% seconds.

SChinese:
被动：二天一流

下次攻击将连续攻击两次，每次攻击都会造成%cooldown_crit_mult%%%伤害并且降低目标%slow_movespeed%%%移速，持续%slow_duration%秒。\n

被动：幽冥求闻持

攻击将降低目标%corruption_armor%点护甲，持续%corruption_armor_duration%秒。并且每次攻击时有%crit_chance%%%概率造成%crit_mult%%%伤害
English:
Passive: Niten Ichiryu (Melee Only)

Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The Double attacks deal %cooldown_crit_mult%%% damage and apply %slow_movespeed%%% movement slow for %slow_duration% seconds on each strike.\n

Passive: Yuumei Gumonji

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_armor_duration% seconds. And Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_mult%%% damage.

SChinese: ——这两把剑属于幻想乡一位精通二刀流的剑术高手，削铁如泥，无所不斩；一把可斩无数魂灵，一把可斩人迷惘，使灵化佛。
English: ——These dual swords belong to a swordsmaster of Gensokyo proficient at dual-wielding swords. They are so sharp that they can cut almost anything. One has the power to kill countless phantoms, while the other has the power to dispel the confusion of those it cuts and send them to nirvana.

SChinese: Gives the caster a 50 damage reduction for 4 seconds while firing a projectile that deals damage 125 PURE damage to any enemy it hits.
English: Gives the caster a 50 percent damage reduction for 4 seconds while firing a projectile that deals damage 125 PURE damage to any enemy it hits.

SChinese:
主动：推波

向目标位置推出一道波，造成范围%damage%[+游戏时间(分)*%damage_bonus_time%]的法术伤害

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Blast

Unleash a wave towards the target position, dealing (%damage% + %damage_bonus_time% * minutes passed) magical damage to any enemy units it collides with.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动：气质破坏

使目标无力使用任何物品，其被动技能也会失效，持续%duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n

被动：诅咒攻击

每次普通攻击时有%chance%%%概率使目标降低%maim_movement_speed%%%移动速度和%maim_attack_speed%攻击速度，持续%debuff_duration%秒。
English:
Active: Spirit Destruction

Prevents the target from using items and disables their passives for %duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%\n

Passive: Curse Attack

Grants each attack a %chance%%% chance to slow the target's movement speed by %maim_movement_speed%%% and attack speed by %maim_attack_speed% for %debuff_duration% seconds.

SChinese:
与否决不同，不施加驱散效果。

效果没有投射物，施法成功时直接作用于目标。
相当于DotA否决刚出的时候。

可以被驱散。
English:
Unlike Nullifier, no dispel effect is applied.

Does not use a projectile, and immediately affects the target when cast.
Equivalent to the earliest version of Nullifier in DotA.

Dispellable.

SChinese:
被动：夜虫

在夜晚时，此装备额外提供%night_improve%%%加成。\n

被动：萤火

增加%bonus_night_vision%夜间视野。\n多个「萤火虫之光」提供的加成不叠加。
English:
Passive: Nightbug

Gains extra %night_improve%%% bonus from this item at night.\n

Passive: Light

Increases night vision by %bonus_night_vision%.\nBonuses from multiple 「Light of Fireflies」 do not stack.

SChinese:
使用：药膏

向目标提供%health_regen%点/秒生命恢复，持续%buff_duration%秒。

受到敌方少女或巨大上海攻击时效果会被驱散。

持续时间对友军减半。

对友军施放距离：%abilitycastrange%
English:
Use: Salve

Grants %health_regen% health regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy girl or Giant Shanghai, the effect is lost.

Heals for half the amount when cast on an ally.

Range: %abilitycastrange%

SChinese: 八意永琳特制的一种恢复药，即使是濒死的患者也能复原如初。
English: A type of medicine made by Eirin Yagokoro, even patients at death's door can make a full recovery.

SChinese: 与DotA不同，该物品在队友间完全共享。
English: Unlike DotA, this item is fully shareable with allies.

SChinese:
主动：风拂花

为周围所有友方少女施加一个护盾，每次受到物理伤害时格挡伤害，数值为%str_percent%%%她们的力量值，持续%duration%秒。

作用范围：%aura_radius%\n

被动：威严光环

提升附近友军单位和建筑%aura_bouns_attackspeed%攻击速度，%aura_bonus_armor%点护甲和%aura_mana_regen%点/秒魔法恢复，削弱附近敌军%aura_reduce_armor%点护甲。

光环作用范围：%aura_radius%
English:
Active: Wind on Flowers

For %duration% seconds, grant nearby allied girls a guard to block damage equal to %str_percent%%% of thier Strength value from each incoming physical damage.

Radius: %aura_radius%\n

Passive: Aura of Majesty

Grants %aura_bouns_attackspeed% attack speed, %aura_bonus_armor% bonus armor and %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration to nearby allied units and buildings, and decreases nearby enemy unit armor by %aura_reduce_armor%.

Aura Radius: %aura_radius%

SChinese: 装饰用阳伞，并不能发射魔炮
English: A decorative parasol. Does not fire magical lasers.

SChinese: 风拂花护盾格挡护甲减免之前的伤害。
English: Wind on Flowers guard block damage before reduced by armor.

SChinese:
主动：反弹伤害

将受到伤害的%back_factor%%%以魔法伤害的形式反弹给伤害来源者，持续%duration%秒。\n

被动：致郁之毒

受到普通攻击时，对攻击者造成%poison_min_damage%点魔法伤害。

若攻击者为英雄，致郁之毒伤害改为：
[攻击者最高属性x%poison_damage_factor%+%poison_damage_base%]
(不会少于%poison_min_damage%点)
English:
Active: Damage Return

Returns %back_factor%%% of damage received as magical damage back to the attacker for %duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Melancholic Poison

Deals %poison_min_damage% magical damage to non-girl attackers.

For girls, the damage dealt is %poison_damage_base% + %poison_damage_factor% * their highest attribute. Deals a minimum of %poison_min_damage% damage.

SChinese:
“反弹伤害”根据实际受到伤害进行反弹。
“反弹伤害”和“致郁之毒”的结算完全独立，都可以被技能伤害加深影响。

对另一个装备本物品的英雄攻击时，“反弹伤害”可以反弹对方“致郁之毒”的伤害。

当两个都开启“反弹伤害”效果的英雄互相攻击时，双方的“反弹伤害”效果都完全失效。
English:
Return damage is based on the actual damage received.
The effects of Damage Return and Melancholic Poison are completely independent, and both are affected by spell amplification.

If two girls have Nightshade Dresses and one attacks the other, Damage Return can reflect the damage from Melancholic Poison.

If both girls have Damage Return active at the same time, Damage Return has no effect on either of them.

SChinese:
被动：霜冻攻击

攻击附带霜冻效果，可以降低敌人%cold_movespeed%%%的移动速度和%cold_attackspeed%的攻击速度，减少治疗%regen_amplify%%%，效果持续%cold_duration%秒。
English:
Passive: Cold Attack

Attacks lower enemy movement speed by %cold_movespeed%%%, attack speed by %cold_attackspeed%%%, and reduces heals, health regeneration and lifesteal by %regen_amplify%%% for %cold_duration% seconds.

SChinese:
被动：命运

增加%bonus_outgoing_damage%%%伤害。\n

被动：必中

普通攻击有%change%%%几率无视闪避。
English:
Passive: Fate

+%bonus_outgoing_damage%%% to all damage dealt.\n

Passive: True Strike

Grants each attack a %change%%% chance to pierce through evasion.

SChinese: 命运效果在装备的英雄对其他单位造成伤害时触发，造成一个额外的伤害实例，其伤害类型是纯粹。
English: Fate triggers when the wielder deals damage to other units, causing an additional instance of pure damage.

SChinese:
被动：真实视域

携带者自身和周围%radius%范围内的友方单位可以看见隐身单位和守卫。\n

被动：永恒

死亡后掉落，而且不能被摧毁。
English:
Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within %radius% range of its carrier.\n

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

SChinese: 传说中嗅觉异常灵敏的天狗可以看到平时看不到的东西哦！带一只天狗出门不再怕被偷袭了！
English: Legend has it that the hypersensitive tengu are able to see what others ordinarily cannot. Bring a tengu out and you'll never be afraid of sneak attacks!

SChinese:
主动：幽灵护甲

给队友一个霜冻幽灵护盾，增加目标%barrier_block%点物理护盾，持续%shield_duration%秒。对目标进行普通攻击的敌人受到幽灵缠身效果，减少%cold_movespeed%%%移动速度，%cold_attackspeed%攻击速度，持续%cold_duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Phantom Armor

Grants ally a frosty phantom shield, gaining a barrier that absorbs %barrier_block% physical damage for %shield_duration% seconds.

Enemies that attack the target will be haunted by the chilling phantoms, reducing their movement speed by %cold_movespeed%%% and attack speed by %cold_attackspeed% for %cold_duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
幽灵护甲效果无法驱散。
幽灵缠身效果可以驱散。
English:
Phantom Armor cannot be dispelled.
The phantom haunting effect can be dispelled.

SChinese:
主动：幽灵形态

进入幽灵形态，持续%debuff_duration%秒，期间降低35%%移动速度，无法进行普通攻击也不会受到物理伤害，但会受到%debuff_mgical_resistance_decrepify%%%的额外魔法伤害。
English:
Active: Ghost Form

You enter ghost form for %debuff_duration% seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack, slowed by %debuff_slowdown_movespeed_percent%%% and %debuff_mgical_resistance_decrepify%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.

SChinese:
如果在开启期间进入技能免疫状态，幽灵效果将会中止。如果在技能免疫状态下开启物品将不会拥有幽灵效果。

效果可以驱散。
English:
If you become spell immune while this is active, the ghost form is cancelled.Ghost Form item effects have no effect while spell immune.

Dispelled.

Active: Purification+

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Usable while stunned, and automatically triggers at %hp_trigger_pct%%% health.\n

Passive: Exorcism

If this has at least 7 charges when it is used, it will perform an exorcism, applying a strong dispel.\n

Passive: Recharge

Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability. Max %max_charges% charges.

SChinese:
——伊诺库，这样的装备没问题吗？
——请给我最好的装备。

当装备不同等级的御币时，只有最高级御币的收集效果有效。
收集成功时，若存在多个对应等级的御币，排序靠后的那个将获得收集数，即使它在背包内。

油库里状态会禁止使用物品，故无法使用退魔御币。

击飞效果是由位移和晕眩构成的，强驱散可以全部解除，例如在被星熊3技能击飞过程中使用本物品进行强驱散，将直接落地，解除晕眩。
English:
If there are multiple Gohei items in the inventory, only the highest level Gohei will gain charges.
If the recharge is successful, but the Gohei is full and there are multiple of the same Gohei item, the charge will be given to the next Gohei instead.

SChinese:
主动：驱邪

立刻根据能量点数回复相应的生命和魔法，每点能量恢复%restore_per_charge%点生命和魔法。\n

被动：充能

每当周围%charge_radius%视野范围内有敌人施放技能都会自动充能（最多%max_charges%点能量）。
English:
Active: Purification

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.\n

Passive: Recharge

Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability. Max %max_charges% charges.

SChinese:
当装备不同等级的御币时，只有最高级御币的收集效果有效。
收集成功时，若存在多个对应等级的御币，排序靠后的那个将获得收集数，即使它在背包内。
English:
If there are multiple Gohei items in the inventory, only the highest level Gohei will gain charges.
If the recharge is successful, but the Gohei is full and there are multiple of the same Gohei item, the charge will be given to the next Gohei instead.

SChinese:
主动：镜之守护

使一名友方少女暂时免疫魔法伤害，持续%barrier_duration%秒，但是无法免疫异常状态。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Mirror's Protection

Activates a shield which blocks all damage from spells for %barrier_duration% seconds. Does not block negative effects.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese: 绿坝将保护你不受到魔法伤害，让你健康成长。
English: Green Dam protects you from magical damage and lets you grow up healthy.

SChinese:
被动：记恨

下一次普通攻击命中时，对目标每秒造成%damage_bonus_mana_attack%%%最大魔法值的魔法伤害,持续%int_atk_duration%秒。
English:
Passive: Grudge

On your next attack hit, deals %damage_bonus_mana_attack%%% of your maximum mana as magical damage every sencond for %int_atk_duration% senconds.

SChinese: 在同时拥有「仇恨之弓」与奇美拉三叉戟时不会触发「仇恨之弓」。
English: When possessing both 「Grudge Bow」 and Chimera Trident at the same time, it will not trigger 「Grudge Bow」.

SChinese:
被动：护符

每隔%block_cooldown%秒可以抵挡一个敌方单位的施法。
English:
Passive: Shrine Maiden's Blessing

Blocks most targeted spells once every %block_cooldown% seconds.

SChinese:
一个技能是否能触发博丽神社护身符效果，是在该技能触发的lua脚本中单独定义的，并不是一个全局的参数。
目前比较混乱，将在之后版本中进行统一整理列出。
English:
Whether a spell is affected or not is currently defined separately in the lua script, not a global parameter.
The current way is confusing and it will be consolidated into a proper list in future versions.

SChinese:
主动：回复

为周围友军回复最大生命值的10%%+%feast_heal_amount%点生命值，并提升%feast_bonus_armor%点护甲，持续%feast_buff_duration%秒。

作用范围：%feast_radius%\n

被动：恢复光环

提升周围友军%aura_health_regen%点/秒生命恢复。

光环作用范围：%feast_radius%
English:
Active: Restore

Heals %feast_heal_amount% + 10%% of maximum health and increases %feast_bonus_armor% armor for all allies within %feast_radius% radius. The bonus armor lasts %feast_buff_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Recovery Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allied units in a %feast_radius% radius.

SChinese:
主动技能只对使用时符合要求的目标施加效果，不是一个光环。
多个本物品主动技能造成的效果无法叠加，只会刷新持续时间。

没有DotA多个梅肯斯姆那样的限制。
English:
The active component only applies effects to eligible targets on use, it is not an aura.
The buff provided by the active component of this item does not stack, it will only refresh the duration.

Does not have restrictions like the Mekansm from DotA.
The buff from the active cannot be dispelled.

SChinese:
主动：推进

将一个少女向其面对方向推进%push_length%距离。

施法距离：%abilitycastrange%
推进速度：%push_speed%
English:
Active: Propel

Pushes any girl %push_length% units in the direction she is facing.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%
Push Speed: %push_speed%

SChinese:
主动：魔法之力

增加%bonus_mana_regen%魔法恢复，持续%duration%秒，受到英雄伤害会中断\n多个扫把类物品提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Active: Magical Power

Grants %bonus_mana_regen% mana regeneration to the target for %duration% seconds.

If you are attacked by an enemy girl, the effect is lost.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple brooms do not stack.

SChinese:
主动：迅捷之力

增加%bonus_active_attack_speed%攻击速度，持续%duration%秒\n多个扫把类物品提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Active: Swift Power

Increases your attack speed by %bonus_active_attack_speed% for %duration% seconds.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple brooms do not stack.

SChinese:
切换：炽热

开启后增加额外增加%onopen_bonus_attack_speed%攻击速度和%onopen_bonus_movement_speed%%%移动速度，每秒消耗魔法最大值的%onopen_spend_mana_percent%%%。\n多个扫把类物品提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Toggle: Blazing

While active, Blazing grants %onopen_bonus_movement_speed%%% movement speed and %onopen_bonus_attack_speed% attack speed but consumes %onopen_spend_mana_percent%%% of your max mana every second.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple brooms do not stack.

SChinese:
主动：格斗之力

增加%bonus_health_regen%生命恢复，持续%duration%秒，受到来自少女的伤害会中断\n多个扫把类物品提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Active: Fighting Power

Grants %bonus_health_regen% health regeneration to the target for %duration% seconds.

If you are attacked by an enemy girl, the effect is lost.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple brooms do not stack.

SChinese:
被动：分裂

普通攻击时对目标周围最远%melee_cleave_radius%距离的锥形区域内敌人造成%melee_cleave_percent%%%物理伤害。（仅近战有效）\n

被动：多重攻击

普通攻击时对攻击范围内的最多其他%ranged_split_num%个目标进行多重攻击。（仅远程有效）

额外目标不会受到其他攻击特效（比如致命一击）的作用。
English:
Passive: Cleave

Deals %melee_cleave_percent%%% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to %melee_cleave_radius% around the target. (Melee Only)\n

Passive: Split Shot

Each attack hits up to %ranged_split_num% other targets within attack range. (Ranged Only)

Additional attacks cannot trigger on-hit effects (such as critical strikes).

SChinese: 阿瓦隆的兄弟写了炮火攻击溅射的代码，但是没有启用该功能。
English: 阿瓦隆的兄弟(Avalon's brother) wrote the code for splash damage, but never enabled the feature.

SChinese:
被动：须臾

生命值减少时，恢复损失生命值%hp2mp%%%的魔法\n

被动：永远

造成技能伤害时，恢复伤害值%spell_lifesteal%%%的生命
English:
Passive: Instantaneous

Restore mana %hp2mp%%% of health lost while losing health.\n

Passive: Eternity

Restore health %spell_lifesteal%%% of damage dealt while dealing spell damage.

SChinese:
主动：厄运释放

降低目标点%effect_radius%范围内敌方单位的%movement_speed_percent_reduction%%%的移动速度，持续%debuff_duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Misfortune Release

Cast a %radius% radius blast that slows enemies' movement speed by %movement_speed_percent_reduction%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动技能只对使用时符合要求的目标施加效果，不是一个光环。
多个本物品主动技能造成的效果无法叠加，只会刷新持续时间。
English:
The active component only applies effects to eligible targets on use, it is not an aura.
The buff provided by the active component of this item does not stack, it will only refresh the duration.
The buff from the active can be dispelled.

SChinese:
被动：历史教学

降低%percent_time%%%复活所需的时间。
同类型道具减复活时间效果不会叠加；不与慧音的技能「最初的金字塔」叠加，「最初的金字塔」会覆盖道具的效果。
English:
Doesn't stack with other items or skills which also reduce respawn timer.
Doesn't stack with Keine's「First Pyramid」and it will instead override the effect of this item.

SChinese:
被动：桥下拉扯

被敌方少女击杀时，暴露其视野%exposed_duration%秒，并降低其%heal_reduce%%%受治疗效果和视野半径，令其受到的伤害提升%bonus_damage_percentage%%%，直至自己复活或该少女死亡；如果击杀自己的敌方少女等级不低于自己，她还会受到(%damage%+等级差×%per_level_damage%)点纯粹伤害。
English:
Passive: Pull Under the Bridge

When an enemy girl kills you, your team gains vision of her for %exposed_duration% seconds. Her healing and vision radius are reduced by %heal_reduce%%% and she takes %bonus_damage_percentage%%% more damage until you respawn or the target dies.

If your level is equal to or lower than the one who killed you, you also deal pure damage to her on death based on the level difference.

Base Damage: %damage%
Bonus Damage per Level Difference: %per_level_damage%

SChinese: 暴露视野的效果可驱散，其余效果无法驱散。
English: The vision effect is dispellable, but the other effects cannot be dispelled.

SChinese:
使用：强化

为周围友军回复%heal_amount%点生命值，并提升%buff_bonus_damage_percent%%%攻击力，%buff_bonus_armor%点护甲，持续%buff_duration%秒。

作用范围：%effect_radius%
可以使用%tooltip_charges%次。

商店补充存货时间：%tooltip_stock_time%秒
商店存货上限：%tooltip_stock_max%

主动：薄命

持续%duration%秒使目标受到的治疗回复减少%regen_amplify%%%，如果期间目标生命小于%min_health_pct%%%，则对其造成%damage%纯粹伤害并移除效果。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n

被动：收割

每次普通攻击时有%harvest_chance_melee%%%几率触发，造成额外的魔法伤害，双方当前生命值相差越大伤害越高。

收割伤害：(自身生命值-目标生命值)x%harvest_damage_factor%+100。
English:
Active: Pitiable Life

Reduces an enemy's health regeneration and healing by %regen_amplify%%% for %duration% seconds. If the target's health drops below %min_health_pct%%% during this time, they instantly take %damage% pure damage and the debuff is removed.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%\n

Passive: Reap

Grants each attack a %harvest_chance_melee%%% chance to deal bonus magical damage based on the difference between you and your target's current health. If you have less health than your target, this passive does not work.

Damage: (Your Health - Target's Health) * %harvest_damage_factor% + 100

SChinese:
对建筑的攻击无法触发。
幻象的攻击无法触发。
English:
Does not work on buildings.
Cannot trigger from an illusion's attacks.

SChinese:
被动：永恒

死亡后掉落，而且无法被摧毁。

当拥有者的队友拾取后，仅在返还给拥有者后才会有效。一旦被敌人拾取，天丛云剑将不再受此限制。
English:
Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destoryed.

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed.

SChinese: 天丛云剑的存在是永恒的，不会被摧毁
English: The existence of the Sword of Kusanagi is eternal, and it cannot be destroyed.

SChinese: 如果天丛云剑掉落后被拥有者的敌人拾取，那么只有在敌人死亡后才会再次掉落。
English: If the Sword of Kusanagi is picked up by the owner's enemy, it cannot be dropped again until its current wielder dies.

SChinese:
被动：吸血

攻击附带%lifesteal_percent%%%吸血。\n

被动：禁忌

增加%amplify_percent%%%全攻击力。
English:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.\n

Passive: Taboo

Gain %amplify_percent%%% bonus attack damage.

SChinese: 加攻击力包括绿字攻击；血晶石派生道具之间的吸血不可叠加，吸血效果以最后获得的道具为主。\n血晶石系列道具攻击幻象与建筑无法吸血，攻击特效伤害也不能吸血。
English:
Doesn't stack with other sources of lifesteal.

Cannot lifesteal off of illusions and buildings, nor from on-hit effects.

SChinese:
主动：游泳弹

使用后弹开目标附近%radius%范围内的敌方单位，弹开的距离为%distance%。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n眩晕状态可以使用。
English:
Active: Swimming Shot

Pushes enemies that near the target within %radius% radius by %distance% units.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%\nUsable while stunned.
Doesn't work with「Knock Out In Three Steps」.

SChinese:
使用：出售

返还礼服购买价格的%restore_gold_percent%%%金钱，使用后物品将会消失。\n

被动：收礼

每隔%give_gold_interval%秒获得%give_gold_amount%金钱。\n获得的金钱是不可靠金钱。
English:
Use: Sell

Consume the item to refund %restore_gold_percent%%% of its cost.\n

Passive: Receive Gifts

Gain %give_gold_amount% gold every %give_gold_interval% seconds.
The gold granted is unreliable gold.

SChinese:
被动：鬼神之力

减少%decrease_damage%%%受到的伤害，每秒回复已损失生命值的%percent_health_regen_bonus%%%
同时增加60%的生命恢复速度。
English:
Passive: Kishin's Power

Reduces damage taken by %decrease_damage%%% and recovers %percent_health_regen_bonus%%% of missing health every second.
Increases health regeneration by %health_regen_multiplier%%%.

SChinese:
鬼神之力效果可以叠加（减伤不可叠加）。

鬼神之力带来的生命回复不会显示在生命条的恢复值上。
每隔0.5秒进行一次生命回复，其值为损失生命值的1.5%%+每秒恢复生命值的30%%。
多个鬼神之力效果完全独立作用。

配置表和之前游戏显示的生命恢复提升为30%%，然而由于每隔0.5秒回复一次，实际为60%%。
English:
The effects of Kishin's Power stacks, except for damage reduction.

Kishin's Power healing will not be displayed as regen on the health bar.
Health regeneration takes place every 0.5 seconds, healing 1.5%% of your missing health and 30%% of your health regeneration value.
Multiple Kishin's Power effects work independently of each other.

The health regeneration effect shown in the source files and the previous game is 30%%, but since it takes effect every 0.5 seconds, the end result is 60%%.

SChinese:
使用：吞食蘑菇

立即回复%regen_mana%点魔法。
产自魔法森林的看起来人畜无害的蘑菇，一定很好吃吧。啊喂！为什么这蘑菇在发光？！
English: Harmless mushroom from Forest of Magic, must be delicious...Wait! Why is it shining?!

SChinese:
主动：月之箭

向指定方向射出一穿透箭，对被击中少女造成跟自身智力挂钩的物理伤害。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%

飞行速率：%arrow_speed%
最远距离：%arrow_range%
判定半径：%arrow_radius%
基础伤害：%arrow_damage_const%
智力加成伤害系数：%arrow_damage_int_mult%
施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Moon Arrow

Fires a piercing arrow which deals physical damage to enemy girls based on your intelligence.

Projectile Speed: %arrow_speed%
Arrow Range: %arrow_range%
Arrow Width: %arrow_radius%
Base Damage: %arrow_damage_const%
Bonus Damage per Int: %arrow_damage_int_mult%
Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动：超人打击

禁止目标敌方单位的任何移动行为，持续%bonus_duration%秒。如果自身的最大法力值比目标单位高，则自身提高【双方最大法力值差x%bonus_attackspeed_increase%%%】点攻速，持续%bonus_duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Superhuman Strike

Prevents all forms of movement of the target enemy for %bonus_duration% seconds.
If your maximum mana is higher than hers, increases your attack speed by %bonus_attackspeed_increase%%% of the difference between your maximum mana and hers.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
施法者的攻速提高效果无法驱散，目标的禁止移动效果可以驱散。
包括强制位移甚至z轴位移都会被禁止。
English:
The attack speed buff cannot be dispelled, but the movement prevention effect is dispellable.
Prevents even forced movement and movement along the z-axis.

SChinese:
主动：电疗

对目标敌方少女进行电击治疗，降低其最大法力值%decline_mana%点，持续%decline_intellect_duration%秒。
同时将其移动速度降至最低，移动速度会逐渐恢复至正常，持续%slowdown_duration%秒。
使用时持续驱散目标单位身上的正面状态

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n

被动：压制

对非英雄单位进行物理攻击会造成额外%physical_damage%点伤害。
English:
Active: Electroshock Therapy

Shocks the target unit, reducing its maximum mana by %decline_mana% for %decline_intellect_duration% seconds. Also slows the target's base movement speed to the minimum for %slowdown_duration% seconds, recovering slowly.
Continuously dispels the target.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%\n

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-girl units by %physical_damage%.

SChinese:
压制效果对己方单位生效。
移动速度每0.4秒恢复10%，直到减速持续时间结束时恢复至正常。
English:
Quell also works on allied units.
Movement speed recovers by %slowdown_movespeed_percent_once%%% every %slowdown_interval% seconds, eventually returning to normal once the duration expires.

SChinese:
使用：红魔强化

永久增加%increase_strength%点力量，使用后物品将会消失。无法在游戏前5分钟内使用。
English:
Use: Scarlet Devil Essence

Permanently increases strength by %increase_strength%. Cannot be used within the first 5 minutes of the game.

SChinese:
使用：妖精强化

永久增加%increase_agility%点敏捷，使用后物品将会消失。无法在游戏前5分钟内使用。
English:
Use: Fairy Essence

Permanently increases agility by %increase_agility%. Cannot be used within the first 5 minutes of the game.

SChinese:
使用：魔力强化

永久增加%increase_intellect%点智力，使用后物品将会消失。无法在游戏前5分钟内使用。
English:
Use: Magical Essence

Permanently increases intelligence by %increase_intellect%. Cannot be used within the first 5 minutes of the game.

SChinese:
主动：挥翅

提升%foxwalk_movement_speed_percent_bonus%%%移动速度并使你可以穿越单位，持续%foxwalk_duration%秒。
English:
Active: Spread Your Wings

Gives %foxwalk_movement_speed_percent_bonus%%% increased movement speed and lets you move through units for %foxwalk_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 这对翅膀的主人经历了什么？
English: What happened to the person these wings came from?

SChinese: <font color='#DAA520'>牛</font><font color='#8B008B'>逼</font><font color='#8B0000'>跳</font><font color='#00BFFF'>跃</font><font color='#00FF00'>装</font><font color='#4169E1'>置</font>
English: <font color='#FF0000'>N</font><font color='#FF7F00'>i</font><font color='#FFFF00'>u</font><font color='#00FF00'>b</font><font color='#00FFFF'>i</font> <font color='#0000FF'>B</font><font color='#8B00FF'>l</font><font color='#FF0000 '>i</font><font color='#FF7F00'>n</font><font color='#FFFF00'>k</font> <font color='#00FF00'>D</font><font color='#00FFFF'>e</font><font color='#0000FF'>v</font><font color='#8B00FF'>i</font><font color='#FF0000'>c</font><font color='#FF7F00'>e</font>

SChinese:
主动：牛逼跳法

向指定方向闪烁%AbilityCastRange%码，落地后%modifier_duration%秒内额外增加%modifier_attack_speed%点攻速与%modifier_movespeed_percent%%%移速。\n多个牛逼跳跃装置提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Active: Niubi Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %AbilityCastRange% units away.

After teleportation, you gain %modifier_movespeed_percent%%% movement speed and %modifier_attack_speed% attack speed for %modifier_duration% seconds.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple Niubi Blink Device do not stack.

SChinese:
被动：原子速融

所有技能和物品的冷却时间减少%reduction_cooldown%%%\n

被动：热核反应

增加%regen_amplify%%%治疗效果
English:
Passive: Nuclear Power

Reduces the cooldown of all spells and items by %reduction_cooldown%%%.\n

Passive: Thermonuclear Reaction

Amplifies healing by %regen_amplify%%%.

SChinese:
被动：记恨

下一次普通攻击命中时，对目标每秒造成%damage_bonus_mana_attack%%%最大魔法值的魔法伤害,持续%int_atk_duration%秒。\n

被动：噩梦

普通攻击降低目标%decrease%%%魔抗，持续%duration%秒
English:
Passive: Grudge

On your next attack hit, deals %damage_bonus_mana_attack%%% of your maximum mana as magical damage every sencond for %int_atk_duration% senconds.\n

Passive: Nightmare

Your attacks reduce the target's magic resistance by %decrease%%% for %duration% senconds.

SChinese: 三叉戟的戟柄上好像还有一条蛇。
English: There seems to be a snake on the handle of the trident.

SChinese: 减魔抗效果先于伤害生效；\n在同时拥有「仇恨之弓」与奇美拉三叉戟时不会触发「仇恨之弓」。
English: The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage;\nWhen possessing both 「Grudge Bow」 and Chimera Trident at the same time, it will not trigger 「Grudge Bow」.

SChinese: 桃花岛的伤害格挡，可以减少来自所有单位类型的普通攻击伤害，包括守卫。
English: This version of damage block reduces attack damage from all units, including wards.

SChinese:
被动：蟠桃之力

特殊的体制导致被攻击后会兴奋，每受到%take_damage_trigger%点伤害，会增加%speedup_attackspeed_once%的攻击速度，持续%speedup_duration%秒。最高叠加%speedup_max_modifier_stack%层。
English:
Passive: Power of the Heavenly Peach

The special constitution leads to excitement after being attacked. Grants %speedup_attackspeed_once% attack speed for every %take_damage_trigger% damage taken for %speedup_duration% seconds. Stacks up to %speedup_max_modifier_stack%.

SChinese:
每次触发时将刷新持续时间，并非独立计算每层效果时间。
当达到最大堆叠层数时再次触发，不会增加层数，但是会刷新持续时间。
效果图标上的数字显示的是叠加层数。
English:
The duration is refreshed every time it is triggered, the stacks are not calculated independently.
If the maximum number of stacks have been reached, the number of stacks does not increase, but the duration will still be refreshed when triggered.
The number on the status effect icon shows the number of stacks.

SChinese:
被动：灼烧

灼烧%burn_damage_radius%范围的敌方单位，造成（自身最大生命值%burn_damage_per_sec_health_percent%%%+%burn_damage_per_sec%点）的魔法伤害。
English:
Passive: Burn

Scorches enemies within %burn_damage_radius% radius for %burn_damage_per_sec% + %burn_damage_per_sec_health_percent%%% of your max health as magical damage every second.

SChinese:
主动：时停

暂停目标时间，造成%duration%秒的晕眩。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Time Stop

Stops time for the target unit, stunning them for %duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动：净灵

使目标敌方单位沉默，持续%duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n

被动：破魔

造成的魔法伤害无视真澄之镜的护盾效果。
English:
Active: Consecrate

Silences the target for %duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%\n

Passive: Magic Break

Ignore the effect of Yata Mirror.

SChinese:
使用：出售

返还礼物购买价格的%restore_gold_percent%%%金钱，使用后物品将会消失。\n

被动：收礼

每隔%give_gold_interval%秒获得%give_gold_amount%金钱。\n获得的金钱是不可靠金钱。
English:
Use: Sell

Consume the item to refund %restore_gold_percent%%% of its cost.\n

Passive: Receive Gifts

Gain %give_gold_amount% gold every %give_gold_interval% seconds.
The gold granted is unreliable gold.

SChinese: 能不能别出门力量加6，包里带一个礼物卷轴了？
English: Can you stop walking out of base with nothing but +6 strength and a recipe in your inventory?

SChinese: 施法成功后在目标单位身上播放特效，延迟0.5秒后才会有实际效果。
English: Once the spell is cast on the target, a visual effect will begin playing, but there is a 0.5 second delay before the actual effect takes place.

SChinese:
被动：致命一击

每次攻击时有%crit_chance%%%概率造成%crit_mult%%%伤害。
English:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_mult%%% damage.

SChinese: 河童工业的淘汰品，不要太期待。
English: An outdated kappa industry product, don't expect much.

SChinese:
压制效果不对己方生效。
多个河童木工刃效果不会叠加。
English: The effects of multiple Kappa Woodworking Knives do not stack.

SChinese: 将两个天狗羽扇合成到高科技相机的卷轴
博丽神社护身符制作书
将新月头饰和练习手套合成为红魔挂件的卷轴
速融的核融合棒制作书
月兔的粉碎之锤制作书

English: Recipe: Devil's Milk Tooth of Chaos

SChinese: 巴瓦鲁幽魂之书制作书
八云间隙发生器制作书
河童的冲锋手枪制作书

被动：悔悟

普通攻击对目标造成%repentancestick_damage%点魔法伤害，并降低目标%down_amplidy%%%的技能伤害，持续%repentancestick_duration%秒。
English:
Passive: Remorse

Your attacks deal %repentancestick_damage% magical damage to the target, and reduce Spell Amp by %down_amplidy%%% for %repentancestick_duration% seconds.

SChinese:
主动：红魔火箭

向目标发射火箭造成伤害并击晕，可升级。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
火箭飞行速率：800
English:
Active: Scarlet Devil Rocket

Launches a rocket at the target which deals damage and stuns them. Upgradable.

Damage: %rocket_damage%
Stun Duration: %rocket_stun_duration%
Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动：红魔火箭

向目标发射火箭造成伤害并击晕，可升级。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
火箭飞行速率：800
English:
Active: Scarlet Devil Rocket

Launches a rocket at the target which deals damage and stuns them. Upgradable.

Damage: %rocket_damage%
Stun Duration: %rocket_stun_duration%
Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动：红魔火箭

向目标发射火箭造成伤害并击晕，可升级。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
火箭飞行速率：800
English:
Active: Scarlet Devil Rocket

Launches a rocket at the target which deals damage and stuns them. Upgradable.

Damage: %rocket_damage%
Stun Duration: %rocket_stun_duration%
Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动：红魔火箭

向目标发射火箭造成伤害并击晕。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
火箭飞行速率：800
English:
Active: Scarlet Devil Rocket

Launches a rocket at the target which deals damage and stuns them. Upgradable.

Damage: %rocket_damage%
Stun Duration: %rocket_stun_duration%
Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动：红魔火箭

向目标发射火箭造成伤害并击晕，可升级。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
火箭飞行速率：800
English:
Active: Scarlet Devil Rocket

Launches a rocket at the target which deals damage and stuns them. Upgradable.

Damage: %rocket_damage%
Stun Duration: %rocket_stun_duration%
Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
被动：斩灵

每次攻击时有%crit_chance%%%概率造成%crit_mult%%%伤害。
English:
Passive: Phantom Cut

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_mult%%% damage.

SChinese:
主动：遮蔽

经过%react_time%秒延迟，自身或者友方单位进入隐身状态，获得%active_mgical_resistance%的魔法抗性加成，持续%duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n可以在持续施法时使用
English:
Active: Cover

After a %react_time% second delay, grants invisibility and %active_mgical_resistance%%% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for %duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%\nCan be cast while channelling.

SChinese: 期间攻击和施法动作都会中断遮蔽
English: The fade time is reset and invisibility is lost upon reaching the cast point of spells or items or upon performing an attack.

SChinese:
主动：祈祷

使一名友方少女获得%active_evasion%%%闪避，持续%barrier_duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Pray

Grants an allied girl %active_evasion%%% evasion for %barrier_duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese: 一把吸血鬼猎人使用的小刀，看样子猎人和吸血鬼的命运是相连的。
English: A knife used by vampire hunters, it seems like the fates of the hunter and the vampire are linked.

SChinese:
被动：重击

近战少女的攻击有%stun_chance_melee%%的概率击晕目标%stun_duration%秒并额外造成%stun_damage%点魔法伤害。远程少女的击晕概率为%stun_chance_ranged%%。

内置冷却时间：%stun_cooldown%秒
English:
Passive: Bash

Grants melee girls a %stun_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %stun_duration% seconds, dealing %stun_damage% magical damage. Stun chance for ranged girls is %stun_chance_ranged%%%.

Internal Cooldown: %stun_cooldown% seconds.

SChinese:
对建筑的攻击无法触发。
幻象的攻击无法触发。
English:
Does not work on buildings.
Cannot trigger from an illusion's attacks.

SChinese: ZOO杯已成历史，鸡哥始终唯一。\n主动：召唤一只狗狗作为信使为您服务。

主动：恶魔之力

沉默自己，攻击速度提升%berserk_bonus_attackspeed%，移动速度提升%berserk_bonus_movespeed%%%，并获得%lifesteal_percent%%%的吸血效果。持续%berserk_duration%秒。
English:
Active: Devil's Power

Gain %berserk_bonus_attackspeed% attack speed, %berserk_bonus_movespeed%%% movement speed, and %lifesteal_percent%%% lifesteal but you are silenced for the duration. Lasts %berserk_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 乳牙现在按照税后伤害吸血，也就是说攻击开大的萃香不再能吸血；\n但是攻击幻象和建筑仍能吸血，并且由普通攻击带来的攻击特效伤害现在也能吸血。
English: Milk Tooth now lifesteals based on actual damage dealt. This means for example that you can no longer lifesteal from attacking Suika while she is under the effect of「Missing Purple Power」.\nOn the other hand, it means that you can lifesteal off of attacking illusions and buildings, and any damage caused by on-hit effects will also lifesteal.

SChinese:
主动：降伏

缠绕目标敌方单位，持续%root_duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Subdue

Roots the target for %root_duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%
It's actually a vajra, but it's also useful for subduing demons.

SChinese: 其实是金刚杵，但也能用来降魔

主动：内心侵蚀

使用后让目标在%duration%秒内受到的生命回复效果降低35%%，并每秒受到%damage%点纯粹伤害，若该少女期间受到任何技能造成的法术伤害，此效果会再延长1秒，最多持续%max_duration%秒

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Mind Erosion

Reduces the target's health regeneration and healing by %regen_reduce%%% for %duration% seconds and deals %damage% pure damage per second.

Duration is increased by 1 second when the target takes any spell damage, up to %max_duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动：幽魂冲击

使目标进入幽灵形态，持续%debuff_duration%秒，期间降低35%%移动速度，无法进行普通攻击也不会受到物理伤害，但会受到%debuff_mgical_resistance_decrepify%%%的额外魔法伤害。

施法距离：%abilitycastrange%
English:
Active: Ghost Blast

Converts the target unit to ghost form for %debuff_duration% seconds, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack, slowed by %debuff_slowdown_movespeed_percent%%% and %debuff_mgical_resistance_decrepify%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%

SChinese:
如果在开启期间进入技能免疫状态，幽灵效果将会中止。如果在技能免疫状态下开启物品将不会拥有幽灵效果。

效果可以驱散。
效果被标记为debuff，故只能被对友军释放的驱散技能驱散。
English:
If you become spell immune while this is active, the ghost form is cancelled.Ghost Form item effects have no effect while spell immune.

Dispellable.
This effect is marked as a debuff, and as such can only be dispelled by effects from allies.

SChinese:
被动：穿刺

普通攻击有%RandomchanceValue%%%概率无视闪避并造成%damage%点魔法伤害
English:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %RandomchanceValue%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %damage% bonus magical damage.

SChinese: 可叠加，每次攻击只能生效一次
English: Stacks, but can only proc a maximum of once per attack.

SChinese:
使用：传送

经过3秒持续施法后传送到一个指定的友方建筑

双击将直接传送至己方泉水。
English:
Use: Teleport

After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

SChinese: 咪叽，有了这个票就可以便利的到达朋友的家了哦！
English: Chen, you can go to your friend’s house easily with this!

SChinese:
主动：无刀取

阻止目标敌方单位进行物理攻击，持续%disarm_duration_ranged%/%disarm_duration_melee%（远程/近战）秒。

施法距离：%abilitycastrange%\n

被动：诅咒攻击

每次普通攻击时有%chance%%%概率使目标降低%maim_movement_speed%%%移动速度和%maim_attack_speed%攻击速度，持续%maim_duration%秒。
English:
Active: Disarm

Prevents a target from attacking for %disarm_duration_melee% seconds on melee targets, and %disarm_duration_ranged% seconds on ranged targets.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%\n

Passive: Curse Attack

Grants each attack a %maim_chance%%% chance to slow the target's movement speed by %maim_movement_speed%%% and attack speed by %maim_attack_speed% for %maim_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 由古老庭师遗留下的剑道秘册，记载了无数战斗技巧，能有效地压制敌方的出手和移动。
English: The secret scroll left by the ancient swordmaster records the Mystic Art of swordsmanship which can suppress enemies' attacks and movements.

SChinese:
当前版本诅咒效果可以对建筑施加。

主动/被动效果均可以驱散。
English:
Curse can currently be applied to buildings.

All effects are dispellable.

SChinese:
被动：连招规避

当受到伤害后生命值低于%hp_threshold_pct%% ，会对少女施加一个强驱散效果，%duration%秒内提升%status_resist%% 状态抗性，且所有受到和造成的伤害全部归零。

初始冷却时间为%cooldown_init%秒，每次触发后增加%cooldown_add%秒，最多增加至%cooldown_max%秒。
English:
Passive: Narrow Escape

If girl's health drops below %hp_threshold_pct%%% after receiving damage, the damage will be nullified and she will be added a strong dispel, and her status resistance will be increased by %status_resist%%% for %duration% seconds.

The cooldown time will be increased by %cooldown_add% seconds after each trigger from %cooldown_init% to %cooldown_max%.

SChinese: 多个恶魔之翼提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English: Movement speed bonuses from multiple Demon Wings do not stack.

SChinese:
使用：传送

经过3秒持续施法后传送到一个指定的友方建筑

双击将直接传送至己方泉水。
English:
Use: Teleport

After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

SChinese: 咪叽，有了这个票就可以便利的到达朋友的家了哦！
English: Chen, you can go to your friend’s house easily with this!

SChinese:
被动：间隙

降低间隙通行证的冷却时间。\n多个扫把类物品提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Passive: Gap

Reduces the cooldown for Gap Ticket. Gap Ticket can be used to teleport to any friendly non-girl unit.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple brooms do not stack.

SChinese: 有了这个就不用再凭票排队了。
English: With this, there's no more need to line up for tickets.

Active: Ferry to the Underworld

Grants a strong dispel and becomes invulnerable for %invulnerable_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 进入软硬不吃的傲娇状态。
English: Into tsundere status that immune to both soft and hard tactics.

SChinese:
主动：生命之力

为目标及其%target_radius%范围内的友军施加强驱散并治疗%bonu_heal%点生命，然后获得%feast_health_regen%生命恢复和%barrier_block%魔法护盾，持续%feast_buff_duration%秒。

施法距离：%feast_radius%\n

被动：庇护

受到长者的祝福，提升周围友军%tuzhushen_health_regen%生命恢复和%tuzhushen_bonus_mgcical_resitance%%%魔法抗性。

光环作用范围：%aura_radius%
English:
Active: Lifeforce

Applies a strong dispel and heals %bonu_heal% health, and grants %feast_health_regen% health regeneration and %barrier_block% magic damage barrier to allies in %target_radius% radius for %feast_buff_duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %feast_radius%\n

Passive: Shelter

Suwako's blessing grants %tuzhushen_bonus_mgcical_resitance%%% magic resistance and %tuzhushen_health_regen% health regeneration to nearby allied units.

Aura Radius: %aura_radius%

SChinese: 与你们分享一点人生的经验。
English: Share a little life experience with you.

SChinese:
主动技能只对使用时符合要求的目标施加效果，不是一个光环。
多个本物品主动技能造成的效果无法叠加，只会刷新持续时间。
主动效果无法驱散。
English:
The active component only applies effects to eligible targets on use, it is not an aura.
The buff provided by the active component of this item does not stack, it will only refresh the duration.
Cannot be dispelled.

SChinese:
被动：恐吓光环

为周围友军提供%aura_bonus_armor%点护甲加成。

光环作用范围：%aura_radius%
English:
Passive: Frightening Aura

Grants %aura_bonus_armor% bonus armor to nearby allied units.

Aura Radius: %aura_radius%
It's too cute that cant have the heart to attack.

SChinese:
被动：真实割夺

每隔5秒，普通攻击会额外造成%attackLand_damage%点物理伤害，并扣除目标%reduce_mana%点魔法值。\n

被动：法力燃烧

普通攻击命中时燃烧目标%basic_remove_mana% + 最大值%penetrate_remove_mana_percent%%%的魔法值，每燃烧1点法力值，造成%penetrate_damage_factor%点物理伤害
English:
Passive: Piercing Truth

Your normal attacks deal %attackLand_damage% bonus physical damage and burn %reduce_mana% mana from the target every 5 seconds.\n

Passive: Mana Burn

Each attack burns %basic_remove_mana% + %penetrate_remove_mana_percent%%% of max mana from the target, dealing %penetrate_damage_factor% physical damage per burned mana.

SChinese:
“真实割夺”与“法力燃烧”完全独立。
前者导致的法力扣除，不会经由后者造成物理伤害。

幻象只继承30%的法力燃烧且每燃烧1点法力值只造成0.3物理伤害。
被动技能不对建筑生效。
English:
Piercing Truth and Mana Burn are completely separate effects.
The mana burn caused by the former does not cause physical damage through the latter's effect.

Illusions only burn 30% of the usual mana and only deal 0.3 physical damage per burned mana.
Passive component does not work on buildings.

SChinese: 怎么感觉这个小提琴有点眼熟？不过好像又不是那个骚灵手上的。
English: How do I feel that this violin looks a bit familiar? But it doesn't seem like the one in the hands of that Poltergeist.

SChinese: 万宝槌永久加持，不占物品栏，但是会失去基本属性加成
English: Consumes the Miracle Mallet to turn it into a passive buff, but does not provide the attribute bonuses.

SChinese:
被动：技能升级

用于强化少女的部分技能效果，相应描述会显示在少女被增强的技能上。
English:
Passive: Spell Upgrade

Used to strengthen the skill effect of some girls. The corresponding description will be displayed on the enhanced skill of the girl.

SChinese:
主动：完美跳法

向指定方向闪烁%distance%距离。\n多个扫把类物品提供的移动速度加成不叠加。
English:
Active: Perfect Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %distance% units away.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple brooms do not stack.

SChinese:
不会被伤害打断。
PS by 白薯
English:
Not interrupted by damage.
PS by 白薯

SChinese:
被动：削铁如泥

攻击将降低目标%corruption_armor%点护甲，持续%duration%秒。
English:
Passive: Cut Iron Like Mud

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %duration% seconds. Does not affect buildings.

SChinese:
减甲效果可以驱散。
同种装备减甲效果不叠加，不同装备减甲效果完全叠加。
English:
Armor reduction is dispellable.
Armor reduction effects from the same item do not stack, but armor reduction effects from different items fully stack.

SChinese: 现在大家一定都看到了吧！文的笔记本可不是普通的笔记本！这是个天狗护符！
English: Everyone must have seen it by now! Aya's notebook is no ordinary notebook! It's a tengu amulet!

SChinese:
被动：压制

对敌方非英雄单位进行普通攻击会造成额外%physical_damage%点物理伤害。
English:
Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against enemy non-girl units by %physical_damage%.

SChinese: 压制效果不对己方单位生效。
English: Quell do not work on allied units.

SChinese: 没有这双羽翼你就参加不了化妆舞会啦。
English: You just can't go to a costume party without these.

SChinese:
主动：极寒冲击

发出一道寒冷的波动，对敌人造成%blast_damage%点魔法伤害并减速%blast_movement_speed_debuff%%%，持续%blast_debuff_duration%秒。并且增加一个护盾，受到的物理伤害减少%incoming_damage_reduce%%%，持续%shield_duration%秒。

作用范围：%blast_final_radius%\n

被动：伤害吸收

受到普通攻击时有%chance%%%的概率抵消%percent%%%实际受到的物理伤害,最多抵消%block%点伤害。\n

被动：霜冷光环

降低敌人%aura_attack_speed%攻速。

作用范围：%aura_radius%
English:
Active: Arctic Blast

Emits a freezing wave that deals %blast_damage% magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by %blast_movement_speed_debuff%%% for %blast_debuff_duration% seconds.
Also grants a shield which reduces physical damage taken by %incoming_damage_reduce%%% for %shield_duration% seconds.

Radius: %blast_final_radius%\n

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %chance%%% chance to block %percent%%% physical damage from incoming attacks, up to %block%.\n

Passive: Freezing Aura

Reduces the attack speed of all enemies within %aura_radius% by %aura_attack_speed%.

SChinese: 提供800范围的地面视野，视野跟随施法者移动，消退后会继续持续2秒。
English: Provides 800 radius ground vision, following the caster and leaving a trail of vision which lasts for 2 seconds.

SChinese:
主动：补魔

为周围友军提升%radiate_regen_mana%点/秒的魔法恢复，持续1秒。

作用范围：%radiate_radius%
English:
Active: Replenish Mana

Grants %radiate_regen_mana% mana regeneration to all allies within %radiate_radius% radius for 1 seconds.

SChinese:
主动技能只对使用时符合要求的目标施加效果，不是一个光环。
多个本物品主动技能造成的效果无法叠加，只会刷新持续时间。

元素秘法石和月耀秘石施加的效果可以叠加。
English:
The active component only applies effects to eligible targets on use, it is not an aura.
The buff provided by the active component of this item does not stack, it will only refresh the duration.

The effects of Elemental Luminary Stone and Luna Luminary Stone can stack.
The buff from the active cannot be dispelled.

SChinese:
主动：紧急规避机动

将自己和敌方少女朝相反方向推开%distance%距离，在攻击目标少女时获得%buff_attack_speed%攻击速度，持续%buff_attack_limit%次攻击或%buff_duration%秒。对自身或友军使用时效果等同于河童机动装置。

施法距离：%abilitycastrange%
友军推进速度：%friend_speed%
敌军推进速度：%enemy_speed%\n

被动：精准

远程少女的攻击距离增加%attack_range_bonus%。
English:
Active: Avoidance Maneuver

Pushes yourself and a target enemy girl away from each other units with %distance% and gain %bonus_attack_speed% attack speed when you are attacking the target for %buff_attack_limit% attacks or %buff_duration% seconds.

Works the same as the Kappa Propulsion Unit when used on self or allies.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%
Ally Push Speed: %friend_speed%
Enemy Push Speed: %enemy_speed%\n

Passive: Accuracy

Increases attack range of ranged girls with %attack_range_bonus%.

SChinese:
被动：精准

远程少女的攻击距离增加%bonus_attack_range%。
English:
Passive: Accuracy

Increases attack range of ranged girls by %bonus_attack_range%.

SChinese:
主动：冲锋

对%AbilityCastRange%码范围内的一个敌方目标进行冲锋，到达后对其造成%stun_damage%点魔法伤害和%default_stun_duration%秒眩晕。成功攻击到敌人或是做出任意指令都会让冲锋效果消失。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n

被动：重击

近战少女的攻击有%stun_chance_melee%%的概率无视闪避且击晕目标%stun_duration%秒，额外造成%stun_damage%点魔法伤害。远程少女的击晕概率为%stun_chance_ranged%%。

内置冷却时间：%cooldown%秒\n

被动：伤害吸收

受到普通攻击时有%chance%%%的概率抵消%percent%%%实际受到的物理伤害,最多抵消%block%点伤害。
English:
Active: Charge

Charges a unit up to %AbilityCastRange% range away, dealing %stun_damage% magical damage and stunning them for %default_stun_duration% seconds on contact. Successfully attacking the enemy or issuing a command stops the charge.

Cast Range:%AbilityCastRange%\n

Passive: Bash

Grants melee girls a %stun_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %stun_duration% seconds, dealing %stun_damage% magical damage. Stun chance for ranged girls is %stun_chance_ranged%%%.

Internal Cooldown: %cooldown% seconds\n

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %chance%%% chance to block %percent%%% physical damage from incoming attacks, up to %block%.

SChinese:
对建筑的攻击无法触发。
幻象的攻击无法触发。
English:
Does not work on buildings.
Cannot trigger from an illusion's attacks.

SChinese:
主动：月耀祈祷

为周围友军提升%radiate_regen_mana%点/秒的魔法恢复，持续%duration%秒。

作用范围：%radiate_radius%\n
English:
Active: Moonlight Prayer

Grants %radiate_regen_mana% mana regeneration to all allies within %radiate_radius% radius for %duration% seconds.

SChinese:
主动技能持续施法时为施法者添加一个月耀光环，该光环提供魔法恢复效果。

元素秘法石和月耀秘石施加的效果可以叠加。
English:
The active component grants an aura when cast which provides mana regeneration to nearby allies.

The effects of Elemental Luminary Stone and Luna Luminary Stone can stack.

SChinese:
主动：馒馒来

将敌人变成一个人畜无害的油库里，移动速度降至最低，不能攻击，施法，或使用物品，持续%debuff_duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n若目标是幻象，则返回%Illusion_cooldown%%%的冷却时间。
English:
Active: Take It Easy

Turns a target unit into a harmless Yukkuri for %debuff_duration% seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.

If the target is an illusion, it is instantly destroyed and the cooldown is reduced by %Illusion_cooldown%%%.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
效果可以驱散。
由于效果会禁止使用物品，所以退魔御币无法使用。
English:
Dispellable.
Because it prevents the use of items, Exorcist's Gohei cannot be used.

SChinese:
主动：百合

拴住一个目标单位%buff_duration%秒，当其离开%contract_over_range%范围时会被其拖走。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%\n

当目标为敌方时

降低其%move_slow%%%移动速度和%attack_slow%攻击速度，%buff_duration%秒内逐渐恢复。\n

当目标为友方时

增加其%bonus_armor%点护甲和%bonus_magical_armor%%%魔抗。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Yuri

Tethers yourself to the target unit for %buff_duration% seconds, dragging you towards them if you are more than %contract_over_range% units away from each other.

If the target is an enemy, slows their movement speed by %move_slow%%% and attack speed by %attack_slow%, recovering gradually over the duration.

If the target is an ally, increases their armor by %bonus_armor% and magic resistance by %bonus_magical_armor%%%.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
目标为敌人时施加的减速效果可以驱散，其他的所有效果无法驱散。

减速效果是一个3重实例的-20%移速、-20攻速debuff，持续时间分别为2秒，5秒，7秒。
English:
The slow applied to enemies is dispellable. All other effects cannot be dispelled.

The debuff is specifically 3 stacks that slows the target's movement speed by %move_slow%%% and attack speed by %attack_slow% each. The stacks are removed 2, 5, and 7 seconds after the casting time, respectively.

SChinese:
主动：灾厄降临

降低目标点%effect_radius%范围内敌方单位的%movement_speed_percent_reduction%%%的移动速度，并使他们受到的伤害提高%debuff_bonus_damage%%%，持续%debuff_duration%秒。

施法距离：%AbilityCastRange%
English:
Active: Calamity Falls

Cast a %effect_radius% radius blast that slows enemies' movement speed by %movement_speed_percent_reduction%%% and increases their damage taken by %debuff_bonus_damage%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds.

Cast Range: %AbilityCastRange%

SChinese:
主动技能只对使用时符合要求的目标施加效果，不是一个光环。
多个本物品主动技能造成的效果无法叠加，只会刷新持续时间。
效果可以驱散。
English:
The active component only applies effects to eligible targets on use, it is not an aura.
The buff provided by the active component of this item does not stack, it will only refresh the duration.
Dispellable.

SChinese:
主动：七曜庇护

对自己施加一个护盾,可以吸收%barrier_block%点魔法伤害。持续%duration%秒。
English:
Active: Seven Luminary Shield

Create a spell shield that absorbs up to %barrier_block% magical damage. Lasts %duration% seconds.

SChinese:
被动：诅咒攻击

每次普通攻击时有%chance%%%概率使目标降低%maim_movement_speed%%%移动速度和%maim_attack_speed%攻击速度，持续%duration%秒。
English:
Passive: Curse Attack

Grants each attack a %chance%%% chance to slow the target's movement speed by %maim_movement_speed%%% and attack speed by %maim_attack_speed% for %debuff_duration% seconds.

SChinese: 一柄常年遭受诅咒的木剑。
English: A wooden sword that has been cursed for years.

SChinese:
当前版本诅咒效果可以对建筑施加。

效果可以驱散。
English:
Curse can currently be applied to buildings.

Dispellable.

SChinese: 为周围所有友军提供额外的魔法恢复。
头狼无情的攻击造成额外伤害。在他的带头指挥下，周围友军的攻击也同样残忍无情。
残忍的头狼会抓住任何一个破腚攻击敌人的命脉，造成致命伤害。
提高周围单位的生命上限。
萨特苦难使者的恶魔之力让他散发出回复能量，提高他和附近友军的生命回复能力。
枭兽撕裂者的狂怒使其对攻击麻木，并鼓舞附近的友军使他们能够承受更多攻击。
可怕的地狱熊怪粉碎者发起攻击更为迅捷，并鼓舞附近友军效仿。
周围所有敌人都感受到黑龙的爆炸攻击。
English: The explosive attacks are felt by all nearby enemies.

SChinese: 「喜欢动物且爱多管闲事的仙人」
华扇控制住敌方小兵或者中立生物。若被驯养的目标拥有的生命值低于最小生命值，其生命值将会提升到最小生命值。\n\n可对已驯养的单位施放，将其传送到华扇身边。对华扇自身施放则华扇控制的所有神圣劝化单位都会传送到她身边。若目标受到伤害将导致效果被驱散。
如果达到劝化生物的数量上限后再劝化生物，最早劝化的单位将立即死亡。
升级此技能后在升级前劝化的单位并不会增加生命值。
劝化时单位的魔法恢复至满魔。
远古生物的最大可控数量等于终极技能的等级。
这个生物的魔抗光环保护它的友军。对非英雄单位的效果翻倍。
牛头人长官残酷地追求效率，提高他和附近所有牛头人战士的移动速度。
召唤一只可以装备物品的动物伙伴务光。若务光与华扇的距离超过1100，则不能攻击。如果务光死亡，华扇会受到自身最大生命值的%backlash_damage%%%作为反冲伤害。\n务光拥有暴怒，缠雷和雷云技能。
鬼魂放出的寒霜攻击，让敌人感受到刺骨的寒冷。
English: An eerie attack that chills her enemies to their bones.

SChinese: 普通魔法使的独有技艺，每次使用技能后，都能使自己的行动更加敏捷
允许务光无视华扇位置进行攻击，并且在德鲁伊死亡时不会消失。

Activates a magic shield, which absorbs damage using spirit. Absorbs 60% of total damage taken.Has a passive effect of returning the damage dealt by the usage of skills as mana(mana gain does not work on ultimate).
English: Activates a magic shield, which absorbs damage using spirit. Absorbs 60% of total damage taken.Has a passive effect of returning the damage dealt by the usage of skills as mana(mana gain does not work on ultimate).

SChinese: 运用恶魔之力将自己一分为四，分身继承本体部分能力和攻击。
English: Flandre employs devilish powers to create clones of herself which inherit some of her abilities.

SChinese: 芙兰分身后肆无忌惮地发动攻击的符卡。
English: A Spell Card where she clones herself, then attacks wherever she wants.

没人能注意到她的存在，直到她出现在了你的身边。

Koishi is impossible to see until near enemy girls.
