Grants a chance for each attack to cast「Sword of the Divine Justice」which is independent of the usual fixed interval.

SChinese: +{s:bonus_bonus_health} 先忧后乐之剑恢复效果
每次技能命中少女对其施加易伤效果
English: Hitting girls with spells inflicts damage amp
Inflicts 3% incoming damage amplification per stack for 12 seconds.

SChinese: 每次技能命中少女入减少10秒「入鹿之雷」冷却时间
投影内敌方少女每秒受到已损失生命值4%的魔法伤害
English: Projection Deals 4% Missing HP as DPS
Deals magical damage. Only affects enemy girls.

SChinese: 投影效果脱离范围后仍粘滞{s:value}秒
「月影降临术」不向敌军提供伤害减免
目标500范围内优先选取少女
「Abyss nova」额外0.16倍最大生命值伤害
「犍陀多绳索」命中附带2秒缠绕
「犍陀多绳索」无限施放次数，并增加施法距离和拉扯速度
English: 「Kandata's Rope」can be cast with no cooldown, increasing cast range and pulling speed

SChinese: 「风神之神德」额外提供2%的最大生命值恢复与1%的最大魔法值恢复
English: 「Divine Virtues of Wind God」also grants 2% max health regen and 1% max mana regen

SChinese: +{s:bonus_break_duration}秒「六根清净斩」破坏持续时间
+{s:bonus_duration}秒「幽明求闻持聪明之法」持续时间

English: Heaven God Sword「Three Kons, Seven Hakus」

SChinese: 断迷剑每次斩击额外造成目标6%最大生命值的物理伤害
English: 「Slash of Departure from Hesitation」deals an additional 6% of target's max health as physical damage.

SChinese: -{s:value}秒 未来永劫斩冷却时间
击杀少女后刷新三步必杀冷却
English: Reset「Knock Out In Three Steps」on kill
Only resets when killing enemy girls.

SChinese: +{s:value}秒 外力「轨道牵引」眩晕时间
-{s:value}秒「深弹幕结界-梦幻泡影-」冷却时间
English: -{s:value}s「Profound Danmaku Barrier -Phantasm, Foam and Shadow-」 cooldown

SChinese: 「大统一定理」只抵挡少女伤害
English: 「Grand Unified Theory」only evades damage from girls

SChinese: 「四次元核弹」引导时召唤6个十字架。每有一个十字架增加30伤害。
English: 「4D Cationic Bomb」Summons 6 crosses around Yumemi when channelling. Increases damage by 30 for every cross.
+{s:value}%「Law of Mortality」max HP loss per second
-{s:value}s「Deadly Lance of the Swallowtail Butterfly Crest」cooldown

SChinese: 距离下一次施放技能减少冷却时间的剩余时间。
English: The remain time to reduce cooldown that the next cast skill.

SChinese: 召唤强大的风和落叶，\n打击一个区域内的敌人。\n每片叶子可以造成%splash_radius%范围的物理伤害。
English: Summons a storm of falling leaves in an area which deal damage to enemies hit. Deals physical damage in a %splash_radius% radius around hit targets.

SChinese: 秋天是神赐的圣美舞台！
English: The divine splendor of autumn shall be in full display!

SChinese: 随机抓起身边%grab_radius%范围内的一个单位，将它投向一个目标。落地时对目标和附近的敌方单位造成魔法伤害，对建筑有效。\n被抓起的单位是敌方时将受到%bonus_damage_pct%%%额外伤害。
English: Grabs the nearest unit in a %grab_radius% radius around Suika, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land. If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra %bonus_damage_pct%%% damage. Deals half damage to buildings.

SChinese: 与户隐山之投一样，萃香抓住敌人并使大块岩石吸附上去后掷飞。
English: Bearing similarities to Mt. Togakushi Toss, Suika grabs an enemy and attracts rocks and boulders towards her before throwing the whole thing away.

SChinese: 无法投掷被己方克劳恩皮丝【擦弹地狱火】选为主要目标的敌方单位。
安置一个自身的残片观察矢量方向，当观察范围内出现敌方单位时，残片会坍塌，短暂牵扯敌人，对少女的牵扯时间更长。
English: Vector targeted. Dispatch a remnant of Ellen to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of her vector. When an enemy crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls her in and damages her. The pull duration is longer when pulling girls.

SChinese: 总有一天我会与你擦肩而过。
English: I will pass you one day.
Cannot work with「Knock Out In Three Steps」.
Feat of Strength「Storm on Mt. Ooe」

SChinese: 绯想之剑发出红色的光芒，同时打击全图所有敌方少女。
English: The Sword of Hisou emits a brilliant red light, striking all enemy girls on the map at the same time.

SChinese: 天子将周围的气质凝缩在绯想之剑上，并向全敌方一口气放出的超大技。
English: A grand technique that concentrates the surrounding temperaments at the Sword of Hisou and unleashes them below.

SChinese: 地震「先忧后乐之剑」主动
持续时间内受击提高攻击速度
English: Increases attack speed for a short time whenever damage is received.

SChinese: 当半径1500范围内看到敌方少女释放技能，少女会自动收集一份能量。
English: Gain a Gohei charge whenever a visible enemy within 1500 range uses an ability.

SChinese: 当半径1500范围内看到敌方少女释放技能，少女会自动收集一份能量。
English: Gain a Gohei charge whenever a visible enemy within 1500 range uses an ability.

SChinese: 周围600范围内的友军都能享受红雾的增益效果。
English: Allies within 600 range will benefit from the the Scarlet Devil Mist buff.

SChinese: 当半径1500范围内看到其他少女释放技能，少女会自动收集一份能量。
English: Gain a Gohei charge whenever a visible enemy within 1500 range uses an ability.

SChinese: 当半径1500范围内看到敌方少女释放技能，少女会自动收集一份能量。
English: Gain a Gohei charge whenever a visible enemy within 1500 range uses an ability.

SChinese: 半径750范围内的友军将加入宴会。
English: Allies within 750 range join the feast.

SChinese: 火凤凰之翼会使附近的敌军烧起来。
半径1000范围内的友军将得到长者的祝福。
English: Friendly units within 1000 radius will be blessed by Suwako.
Feeding Baked Sweet Potato to allies.

SChinese: 更好的烤红薯，增加队友的攻击速度。
English: Made Baked Sweet Potato better, increase attack speed to allies.
Autumn Sign 「The Autumn Sky and a Maiden's Heart」
Autumn Sign 「The Autumn Sky and a Maiden's Heart」

SChinese: 丰符「极极极巨型蕃薯收获礼」
English: Bumper Crop 「Promise of the Wheat God」

SChinese: 丰符「极极极巨型蕃薯收获礼」
English: Bumper Crop 「Promise of the Wheat God」

SChinese: 丰符「极极极巨型蕃薯收获礼」
English: Bumper Crop 「Promise of the Wheat God」

SChinese: 大幅降低附近敌人的移动速度。
English: Greatly reduces the movement speed of nearby enemies.

SChinese: 神符「八百万的红叶神威」

English: Divine autumn leaves increasing attack damage.

SChinese: 神符「八百万的红叶神威」

English: Divine autumn leaves increasing attack damage.

SChinese: 每拾取一个P点提升一点敏捷，最大上限30，死亡后掉落三分二
English: Pick up P points to increase your agility slightly, up to 30. You will drop 2/3 of your points on death.

SChinese: 每拾取一个P点提升一点智力，最大上限30，死亡后掉落三分二
English: Pick up P points to increase your intelligence slightly, up to 30. You will drop 2/3 of your points on death.

SChinese: 每拾取一个P点提升一点力量，最大上限30，死亡后掉落三分二
English: Pick up P points to increase your strength slightly, up to 30. You will drop 2/3 of your points on death.
Every 4th attack deals additional magical damage.

SChinese: 提高其护甲和魔法抗性，范围内的敌方单位会受到一定伤害
English: Increased armor and magic resistance, and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
「The Strongest and Most Wonderful Shrine Maiden of Incident Resolution」

SChinese: 灵梦是最强最棒的异变解决巫女，获得%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%攻击速度和极速与相位状态
English:
Reimu is The Strongest and Most Wonderful Shrine Maiden of Incident Resolution.
Gains %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed, haste and phased movement.

SChinese: 结界内有友军魔法免疫，敌方受到灵击。
English: Granting allies within immunity to magic and subjecting enemies.

SChinese: 灵梦正在变强，提供%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%的攻击速度和%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%的移动速度。
English: Reimu is becoming stronger, gains %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% move speed.
Darkness Sign「Dark Side of the Moon」
Darkness Sign「Dark Side of the Moon」

SChinese: 获得溅射能力，造成额外伤害的50%将治疗露米娅
English: Cleaving, heal yourself by 50% of cleaving damage.

SChinese: 降低33%%伤害，期间死亡将治疗露米娅
English: %block%%% damage caused reduced, healing Rumia if dead in duration.

SChinese: 增加攻击力和移动速度
English: Get attack damage and attack speed bonus

SChinese: 扑棱蛾子拥有飞行能力
粘上了鳞粉，使用技能将刷新持续时间
English: Covered in scales, and the duration will be refresh when casting spells.

SChinese: 受到爱塔妮缇·拉尔瓦魔法的保护

English: Transformed into a pillar of light.
Granting allies bonus spell amplification and movement speed.

SChinese: 持续消耗魔法，每秒发射一个弹幕追踪范围内最近的敌人
下一击附带范围魔法伤害

English: Divine Light「Honor the Avoidance of Defiance」

SChinese: 攻击能够在敌人之间弹射。
English: Sagume's attacks would bounce between enemies.
Your next attack has increased range, is a guaranteed critical hit and steals gold.
Gaining increased movement speed and status resistance.

SChinese: 该状态消失后会被沉默，若状态期间施法则状态消失后会被眩晕
English: Will be stunned if cast in the duration or slilenced at the end of duration.

SChinese: 每次施法完时震一次地
English: Causes the earth to shake when Chen casts her abilities.

SChinese: 降低攻击力及移动速度
English: Attack damage and movement speed decreased

SChinese: 每一下攻击敌方少女，攻击力都会被提升
English: Grants stackable attack damage on each attack on enemy girls.

SChinese: 受到物理伤害时，若来源既非小兵也非少女，降低所受伤害
English: Reduces physical damage taken from buildings and neutral creeps.

SChinese: 攻击时造成一次物理伤害， 降低目标攻击力。
English: On attacks, deals additional physical damage and reduces the target's attack damage.

SChinese: 小地图上无法测见其位置
下一次攻由将附加物理伤害。
English: Bonus damage in next physical attack.

SChinese: 每次大妖精或友方少女施法后，大妖精的下一次攻由将附加物理伤害。
English: After ally girls' spell, the next attack of Daiyousei will deal bonus damage.

SChinese: 获取视野范围内所有树木周围视野。
English: Provide sight nearby the trees in Daiyousei's sight.

SChinese: 隐身，并获得额外智力和攻击力。
English: invisibility and extra Attack Damage and Intelligence.

SChinese: 吃了蓬莱之药，死后瞬间满血量复活
English: It heals them instantly and makes them immortal for the duration.

SChinese: 这个单位暂时无法行动。
光波正在移动，这时你可以使用「Vacant Pulse」。
English: The light wave is on the way, so you can spell「Vacant Pulse」now.

SChinese: 积累了负能量，在持续时间结束后将受到伤害
English: Will suffer burst damage at the end of the duration for accumulating negative energy.
Get bonus attack damage and ability of lifesteal

SChinese: 技能击中敌方少女增加1层，击杀额外提升10层。\n每层提供1生命值 0.25攻击力 0.2移动速度
English: Stacks by 1 for spells hitting an enemy girl, and by 10 for a kill on enemy girls.\nEach stack grants 1 max health, 0.25 attack damage and 0.2 move speed.

SChinese: 被芙兰盯上的猎物，你已经死了！
English: Doomed to die as aimed by Flandre
Speeds up smelling the wounds of enemies.

SChinese: 持续失去生命，吸收伤害，受到攻击触发回旋斩
English: Costs health continuously to reduce damage taken and perform a helix counter attack when taking damage

SChinese: 持续失去生命，普攻触发回旋斩
English: Costs health continuously and performs a helix counter on attacks.
Secret Barrage「And Then Will There Be None?」

SChinese: 之后就一个人都没有了吗？
English: And then will there be none?

SChinese:
力量成长30+3.0
敏捷成长18+2.0
智力成长18+1.5
白天视野600
夜间视野1500
基础攻击间隔1.8
拍到的美少女照片数量
English: Number of the girl's photos collected by Hatate

SChinese: 受到果攻击时会造成额外伤害
English: Takes extra damage when attacked by Hatate

SChinese: 短时间内提升自己的攻击速度
English: Increased attack speed for a short time

SChinese: 每若干次攻击附带1次「花果子念报」
目标的灾祸会转移给人形
English: Disasters taken will shift to the doll.

SChinese: 受到灾祸会转移给人形
English: Disasters taken will shift to the doll.

SChinese: 受伤时遭受额外的伤害
提高护甲和魔抗并弹开近身的敌人，\n但移动速度降低至220。
English: Charge up your wonder robes with static electricity which boosts your defences and zaps enemies away, but also slows you down to 220 Movement Speed.

SChinese: 你已经成为导电体了，快远离衣玖！
咆哮「月的远吠」伤害减免
影狼的攻击有几率造成眩晕
English: Attacks have a chance to stun the target.

SChinese: 影狼解放自我，变为最纯粹的形态
English: Kagerou transforms into her werewolf form.
This unit was grabbed by Kagerou.
Kagerou is about to deal huge damage to the grabbed target.

SChinese: 普通模式下，生命值变回记录的值
English: Backs the health percentage to the record.

SChinese: 白泽模式下，生命值与记录值差距放大
English: In Hakutaku Form, amplifies the difference between current health percentage and the record.

SChinese: 攻击时有几率变成头槌攻击，造成额外的物理伤害并眩晕。
English: Grants a chance to turn the normal attack to head hammer, dealing additional damage and stunning the target.

SChinese: 完全格挡琪斯美所受到的伤害。
降低琪斯美所承受的伤害。

English: Someone is hiding in the bucket.

SChinese: 琪斯美的施法会附带眩晕。
English: Kisume's next spell will stun enemies effected.
Reducing the armor of nearby enemies.
Rain Sign「A Rainy Night's Ghost Story」

SChinese: 无敌%duration%秒并抵挡所有伤害及效果。
English: Invulnerable, preventing all damage and status effects for 1 second.

SChinese: 躲藏起来，当有人接近吓所有人一跳
English: Hide to scare everyone if someone approaches.

SChinese: 身边有越多少女，攻击越高。
English: Grants increased attack damage for every girl nearby.

SChinese: 身边少女越少，攻击越高。
English: Grants increased attack damage the fewer girls there are nearby.

SChinese: 击杀单位后获取攻击力、攻速、移速

English: Can be cast again to teleport.
「Dance of the Empty-Hearted Masks: Noh of Darkness」

SChinese: 被凭依的单位受到秦心的攻击和技能伤害转变为纯粹伤害
English: Damage taken from Kokoro's attacks and skills transformed into pure damage.

SChinese: 被困于拉尔瓦的梦境之中。

English: Attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and move speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.

SChinese: 将会受到拉尔瓦鳞粉的影响。
增加血量上限，并且每次对敌人造成本技能以外的法术伤害时，造成一次额外的法术伤害。
English: Increases max health and magical damage made and slows enemies' movement speed.

SChinese: 降低移动速度和攻击速度。
获得额外护甲和魔抗，受到非少女来源的伤害减少。
English: Grants armor and magic resistance and taking reduced damage from non-girl units.

SChinese: 持续流失生命，降低所受伤害，增加攻击速度
下一次攻击造成对敌人造成法术伤害并降低移动及攻击速度
English: The next attack causes magical damage to the enemy and reduces movement and attack speed.

SChinese: 被攻击会造成对敌人造成法术伤害并降低移动及攻击速度
English: Being attacked deals magical damage to enemy and reduces their movement and attack speed.

SChinese: 降低附近范围敌方的全能力值
English: Reduces all stats of nearby enemies.
Further reduces the stats of nearby enemies by 20.

SChinese: 每击杀一个单位降低冷却时间
English: Cooldowns are reduced for each unit killed.

SChinese: 每第4次攻击造成范围法术伤害
English: Every 4th attack deals magical damage in a small area around the target.

SChinese: 减少攻速和移速并不断受到伤害
降低周围敌人的魔抗与移速
English: Slows down all the enemies around Medicine and reduces their magic resistance.
Magic resistance and move speed reduced.

SChinese: 你被甜蜜的毒素吸引了
English: You are attracted by sweet poison!
Reduced movement speed and attack speed.

SChinese: 周围的敌方少女会开始流失魔法值，为宫古芳香补充等值的生命值。
English: Absorbing enemy girls' mana to heal Yoshika.

SChinese: 范围内血量不满的单位会增加芳香的攻速移速。
English: Gains bonus movement speed on each wounded enemy girl.

SChinese: 血量百分比低于该状态层数会增加芳香的攻速移速。
English: Grants attack and move speed bonus to Yoshika when your health is below this stack.

SChinese: 攻击对敌方单位注入毒液，使其移动变得迟缓，死亡时发生剧烈爆炸。
English: Attacks inject a venom which slows movement and cause a violent explosion when the target dies.

SChinese: 移动变得迟缓，死亡时发生剧烈爆炸。
延时状态，受到的所有伤害会在状态消失后抵达。
English: All damage received is delayed until after the status expires.

SChinese: 承受的所有伤害都会转变为缓慢的生命流失效果。
English: All damage taken converted to damage over time.

SChinese: 白天生命回复减半，非白天生命回复翻倍。
English: Halves health regeneration during daytime, but doubles during nighttime.

SChinese: 升攻击速度与移动速度
English: Granting bonus movement and attack speed.

SChinese: 每隔一段时间获得金币
能无视地形的高速冲刺同时开启的电子雷达可以让河童视野不受到阻挡物干扰
English: Able to fly anywhere at high speed regardless of terrain and gaining flying vision.

SChinese: 每次使用技能后攻击力会增加，下一次攻击会扩散。
English: Will gain bonus attack damage and cleave for one attack after using a skill

SChinese: 攻击力增加，下一次攻击会扩散。
English: The next attack deals bonus damage and cleaves.

SChinese: 使附近范围少女其所受负面状态持续时间提升。
English: Reducing nearby enemy girls' status resistance.
「Day 7 of the Shrine Visits in the Dead of Night」
「Day 7 of the Shrine Visits in the Dead of Night」

SChinese: 时间结束后造成伤害，达成条件后会被眩晕。
English: Takes damage at the end of duration, or got stunned if no condition is met.

SChinese: 当水桥的生命值过低，会强制水桥消失及无敌秒，其后会产生一个分身。
English: When Parsee's health falls below %limit_health%%%, she will disappear and get invincible, then creates an image when appears again.
Immune to any damage for the duration.

SChinese: 计时完毕会立即刷新技能
每过一段时间可以立刻进行攻击造成额外纯粹伤害并回复生命值。
English: Every few seconds, your attacks cause additional pure damage and restore health.
You gain an instant and empowered attack.

SChinese: 每次攻击在650范围内造成伤害
English: Each attack deals damage in a range of 650

SChinese: 持续时间内，每次攻击少女持续时间+2秒，最高20秒。
English: Within the duration, the duration of each attack hero is + 2 seconds, with a maximum of 20 seconds.

SChinese: 刚摔下来感觉有点不太妙，降低%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%移动速度。
English: Just fell off and feeling a bit not good, Movespeed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Increases strength by the number of stacks.

SChinese: 受到早苗御神签的影响，降低%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_STACKING%%%状态抗性。
English: Affected by Sanae's Omikuji, reduces %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_STACKING%%% status resistance.

SChinese: 受到早苗御神签的影响，降低%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%魔法抗性。
English: Affected by Sanae's Omikuji, reduces %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% magic resistance.

SChinese: 受到早苗御神签的影响，被沉默。
受到早苗御神签的影响，被眩晕。
每次攻击附带法术伤害。
English: Each attack deals additional magical damage.

SChinese: 每次攻击附带来自青娥的法术伤害。
English: Each attack deals additional magical damage from Seiga.

SChinese: 减少攻击力，使用技能时会被眩晕且受到伤害。
English: Attack damage decreased, and will be stunned and take damage after casting a spell.

SChinese: 范围内的所有少女死亡时会制造幽灵幻象。
English: All girls within the aura create an illusion of themselves upon death.
Cannot be teleported for a short time.

SChinese: 攻击力与智力数值互换
根据双方的攻击力与智力差距造成物理伤害以及魔法伤害
English: Deals physical damage on difference of attack damage and magical damage on difference of intelligence.
They are reverse in Seija's visual.
Petroleum「Poverty God's Crude Oil Runoff Pollution」
Petroleum「Poverty God's Crude Oil Runoff Pollution」

SChinese: 产生石油的副作用，减少护甲魔抗
English: Armor and magic resistance reduced by crude oil

SChinese: 产生石油污染土地，移动时恢复生命值
紫苑播撒弹幕时，减少攻速
English: Shion slows her own attack speed while shooting danmaku.
Saturating the area around Shion with danmaku
Passively saturating the area around Shion with danmaku in random directions.
Shion's danmaku dealing % less damage to target.

SChinese: 紫苑弹幕减速，每层时间独立计算。
English: Duration of each movement speed slow stack is independently calculated.
「The Most Despicable and Disastrous God of Destitution and Misery」
「The Most Despicable and Disastrous God of Destitution and Misery」

SChinese: 紫苑降低附近敌人的物理护甲和基础魔法抗性的同时，也降低自身的物理护甲和基础魔法抗性
English: Armor and magic resistance reduced by Shion's own skills.

SChinese: 降低附近敌人的物理护甲和基础魔法抗性
English: Reducing armor and magic resistance from nearby enemies.
「The Most Despicable and Disastrous God of Destitution and Misery」

SChinese: 受到紫苑影响，降低物理护甲和基础魔法抗性
English: Armor and magic resistance being reduced by Shion's presence.

SChinese: 紫苑在石油上会持续隐身，解除凭依及死亡后均会在原地生成大范围石油
English: Shion is invisible while standing on Crude Oil. When she stops the possession or dies, she will release a large pool of crude oil.

SChinese: 被紫苑凭依，施加紫苑身上由其技能产生的负面状态
English: Possessed by Shion, receiving the effects of Shion's self-debuffing spells as well.

SChinese: 不幸「欢迎来到极端贫困的世界」
English: Bad Luck「Welcome to the World of Destitution」

SChinese: 减少所有敌方单位的生命回复及受治疗恢复效果。
English: Reducing the health regeneration and healing of all enemies

SChinese: 不幸「欢迎来到极端贫困的世界」
English: Bad Luck「Welcome to the World of Destitution」

SChinese: 受到紫苑天生影响，减少生命回复及治疗效果
English: Health regeneration and healing being reduced by Shion

SChinese: 石油「贫乏神式原油泄露污染」
English: Petroleum「Poverty God's Crude Oil Runoff Pollution」

SChinese: 受石油影响，除紫苑外敌军减少护甲魔抗，持续受到魔法伤害
English: Crude oil reduces the armour and magic resistance of enemies and deals magic damage.

SChinese: 当前削减的最大生命值
English: Crude oil temporarily reduces the max health of enemies. After leaving the polluted area, max health will be restored after a short time.

SChinese: 提升护甲及魔法法抗，攻击时会对目标造成伤害并且造成眩晕
English: Bonus armor and magic resistance; damage and stun the target when attacking

SChinese: 击杀单位对该单位附近造成法术伤害并晕眩
English: Kill the unit and deals magical damage and stun to the enemies which near the unit
Restore health and mana when casting spells.
Silenced and prevented from using items
*See Visions of the Other World's Lunacy!*

SChinese: 对范围内的敌人造成持续伤害
English: Dealing continuous damage to enemies in the area

SChinese: 对范围内的敌人施加负面状态
English: Applying negative statuses to enemies affected
＊See Visions of the Other World's Lunacy!＊

SChinese: 躲避任何来自幻想乡的伤害
处于隐形状态，提升移动速度
受到的治疗与回复效果降低
智力转化为为魔抗，晒太阳回复生命值
English: Increases magic resistance on intelligence and basks Sunny in the sunshine to heal herself.
Being unlucky 2 times guarantees the next will be lucky

SChinese: 击杀单位获得额外金钱
English: Gaining extra money for every kill

SChinese: 对附近所有英雄单位进行射击
有几率对普通攻击进行一次反击
English: There is a chance to counterattack against normal attacks.

SChinese: 攻击减甲，增加移速，攻击并窃取少女大量单位金币
English: Attacks reduce armor, you have increased movement speed and steal gold from enemies.

SChinese: 降低护甲，达到一定层数后会被偷取金币
English: Armor reduced, steals gold after reaching a certain number of stacks

SChinese: 对敌人的多次攻击会造成纯粹伤害，并窃取少女单位金币
English: Multiple attacks on the enemy cause pure damage and steal gold

SChinese: 达到一定层数后会被偷取金币，并受到伤害
English: Gold will be stolen after reaching a certain number of layerss while taking damage.

SChinese: 提升物理伤害减免及技能增强。
English: Gaining spell amplification and reducing incoming physical damage

SChinese: 被电击后处于易感状态，受到伤害增加。
English: Tojiko's thunder amplifies damage taken for affected enemies

SChinese: 无法攻击或被攻击，并持续电击附近所有敌人，使他们被沉默。
English: ghost, and silencing all nearby enemies

SChinese: 施放一个技能时，会在上一次该技能施放的位詈重复该技能的效果。
English: Whenever Tojiko casts a spell, the spell will also be repeated wherever it was cast last.

SChinese: 被电击后处于易感状态，受到伤害增加。
English: Tojiko's thunder amplifies damage taken for affected enemies

SChinese: 施放一个技能时，会在上一次该技能施放的位詈重复该技能的效果。
English: Whenever Tojiko casts a spell, the spell will also be repeated wherever it was cast last.
Projection of the Sea of Tranquility.

SChinese: 增加受到的伤害并减少攻击力
English: Increases incoming damage and reduces attack damage.

SChinese: 造成物理伤害额外再附以法术伤害
English: Adds magical damage on dealing physical damage.

SChinese: 感染热病，治疗与回复效果降低。
English: Fevered, HP regeneration and healing reduced.

SChinese: 对一个目标射出蜘姝线，会拉向该单位位置
English: Fires a cobweb and pulling Yamame towards the first unit hit.

SChinese: 攻击会令瘴气导入目标体内
被蛛丝牵扯，达到一定层数会被缠绕
English: Stuck by cobwebs, rooted when stacking for a certain number.

SChinese: 获得来自信徒的信仰之力，每个受影响的少女提供3点技能增强
English: Gathers the power of faith from her believers, gaining 3%% magic resistance per girl affected.

SChinese: 正得到神明的注视，层数为0时每3秒失去1层祝福
English: Under Kanako's watchful eye, losing 1 stack of blessing every 3 seconds when the level reaches 0.

SChinese: 获得神明的青睐，每层增加2点攻速
English: Granted Kanako's blessing, gaining 4 attack speed and 1 armor per stack.

SChinese: 你受到了火雷神的护佑。
你遭遇了火雷神的惩戒。
English: You suffer the wrath of Honoikazuchi.

SChinese: 你受到了天钿女命的祝福获得了大量加成。
English: You are blessed by Ame no Uzume and strengthened a lot.

SChinese: 招架一次来自少女的伤害，并瞬移到该少女背后。
English: Blocks damage taken from girls only once and teleports behind the target girl.

SChinese: 对敌人造成额外伤害。攻击附带额外伤害并造成沉默。
English: Deals additional damage and silences the target.
「Dharma of Gumonji Wisdom of the Living and Dead」
Able to return to your phantom half's position.

SChinese: 抵御一次普攻攻击，成功后增加攻速。
English: Blocks the next normal attack taken, and grants attack speed after the block.

SChinese: 造成的所有伤害变为魔法伤害。
English: Converts all damage dealt to magical damage.

SChinese: 造成的所有伤害变为物理伤害。
English: Converts all damage dealt to physical damage.

SChinese: 造成的所有伤害都变为魔法伤害。
English: Converts all damage dealt to magical damage.
Your next attack will be rapid.

SChinese: 被星星风暴所困，无法进行任何移动。使用技能可以解除状态，但是会受到伤害
English: Trapped in a storm of stars and unable to move. Can be removed by casting any spell, but it will burn mana and deal damage.

SChinese: 增加全属性，%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT%生命恢复和%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT%魔法恢复。
English: Increases all attribute, %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health regen and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana regen.
The level of buff is the diffculty of bot.

SChinese: 若为白莲友方，会立刻回到白莲面前，并驱散异常状态。\n若为白莲敌方，将回到被标记的位置。
English: Targeted ally is teleported to you.\nTargeted enemy will be sent back to their immediate position after 3 sec.

SChinese: 打破冰面，令冰面上敌人晕眩并受伤。
English: Shatters patches of ice, damaging and stunning enemies.

SChinese: 摔倒在冰面上，自身晕眩，\n同时打破冰面晕眩并伤害冰面上的敌人。
English: Tripped and fell, shattering patches of ice, damaging and stunning enemies.

SChinese: bot复活后40秒内再次死亡会马上重置买活cd并获得买活钱，并且增加全属性。
English: If bot die again within 40 seconds after respawn, it will immediately reset the cd of buyback and get money for buyback, and increase all attribute.

SChinese: 如果bot带着这个buff死了，获得extra增强。
English: If bot die with this buff, it will get extra bonus.
You are in Fast Respawn Mode.

SChinese: 受到普通攻击伤害加深
受到普通攻击伤害加深
每层提高1%%「中点破碎」的伤害
因恐惧而移动速度、攻击速度减少
English: The fear reduces your movement and attack speed.

SChinese: 因恐惧而移动速度、攻击速度减少
因恐惧而移动速度、攻击速度减少12%%，并降低25点攻击
美丽的红叶的让你无法攻击。
English: The beautiful autumn leaves prevent you from attacking.

SChinese: 每次收到伤害都增加的暴击概率。
English: Increased chance of critical hits based on damage taken.

SChinese: 被小叶飞刀攻击会受到额外魔法伤害。
English: Attacked by Autumn Leaf Throwing Knife will receive additional magical damage.

SChinese: 你的魔法恢复速度得到了极大的提高。
移动速度增加%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，并减少%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%%受到的伤害
English: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and incoming damage reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%%.

SChinese: 增加移速，并获得相位与减速免疫状态
English: Increase movement speed, and can move through units and immune to slows.
I'm Sorry, You're a Good Girl!

SChinese: 攻击速度降低30，移动速度降低30%%。
English: Attack speed reduced by 30 and movement speed reduced by 30%%.

SChinese: 你的护甲减少%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%点，比沙子更脆弱。
English: Armor reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%, making you more vulnerable than even sand.

SChinese: 通过击杀英雄永久获得%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE%点攻击力。
English: Increase attack damage permanently with %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% through killing other girls.
Bonus attack speed and attack damage.

SChinese: 腥甜的红雾使你的技能增强提升%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_SPELL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%。
English: The Sweet Scarlet Mist increases your magic resistance by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_SPELL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%.

SChinese: 腥臭的红雾使你的魔抗降低%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.
English: The Fishy Scarlet Mist reduces your magic resistance by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.

SChinese: 你正在持续失去生命值，但不用担心，不会致死。
English: Continuously losing life, but don't worry, it's not lethal.
Every Medicine can be a Poison

SChinese: 速效药往往会带来极大的副作用。
English: Any medicine can also be a poison, depending on the circumstances.

SChinese: 使负面效果的持续时间变成极短。
English: Continuously dispels all negative effects from yourself.

SChinese: 你的替身吸引了敌人的注意力，使你暂时隐形。
English: Your substitute is distracting the enemy, rendering you invisible.

SChinese: 无法使用任何物品，被动技能失效。
English: Cannot use items, and passives are disabled.
Debuff reduced and attack damage increased.

SChinese: 获得额外%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%攻击速度，%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%点护甲和%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT%点/秒魔法恢复
English: Gaining increased %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed, %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% damage, and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% armor.

SChinese: 获得一个格挡%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_CONSTANT_BLOCK%物理伤害的护盾。
English: Gained a guard to block %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_CONSTANT_BLOCK% damage from incoming physical damage.

SChinese: 将受到伤害的60%%以魔法形式反弹回去。
English: Returns 60%% of damage received as magical damage back to the attacker.

SChinese: 你的身体受到霜冻影响，\n移动速度减少%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，\n攻击速度降低%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。治疗效果减少40%%
English: Your body is affected by frostbite. Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%, and all healing received is reduced by 40%%.

SChinese: 霜冻幽灵护盾护体，获得物理护盾
English: Protected by a frosty phantom shield.

SChinese: 令人充满寒意的幽灵缠上了你\n攻击速度降低%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%点，并且移动速度减少%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%
English: Chilling phantoms haunt you. Attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%

SChinese: 幽灵状态，无法攻击或者被攻击\n你受到的魔法伤害增加%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%，你的移动速度下降35%%。
English: Ghost form，cannot attack or be attacked.\nslowed by 35%% and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.

SChinese: 绿坝将保护你不受到魔法伤害，让你健康成长。
English: Green Dam protects you from magical damage and lets you grow up healthy.

SChinese: 每秒受到基于施法者最大魔法值的魔法伤害。
English: Taking magic damage per second based on the maximum mana value of the caster.

SChinese: 升级时回复生命和魔法。
English: Restores health and mana on level up.

SChinese: 由于技术上受到压制，减少35%%移动速度和30攻速
English: Being suppressed, reduce %maim_movement_speed%%% move speed and %maim_attack_speed% attack speed.

SChinese: 短时间内增加魔法恢复
短时间内增加攻击速度
攻击速度提升%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%\n移动速度提升%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%
English: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%

SChinese: 短时间内增加生命恢复
你的远程攻击会覆盖式打击目标所在区域。
English: Your ranged attacks splash to all targets in area.

SChinese: 你的近战攻击将会分裂。
你的远程攻击会同时攻击多个目标。
English: Your ranged attacks hit multiple targets.

SChinese: 你被厄运缠身了，移动速度减少了%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。
English: The misfortune makes your body feel weak, slowing you by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.

SChinese: 受害者的仇恨诅咒了你，使你的治疗和视野半径减少%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HP_REGEN_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%，并使你受到%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%%的额外伤害。
English: Your victim's hatred curses you, reducing your healing and vision radius by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HP_REGEN_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%% and causing you to take %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%% more damage.

SChinese: 你的位置被嫉妒之心眼暴露了。
English: Your position is exposed by the Green Eye of Jealousy.

SChinese: 掺了金坷垃，能吸收两米下的氮磷钾!
English: Mixed with Jinkela can absorb NPK two meters below!

SChinese: 被死神盯上，无法恢复生命值
English: Targeted by the Shinigami, unable to restore health.

SChinese: 你的生命值恢复速度得到了极大的提高。
English: Your health regeneration is greatly increased.
All forms of movement are disabled.
Maximum mana reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_BONUS% and slowed.

SChinese: 移动速度提升%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%并允许你穿越其他单位。
English: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and allows you to walk through other units.
Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%
Reduces the cooldown of all spells and items by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_COOLDOWN_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Reduces the cooldown of all spells and items by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_COOLDOWN_PERCENTAGE%%%.

SChinese: 每秒受到基于施法者最大魔法值的魔法伤害。
English: Taking magic damage per second based on the maximum mana value of the caster.

SChinese: 每受到一定伤害增加攻击速度加成的层数。
English: Gaining increased attack speed based on damage taken.

SChinese: 每秒受到火凤凰之翼的魔法伤害。
English: Taking magical damage from Phoenix Wings per second.

SChinese: 你的时间被停止了，暂时无法行动。
English: Your time is stopped, temporarily unable to act.

SChinese: 进入隐身状态，获得魔法抗性加成
English: Invisible and gaining bonus magic resistance.

SChinese: 博丽神社护身符的技能抵挡效果
将抵挡下一个指向性技能或道具。
English: The next targeted spell will be blocked.

SChinese: 攻击速度提升%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%\n移动速度提升%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%
English: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% movement speed.

SChinese: 你被触手缠住了，暂时无法行动。
English: You are rooted by tentacles and unable to move.

SChinese: 回复效果降低35%，并每秒受到伤害
English: Health regeneration and healing reduced by 35%% and taking damage.

SChinese: 不在同一次元，无法攻击或者被攻击\n你受到的魔法伤害增加%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%，你的移动速度下降35%%。
English: Not in the same dimensions, cannot attack or be attacked. Slowed by 35%% and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.

SChinese: 进入软硬不吃的傲娇状态，暂时无敌。
English: Into tsundere status that immune to both soft and hard tactics.
Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% magic resistance and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health regeneration .

SChinese: 获得魔法护盾和生命恢复。
English: Gaining magic damage barrier and health regeneration.

SChinese: 永久获得万宝槌的力量加成
你的护甲减少%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%点，变得脆弱如泥。
English: Armor is reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%, becoming as soft as mud.

SChinese: 在攻击目标少女时获得额外攻击速度。
English: Gain attack speed bonus when you are attacking the target.

SChinese: 周围友方少女月耀充盈。
English: Nearby ally girls are Full Moonlight.

SChinese: 你变成了一只无害的油库里。不能攻击或施法。
English: You become a harmless yukkuri, and cannot attack, use items or cast spells.

SChinese: 你缠绕上了目标，目标移动时你会被拖着走。
English: You are tethered to the target and will be dragged along when the target moves.

SChinese: 你的队友缠绕上了你，增加%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%点护甲和%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%魔抗。
English: Your ally is tethered to you, increases your armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% and magic resistance by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.

SChinese: 你被灾厄缠身了，移动速度减少了%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，受到的伤害提升%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%%。
English: The calamity makes your body feel weak, slowing you by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, increase incoming damage by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%%.

SChinese: 技能护盾,可以吸收魔法伤害

English: Reduce 35%% movement speed and 30 attack speed

SChinese: 增加敏捷，独狼状态下加成翻倍
English: Gaining agility, doubled while in the Lone Wolf state.

SChinese: 影狼的下一个技能将得到强化
诡异的攻击降低了目标的攻速和移速
English: The eerie attack decreases target's move speed and attack speed

SChinese: 技能伤害提升并且造成范围伤害，但自己也受到更大伤害。
English: amplifies all damage she deals and deals area damage with fire bombs, but also takes more damage

SChinese: 封闭意识，提高全属性及移动速度，但是无法控制。
English: Koishi's subconscious takes control, increasing her attributes and movement speed, but preventing her from being controlled.
You are quelled. reduce attack speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%%%%.

SChinese: 持续受到伤害，魔抗降低
每秒受到法术伤害，并增加受到的伤害
English: Taking magical damage every second and taking increased damage.
All spells cost health instead of mana.
Immune to magic and pure damage.

SChinese: 每秒回复生命值，并减少受到的伤害
English: Regenerating health every second and taking reduced damage.

SChinese: 攻击附加额外法术伤害同时攻击降低目标魔抗
English: The attack deals additional magical damage and reduces the enemy's magic resistance.

SChinese: 受到来自露娜萨的攻击，魔抗降低
English: Attacked by lunasa, reducing magic resistance.
Chance for skills to critically strike.

SChinese: 被沉默，技能结束后再结算一次伤害
English: Be silenced, and damage will be dealt again after the spell ends

SChinese: 每杀死一个单位提升技能增强
English: Each tier increases by 0.125%% skill damage per kill,  and each layers increases by 1 layers after 45%

SChinese: 第4次攻击附加的法术伤害
根据当前蓝量百分比获得技能增强，每1%%蓝量获得0.35%%技能增强
减少移速并不断受到伤害
受到梅露兰狂躁音律的影响，很气。
English: Driven to a frenzy by Merlin's manic music.
Merlin improves her music, <font color='#5cb85c'>increasing the unit's armor and magic resistance, as well as move speed and attack damage</font>.
This unit is under the influence of Merlin's music, <font color='#d9534f'>losing armor and magic resistance</font>, but <font color='#5cb85c'>gaining damage and movement speed</font>.
Merlin improves her music, <font color='#d9534f'>reducing the unit's armor and magic resistance</font> with no benefits.

SChinese: 「狂躁的幻想乐章」生命值回复

English: This unit is under the influence of Merlin's exciting performance, granting increased health regeneration.

SChinese: 管灵「激昂小号曲-第一乐章」
English: Trumpet Spirit「Mad Zun March - First Movement」

SChinese: 处于梅露兰激昂演奏的影响下。
English: Under the influence of Merlin's passionate performance

SChinese: 溺水，使所有动作和移动都变慢。
English: Drowned, causing all actions and movement to slow to a crawl.

SChinese: 每次攻击，增加攻击速度。

English: Nothing can hide from a tengu.

SChinese: 大幅增加移速。并且可以穿越地形
English: Greatly increases movement speed and grants free pathing over impassable terrain.

SChinese: 提升攻击速度与移动速度。
English: Granting bonus movement and attack speed.

SChinese: 周围单位护甲魔抗提高。
English: Granting bonus armor and magic resistance to nearby allies.
Granting bonus magic resistance to nearby allies.

SChinese: 周围单位移动速度与攻击速度提高。
English: Granting bonus movement and attack speed to nearby allies.

SChinese: 使用技能时有35%的概率回复魔法。
English: 35% change when casting a spell to restore some mana.

SChinese: 你的攻速与移速降低了！
English: Your movement and attack speed are slowed!

SChinese: 根据等级差来增加魔法伤害。
English: Deals additional magical damage based on level difference.

SChinese: 每层诅咒减少12%%魔抗和12%%移速
English: Reduces 12%% magic resistance and 12%% movement speed for each stack

SChinese: 每次进行移动，都会减少护甲并根据移动距离造成物理伤害。
English: Taking damage and armor reduction based on movement.

SChinese: 持续受到伤害并降低魔抗
English: Taking damage and reduced magic resistance
Reduce movement speed and attack has chance to miss.

SChinese: 降低移动速度，攻击有概率丢失。

English: Slowed and taking damage over time.

SChinese: 被动提升攻击速度及移动速度。
English: Passively increases movement and attack speed.

SChinese: 被动提升攻击速度及移动速度。
English: Passively increases movement and attack speed.
「Goddess Who Invites Unfortunate Slips of the Tongue」

SChinese: 你受到了金山彦命的祝福获得了大量加成。
English: You are blessed by Kanayamahiko-no-Mikoto and strengthened a lot.

SChinese: 被缠绕无法移动和攻击。
English: Rooted, and cannot move or attack.
Wide awake, attacking with increased vigor.
Chi Sign「Earth Dragon Sky Dragon Kick」
Taking increased damage from all sources.
Suwako gain mana when dealing damage.

SChinese: 造成伤害会返还法力值。

English: Suwako gain mana when dealing damage.

SChinese: 天符「天道是非之剑」准备就绪
下一次攻击附加范围晕眩和额外伤害
地震「先忧后乐之剑」攻速加成
English: Earthquake「Sword of Pleasure After Hardship」Bonus Attack Speed

SChinese: 获得100%%减伤，但不可进行攻击、使用技能和道具，被动也完全失效

English: 「Queen of Bubble」: You'll drop your gold!

SChinese: 「狂躁的幻想乐章」伤害与减速
这个单位被梅露兰的小号吵到发狂，走不动路，受到持续伤害与减速
燃烧自己的生命后的余热。
冲撞目标，对自己和敌人造成伤害。
English: Turn into a phoenix and dive at the target point, exploding and dealing damage to enemies and yourself.

SChinese: 生命回复、移动速度、爆炸伤害、攻击力提大幅提高。
English: Life regeneration, movement speed, explosion damage, and attack damage greatly increased.

SChinese: 在持续时间内降低一半对敌方伤害，并且增加一倍对自己的伤害。
English: The spell deals half damage to enemies and double damage to Mokou in the duration.
Gather your powers to grab the enemy

SChinese: 攻击有概率丢失并减少移动速度。
English: general attacks have chance to miss and reduce movement speed.

SChinese: 消失变为蝙蝠，对周围敌人造成伤害。
English: Transform into a devil bat and quickly lacerate your enemies

SChinese: 每秒耗魔召唤红色十字架，对范围内敌人造成伤害并吸收为血量。
English: Burn away nearby enemies with fiery red aura that also drains them of life.

SChinese: 免疫物理伤害，提高「大江山悉皆杀」触发概率。
魔法恢复中，但对周围所有单位造成辐射伤害。
English: Improves your Mana Regeneration but deals damage to you and nearby units.

SChinese: 蓄积核能中，蓄积时间结束后对周围敌军造成伤害。
English: Accumulation of nuclear energy, after the storage time cause damage to surrounding enemy.

SChinese: 核裂变制造人工太阳中，终止施法则产生核爆。
English: Nuclear fission to create artificial sun, termination applied to produce a nuclear explosion.

SChinese: 人工太阳得到了增幅，辐射范围内的单位被沉默了。

English: High-speed moving to the target direction.

SChinese: 暴露视野，且被文攻击时会受到额外纯粹伤害。
English: Shares vision and takes extra pure damage from Aya's attacks.
Activation turns movement command into a free Blink teleportation.

SChinese: 以最大法力值增加最大生命值,攻击造成范围额外魔法伤害，并回复生命值。
English: Grants bonus max health based on max mana, and attacks deal bonus magical damage in a small area and restore health.

SChinese: 持续失去生命和魔法，使用技能的蓝耗将会数倍伤害自己。
English: Taking significant damage per second, and taking even more when casting spells.

SChinese: 受到的冰霜效果，降低移动速度和攻击速度。
English: Movement and attack speed slowed by the cold.

SChinese: 暴风雪中逐渐降低移动速度
English: The blizzard greatly reduces your movement speed.

SChinese: 接下来的攻击将会造成巨额物理伤害。
English: The next few attacks will deal massive physical damage.
Gaining increased movement speed after a kill.
Impossible Request「Bullet Branch of Hourai -Rainbow Danmaku-」

SChinese: 放出七色的弹幕，造成范围伤害。
English: Releasing rainbow danmaku which deal damage in a small area.

SChinese: 会在黑夜中魔法恢复速度提升。
English: Gaining increased mana regeneration during nighttime.

SChinese: 利用永远之力消耗魔法值不断补充生命。
English: Using the ability to manipulate eternity and consuming mana to regenerate health rapidly.

SChinese: 释放旋转变大的弹幕，对敌人造成晕眩和伤害。
English: Releasing a rotating barrage of danmaku that slowly grows larger over time, stunning and dealing damage to enemies.
Slowing down and slowly turning to stone.

SChinese: 吸收伤害转化并为攻击速度和力量
English: Absorbing damage and converting it into attack speed and strength.

SChinese: 提升下一次技能的弹道速度并降低冷却时间。
English: increases the projectile speed of next fire bomb spell and reduces cool down

SChinese: 每缺少1%魔法值，增加0.15魔法回复速度
English: Every 1% of max mana Koakuma misses increases 0.15 mana regeneration for her.
Hide in the coffin to sleep.

SChinese: 人偶启动自爆装置，向目标靠近并自爆。
English: The doll activates the self explosion device, approaches the target and self explosion.
Flying at high speed towards the target location.
Dealing damage in front of Marisa.

SChinese: 天仪「天球仪中的太阳系」
召唤四个自动攻击的天球仪。
English: Conjures 4 orbs of light to fire upon your enemies.

SChinese: 按比例将受到伤害转化为输出

English: The number of move speed is reduced with %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and the number of attack speed is reduced with %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_PERCENTAGE%%%.

SChinese: 下次攻击时将附带黑暗力量
English: There is dark power at next slash

SChinese: 好吃！受到来自烤红薯的治愈。

English: Become invulnerable for a short time.

SChinese: 被完全蓄力的「胧月花栞」击中
操纵时间，增加攻击速度
English: Manipulating time, gaining increased attack speed.

SChinese: 技能皆无冷却时间，但用同种技能会有额外消耗
English: Your spells have no cooldown, but will consume additional mana with every cast.
The mark of time is engraved on your knife.

SChinese: 来自早苗的奇迹，增加全地图友军的法力回复。
English: Sanae's miracle increases the mana regeneration of allies across the whole map.

SChinese: 来自早苗的奇迹，增加法力回复。
使周围友军处于无敌状态。
在早苗的结界内拥有无敌效果。
English: Within Sanae's barrier, allies are invincible.

SChinese: 减少速度并持续受到伤害。
持续期间击杀单位会受到最大生命值百分比伤害。
English: Killing units deals damage based on the affected unit's max health.

SChinese: 无法使用技能和道具，且在四季周围600码内持续时间不减少。
English: Completely negates target's passives, spells and items. The duration won't count down as long as they stay near Eiki.
Guilt punishes the bearer with damage for each kill they make.

SChinese: 你被「苏生大雨」降低了攻击速度
升级时对所有敌方少女造成伤害。
English: Deals damage to all enemy girls when leveling up.

SChinese: 升级时对所有敌方少女造成伤害。
English: Deals damage to all enemy girls when leveling up.

SChinese: 无敌，但是无法攻击和使用技能、道具。
English: Invulnerable, but cannot attack, cast spells or use items.
Immune to physical damage and has an increased chance to activate「Massacre on Mt.Ooe」.

SChinese: 被御柱击飞，砸到墙上则会晕眩。
English: Struck by an onbashira and stunned.

SChinese: 环面结界内的单位会持续受到伤害。
English: Units within the torus continuously take damage.

SChinese: 被治疗后获得护甲及魔抗加成。
English: Healed and gaining increased armor and magic resistance.

SChinese: 在战场之中「风神之神德」最高可以叠加20层效果。
English: In the battlefield,「Divine Virtues of Wind God」stacks up to 20 times.

SChinese: 周围降落大量御柱，使砸到的敌人晕眩。
English: A large number of onbashira are falling nearby, stunning enemies hit.

SChinese: 被动技能完全失效。被减速且攻击有概率丢失。
English: Passives are disabled. Slowed and has a chance to miss attacks.

SChinese: 沐浴在细雨之中，持续受到治疗。
English: Bathed in light rain and continuously healed.

SChinese: 伊豆能卖命使你从队友身上汲取力量，人数越多加成越高。
English: Izunome's power allows you to draw strength from your teammates. The more there are, the stronger you become.

SChinese: 八百万之主！绵月依姬这下牛逼了！
English: Leader of the Myriad Gods! Yorihime is incredibly powerful now!

SChinese: 超高速向目标位置冲刺。
English: Rushing with blinding speed towards the target.

SChinese: 魂魄「幽明求闻持聪明之法」
English: Soul Sign「Wheel of Pain of the Living and Dead」
Assaulting the target at high speed with multiple strikes.
Human Oni「Slash of the Eternal Future」

SChinese: 用白楼剑招架攻击并反击

English: Four Devas' Arcanum「Knock Out In Three Steps」

SChinese: 位移超过300码则直接死亡，否则收到总血量25%%的伤害
English: A signature move that executes the target if they move more than 300 away from the spot or deals 25%% of their max health as pure damage if they don't.
The number of units in gap

SChinese: 高速冲向目标，魔法值用完才停下
English: Flying quickly towards the target location. Only stops if mana runs out.

SChinese: 每个十字架为教授抵挡0.05秒内的所有伤害，并增加20点攻击力。
English: Each cross on the field increases her attack damage by 20, and can be consumed to evade damage for 0.05 seconds.

SChinese: 提升攻击速度及回血速度
持续地夺去周围敌人的体力。
English: Continuously take away the spirit of the surrounding enemies.

SChinese: 你的体力正在持续流失。
暂时获得%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT%生命恢复和%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT%魔法恢复。
English: Temporarily gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health regen and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana regen per second.

SChinese: 以敌人的灵魂为养分，盛开出美丽的樱花吧！
English: In the enemy's soul for the nutrient, full bloom beautiful cherry blossoms!

SChinese: 星粒具有高空真实视野，受到一定次数的伤害后会消失。
English: Stardust Pieces have flying vision and True Sight, and disappear after taking a certain number of damage instances.

SChinese: 召唤蓝宝石星群从天而降。
English: Summoning a shower of stars from the sky.

SChinese: 你的护甲因为灵魂被斩而减少。该效果不可驱散。
English: Your armor is reduced from your soul being cut up. Cannot be dispelled.

SChinese: 灵魂受伤(来自半灵斩击)
English: Soul Injury (from the Phantom Half's attacks)

SChinese: 你的护甲因为灵魂被斩而减少。(半灵效果减半)
English: Your armor is reduced from your soul being cut up. (Has half the effectiveness of Youmu's attacks)

SChinese: 获得12护甲、30%%魔抗、20%%技能增强、75攻速加成
English: +12 armor, +30% magic resistance, +20% spell amplification, +75 attack speed
While Yumemi is preparing the nuclear warhead, nothing can stop her.

SChinese: 每点能量获得3点生命恢复和3%%技能增强。

English: 「The Coming of the God of Makai」

SChinese: 处于「魔神降临」状态下，获得额外加成和腐蚀光环
English: At the state of「The Coming of the God of Makai」, get bonus and aura of corrosion.
Aura of corrosion from「The Coming of the God of Makai」

SChinese: 处于腐蚀光环下，护甲和魔抗被降低了
English: Effected by the aura of corrosion, armor and magical resistance are reduced.

SChinese: 这个单位正在进行位移
24%%概率使攻击目标及其周围减速。
English: 24%% chance to deals extra damage and slows down nearby enemies.

SChinese: 攻击附带额外伤害，并且可以使敌人减少移动速度、攻击速度减少12%%(可叠加)
English: Attacks deal slow enemies on hit, and may deal additional damage.

SChinese: 周围少女越多攻击力越高。
English: Grants increased attack damage for every girl nearby.

SChinese: 攻击会使目标丢失魔法值。
English: Koishi burns the enemy mana on attack.

SChinese: 有概率闪避攻击，\n攻击有概率暴击。
English: Koishi gains evasion and critical strike chance.

SChinese: 下一次攻击会附带暴击效果。
English: The next attack will be a critical hit.

SChinese: 攻击同个单位攻击速度持续提高并有概率爆炸。
English: Each subsequent attack on one target will increase your attack speed and has a chance to cause a small explosion.

SChinese: 增加犬走椛及其天狗部队的移动速度、攻击速度。
English: Increases Momiji and her white wolves' move speed and attack speed.
Grants your general attacks chance to reduced movement speed and hits
General attacks gain chance to create an illusory copy of you

SChinese: 攻击有概率使敌人降低移速和命中。
攻击降低敌人移动速度并造成纯粹伤害，\n并有15%%概率暴击。
English: Attacks slow enemies and cause them to bleed, and have a 15%% chance of being a critical strike.

SChinese: 神符「八百万的红叶神威」
攻击有30%%概率造成范围伤害和使范围内敌人受到减速效果
English: General attacks gain 30% chance to smash the target and nearby enemies for extra damage

SChinese: 鬼符「大江山悉皆杀」(Missing Purple Power状态)
English: Oni Sign「Massacre on Mt.Ooe」(Great Oni 「Missing Purple Power」state)

SChinese: 攻击有大概率造成范围伤害和使范围内敌人受到减速效果
English: General attacks gain high chance to smash the target and nearby enemies for extra damage

SChinese: 地震「先忧后乐之剑」被动
提高生命值与魔法值恢复速度
每隔%AbilityCooldown%秒攻击附加额外伤害并使目标沉默
English: The attack will get extra damage and the target will be silent
Wriggle become permanently invisible until attack or uses a skill.

SChinese: 妖梦的攻击能直斩灵魂，减少被攻击者的护甲。
English: Each strike will cut straight through the soul, and reduce the target's armor
Oni Sign「Anomalies, Strength, Disorder, and Spirits」
Employs the ruinous powers of the Oni tribe to increase her own Strength.
Feat of Strength「Storm on Mt. Ooe」

SChinese: 攻击有一定概率将敌人顶飞并受伤、晕眩
English: Grants a chance to blow the enemy away on a general attack, dealing extra damage, stunning and knocking them

SChinese: 你受伤了，生命恢复降低。
English: Your injuries reduce all forms of healing.

SChinese: 周围900范围内存在敌方少女获得30攻击/攻速加成。
周围900范围内没有敌方少女获得40%%移速和3%%生命魔法恢复加成。
<font color='#00FFFF'>检测到有玩家未选择人物, 游戏已暂停</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>The game has been paused due to a player not selecting a character in time.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>当所有人准备好后请输入 -pause 解除暂停</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>When all players are ready, type '-pause' to unpause the game.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>如果进入游戏后仍然未选择, 游戏会为玩家随机一个人物, 但没有额外赏金</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>If any players still haven't selected a character once the game starts, the player will be given a random character, but will not receive the bonus gold for it.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>房主在该界面输入-rankdc即可禁用天梯分及其他模式</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>Enter -rankdc in the chat to disable ladder rankings and other modes.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>在该模式下,洗牌按钮不会根据天梯分洗牌,游戏结束时也不会上传比赛数据</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>In this mode, the shuffle option will ignore ladder rankings, and game data will not be uploaded after the game.</font>

SChinese: <font color='#00FFFF'>该模式无法启用BP,游戏内也无法投降,玩家的天梯分不会发生变化</font>
English: <font color='#00FFFF'>In this mode, BP mode cannot be enabled, the surrender option is disabled, and the ladder rankings will not be updated.</font>

SChinese: Model Name：えと式チルノ\nModel Author：えと\n	她是湖附近妖精们中的领袖般的存在，力量也比其他妖精强。她是属于好战型的，所以必须留神。她身高颇低，穿蓝色的衣服，背后有冰之羽翼。她有操控冷气的能力。能瞬间冻结小东西，比普通的妖精更危险。一直在释放冷气的她周围总是很寒冷。人们不知道她住在哪里，也无法得知她平时的生活是怎样的。不光是琪露诺，所有的妖精都能溶入大自然之中，所以人类们看不见。

CV：VV
台词：台本菌
Model Name：犬走椛
Model Author：えと
	在妖怪之山上巡逻着的天狗。视觉，嗅觉均很优秀，可以瞬间发现侵入者。在发现侵入者后，先是用简单的攻击进行威吓，如果仍不起作用的话，便会马上回去向大天狗大人报告。她的部队在一般情况下，都在瀑布的内侧待机。
Model Name：星熊勇儀ver1.10\nModel Author：モンテコア/ぷれでたぁ/min.\n	能让哭喊的孩子吓得闭嘴的鬼。虽说现在鬼的行踪再也没人知晓，但得知旧地狱中栖身着这么一个人。恐怕旧地狱中也栖息着其他的鬼。鬼是有同伴意识却亦有我行我素的精神，似乎他们连伙伴们都在哪都不知道的样子。
Model Name：藤原妹紅\nModel Author：モンテコア/nya/ルシール/piron/kurak/鮪P（ムロ）\n	她是人类，但身体不老不灭。活了很久，身上有各种妖术，据说是和妖怪较量时得到的。身为人类却强到被妖怪袭击也能轻松应付。帮助迷路闯进的人从妖怪手中脱离。

CV：星醤
台词：台本菌
Model Name：えと式改変モデルver1.08
Model Author：えと/クレサト
	要说令人讨厌的妖怪，就得提莉格露·奈特巴格。为什么人们讨厌她呢？因为她伴随着大群昆虫出现，让昆虫自由地活动。想像一下蜈蚣、毛虫、飞蛾、蜘蛛、灶马等一齐飞扑过来的情景，光想就让人毛骨悚然。

CV：星之祈愿
台词：喵子
Model Name：霧雨魔理沙
Model Author：ルシール
	她是住在魔法森林的一位奇怪的魔法使。不过这个魔法使只是一种职业而已，她是人类。能使用魔法。她善长于光和热的魔法。拥有“只有华丽并不是魔法，弹幕最重要的是火力”的口头禅。她的魔法外表看来华丽潇洒，实际上是背后默默的努力堆积而成的。而且她不愿被别人看到她努力的样子。就像大型烟花一样。

CV：VV
台词：台本菌
Model Name：聖白蓮
Model Author：モンテコア
	命莲寺的住持。虽然原本是人类，不过由于常年的修行已经完全超越了人类。现在已经属于人们常说的魔法使了。虽然已经入了佛门，但是不知道什么原因却被妖怪敬仰着。她从来没有像童话故事中的魔法使那样，念诵着咒语治退妖怪。使用的力量完全是邪恶的，一点都不像是圣人，虽然并没有人目击到她与人类为敌，但其实已彻底成为妖怪的同伴了。。
克劳恩皮丝，美国妖精，美国国旗成精。

CV：简翎
台词：夕莉莉
Model Name：古明地こいし
Model Author：エボシ
	虽然她不会读心所以也不会招人讨厌，但由于自己的心也是空白一片，同样的谁都不会喜欢她。直到她的身影进入视线范围内为止，没人能够察觉到她的存在。也有就算她的身影映入眼中，仍然会觉得她并不存在。当她从视线范围消失，就会立即忘掉。
Model Name：つみ式ひななゐ天子\nModel Author：つみだんご\n	然后有一天，幻想乡的妖怪们以自己的力量引发了异变，在幻想乡境内引发骚动并以此为乐。天子看在眼里，不禁沉思。「我，对无聊的天人生活已经忍无可忍了！就凭我的话，也是可以引发个异变的」于是天子离开了自己的家。带着天界的道具——绯想之剑……

CV：小缘
台词：台本菌
Model Name：ろくご式蓬莱山輝夜
Model Author：ろくご（iroha02）
	辉夜是月球人,作为月之民的公主而于溺爱中成长。所以,骄生惯养的她非常任性。不过却随着一件事,改变了她安稳的生活。因一时之兴而逼使永琳造出的禁断之药(蓬莱之药),触犯了忌讳。那件事很快被掲露辉夜亦因此遭到处刑。只是,拥有永远之力的辉夜即使死了亦能马上转生,某程度上,已是不死的存在。结果唯有在辉夜再度转生之前,将她放逐到地上,以跟下贱的地上人一起生活作为惩罚。遭放逐的她很快就被一个地上人发现,并取名辉夜展开了地上的生活。

CV：北斗夜
台词：台本菌
Model Name：天コロ式 秋姉妹
Model Author：天コロ
	掌控着幻想乡秋季的神明，特别是在谷物与果实的收成方面。与人类生活非常密切相关的神，但这种神明实在是随处可见，所以分不到多少信仰。她的能力只对在秋天成熟的东西有作用。而且又是卯足了劲一个一个的使作物发育成熟，所以能力的作用范围也是有限的。就算如此也仍旧受到了人们的爱戴，会被人类叫去参加收获祭以表达感谢之意。
Model Name：魂魄妖夢\nModel Author：追憶の機械人形（エレクトリカ）\n	幽灵是不定形的，纯粹的幽灵很少会化成特定人形。魂魄家不是纯粹的幽灵，而是半幽灵半人类的家系。外表和普通人类无差别。思考方式也和人类一样，据说体温要比普通人低一些。寿命也比人类长很多。可能是因为有一半是无寿命的幽灵。

CV：VV
台词：台本菌
Model Name：村紗水蜜
Model Author：みるちお
	她是很久以前，在水难事故中丧命的幽灵。虽然已经成为了船幽灵，却依然眷恋着这里所以没有离去，接二连三地将乘船的人们带入河中陪伴她。

English: assists Patchouli as a little devil

SChinese: Model Name：EXくるみ＆EXルーミア\nModel Author：モンテコア/min.\n	在妖怪之中属于弱者，拥有让其周围无论昼夜都是一片黑暗这能力的，就是露米娅。这妖怪产生的黑暗，是让火把都失去作用的魔法之暗，闯入其中的人类的视野会降低得无异于失明。
Model Name：博麗霊夢（鈴奈庵風正式版）\nModel Author：モンテコア\n	幻想乡境内博丽神社的现有巫女，她是历代巫女中最缺乏危机感的一位，不知是因为修行不足，还是因为已经拥有足够的实力。她天生地幸运和敏锐，也退治了不少妖怪。能够摆脱重力，在空中自由地飞行。没东西能束缚她。

Model Name：Kanata式東風谷早苗\nModel Author：Kanata\n	代代单传的拥有秘术的人类。性格上，总是非常认真，而且对自己的力量保持着自信。有时也会自信过头就是了。原本，是祭祀着风之神的人类的样子，但是在使用了秘密的秘术引发呼云唤雨的奇迹之后，周围的人们对施行秘术的人类也产生了信仰。也就是说，由风神大人引发的奇迹，不知何时开始，被错认为是由人类所引发的奇迹了。正因为如此，她们这些使用着秘术的人类，以人类之身收集了信仰，受到了和神同样的待遇。这正是现人神。

CV：明石千曲
台词：夕莉莉
Model Name：アールビットモデルMsz改 鈴仙
Model Author：アールビット/紫いかソーメンＰ (まさざい)
	铃仙·优昙华院·因幡是只和其它妖兽气质大不相同，特殊的妖怪兔。她身体修长，步姿端正，不像妖兽。在妖兽之中算是活动缓慢。虽是妖兽，却从不袭击人类。相反会避开人类。有着很长耳朵和头发。总的来说，是只与众不同的妖怪兔。
Model Name：C_mellフラン_改\nModel Author：C_mell/ココア/ RAY\n	红魔馆有两位吸血鬼。分别是作为主人的姐姐蕾米莉亚·斯卡雷特，和妹妹芙兰朵露·斯卡雷特。芙兰朵露极少外出红魔馆，进入过红魔馆的人类基本上能确认这点。她有一对散发着七色不可思议之光的翼，浅黄色头发，身高和姐姐蕾米莉亚差不多。背上的一对翼有着其它生物、妖怪、幽灵无法想像的奇怪扭曲形状。

Model Name：八雲紫\nModel Author：ゎたべななみ\n	要说最像妖怪的妖怪，就必须要提到八云紫的名字。这个妖怪，由于其危险的与根源相关的能力、神出鬼没而性格不近人情、行为原理与人类完全相异等等的原因，是一个没人愿意与她为敌的妖怪。

Model Name：封獣ぬえ\nModel Author：C mell/nakao/モンテコア/メカクラゲ\n	在平安物语中是一种让天皇都惴惴不安的妖怪。据记述称，抓住后发现她是长着猴子的头、狸猫的身体、老虎的手脚以及蛇的尾巴的奇美拉虽然这个形象随后就成为了鵺的形象，但其实并没有记载说这样的怪物就是鵺。事实上，妖怪鵺和那个怪物完全是两码事。鵺是彻彻底底的正体不明的妖怪。但是传说中她的鸣叫声却广为人知。也有一种说法是，有她鸣叫的夜晚会成为不祥之夜。在她展现于世间的身姿上，生长着无法言喻的不知是翅膀还是尾巴的迷之触手。各自自由地晃动着，使人看的头晕目眩。
Model Name：八雲藍\nModel Author：義経/kome-ken/javatea/ままま\n	据说妖兽的尾巴越多魔力越高，越长则越聪明。能到达这个最高峰的就有她，九尾之狐八云蓝。有着九条巨大的尾巴的狐，其耀眼的毛色造就了一种神圣感。而招收这只最强妖兽作为从者，主要用于杂用的就是最强的妖怪——八云紫。

Model Name：永江衣玖\nModel Author：モンテコア/ぷれでたぁ/min./アールビット/alva/リリーP\n	在龙的世界与人类的世界之间生活的妖怪。偶尔，也有发生行迹或是尸体被人类发现的事情，但是活生生地现身的先例是绝少的。能够听懂龙的语言，但是只有重要的内容才会透露给人类和妖怪。长长的羽衣边缘会自己散发绯色的光泽、其美丽难以言喻。传说若人类披上这件羽衣，就能够在天空中飞翔。

CV：绯月
台词：喵子
Model Name：八意永琳
Model Author：モンテコア/葡萄P（quinsiene）/逆輸入P/ぷれでたぁ/min/deathell
	本为月之民,也就是宇宙人。已在地上隐居了相当长的岁月。早在辉夜还是月之公主的时候,两人就已经认识了。不知从何时开始定居于月球的八意家,乃是天才药师家族。而永琳的知识则更是拔群。她的头脑远远凌驾于人类之上,亦因此会经常说一些令人难以理解的说话。
Model Name：min.式 改造_射命丸文 1.43\nModel Author：モンテコア、ぷれでたぁ、Basilico、min.、moto、いそビー\n	幻想乡的鬼、千年以前就在这里居住的天狗。原形是乌鸦。拥有操纵风程度的能力。射命丸文是天狗之中速度很快的鸦天狗。手持相机，在幻想乡各处奔走，记录下各种有趣的事件。虽说是天狗，外表和人类并无太大差别。

Model Name：靈烏路空\nModel Author：ばく/kasuya/sinsinji/kaihey-51/他\n	栖息于旧地狱最深处的地狱鸦。住在旧地狱的妖怪基本上都是因为原住地成了废墟，继而迁居于此，但地狱鸦本来就住在地狱，是这里最早的住民。她总是一副异样的姿态。可疑的存在着的「分解之足」，看起来很重的「融合之足」，手上还安着一门大炮一样的东西，这好像是「第三足」，胸部有着深红的「赤之目」，这全都是寄宿在他身体里的神灵，八咫乌的影响。

Model Name：C_mellレミリア_改\nModel Author：C_mell/ココア/RAY\n	说起在幻想乡已经确认的吸血鬼，那就是住在红魔馆的斯卡雷特一家。那里的主人就是绯红恶魔——蕾米莉亚·斯卡雷特。虽然外表看来很年幼，但实际上她已活了超过五百年，拥有吸血鬼一族令人惊异的身体能力。她身高较低，外表看来不满十岁，背后有对比身高还要大的羽翼，光看影子的话显得十分巨大。还有就是态度傲慢。

English: <font color='#00FFFF'>%s1 has initiated surrender, enter '-urd' to vote surrender, current vote count: %s2/4.</font>

SChinese: 召唤具有破坏性的冰爆，降低目标区域内的敌人的移动速度。
受到一定次数攻击后，斧王就会做出螺旋反击，对附近所有敌方单位造成纯粹伤害。
投掷的技能描述！（懒得去找了）你们自己看看这对不对吧！
